title: Bar menu needs upgrades and an actual cook
review: Hotel and staff are great! Room was clean and very comfortable.   The restaurant/bar on the 2nd floor is....ok.  If you want a good meal than I’d suggest traveling the few blocks downtown. The bartender is also the cook.  Enough said.  Breakfast buffet was good.

title: New Hampton Inn and nicely done
review: Hi Josh,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great Experience
review: This is a newer Hampton Inn located in the downtown Las Olas area of Fort Lauderdale.   Very clean, new, and well designed. Upfront I will tell you it’s valet parking only.   The room was large and spacious.   The pool is located on the second floor and was large and inviting .   The breakfast area was larger than most Hampton Inns and well situated so you are not  sitting side by side with anyone . Very spacious.   It’s off the beaten path, not in the main road so it’s quiet and relaxing.   We got an amazing deal and will definitely be back soon.

title: Valet Service
review: Hi Karlboy,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great hosts
review: Although it took a bit for the shuttle to get to the airport to pick us up, the experience from there on in was great. Ann at the front desk was outstanding. David was a great asset and helped us as well. They have a shuttle to the cruise port for $10/person USD and you can also book the shuttle from cruiseport to Fort Lauderdale airport for $15/person USD at the same time. That worked out awesome!

title: Wonderful visit
review: Upon arrival, we were greeted right away by George Johnson. He helped us with getting our luggage to our room and was extremely friendly and chatted with us. We were exhausted from traveling and we definitely appreciated the good laughs we had with him.  Check-in was fast and easy. We got in late and were hungry, so we decided to eat at the bar/restaurant on the 2nd floor. It was good food and friendly service.

title: Overnight Stay Perfect
review: Hi Emily,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Lunch ladies
review: This was a quick overnight stay arriving late at the airport and leaving the following day. We had a seamless and quick check-in, water provided. The lobby is spotless. The rooms are clean and comfortable. For the price the location and friendliness can't be beat. The valets were kind and quick, offering great directions and suggestions. The breakfast had tons to offer!

title: Hampton inn Spirit Airlines business trip Nov 2019.
review: Hi Andra,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great for the night
review: Dee was amazing. I’m gonna miss her so much! She was super helpful. She always came in to work early to make sure we were taken care of. Dee always went above and beyond. Thank you Dee so much for everything!

title: Great Accomodations
review: Amazing staff with clean comfortable room.  Walking distance to restaurants and the Museum of Discovery and Science over at 401 SW 2nd Street with a Vegan Cafe across the street. Plenty of scooters around town or an Uber nearby.

title: Good property, rooms need work
review: Hi Nyrunr,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Amazing customer service, clean, comfortable, spacious rooms, and delicious food. Highly recommend!!
review: It’s a nice centrally located hotel for access to WPB or Miami. I thought the beds weren’t the quality I’d expect for a Hilton property and the water pressure in the shower was not strong at all. I have it 4 because of the wonderful staff, great location, and ease of access.

title: Great Location
review: Hi DaydreaM,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Last Minute Stay a Pleasant Surprise
review: The staff here are very warm, friendly, and helpful!! From the shuttle driver, Greg, to the front desk staff Kelli-Ann and George, Rose in the bar/late night restaurant, to the wonderful ladies at breakfast this morning (I apologize, I didn't get their names but their smiles lit up the mornin'), everyone made us feel welcomed and right at home. A little sanctuary in the city. We can't recommend this Hampton Inn enough. The food was delicious. The room was clean, comfortable, and spacious. If you ever travel to Ft. Lauderdale, you should definitely stay here!!

title: Mostly good, but a terrible shower, and $20 a day for mandatory valet parking!
review: Clean room, nice staff, decent breakfast, BUT the water pressure in the shower (10th floor) was terrible - just a trickle.  And I didn't like having to use valet ($20 a day) when their parking garage was adjacent to the hotel.

title: Great Venue & Amazing staff
review: Hi JCS,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Kudos to the Team at Hampton Inn Las Olas
review: My whole experience from beginning to end was incredible. Allen the guy who set up the room was so patient and professional. Maria from sales definitely went above and beyond by providing exceptional customer service and Apple our server in the restaurant/ bar area, was amazing as well. My event ran so smoothly because everyone at The Hammonton Inn downtown Las Olas area was phenomenal including the valet.  Thanks,  Jose Very Satisfied customer

title: Good value and great location
review: Hi Jose,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: True Hospitality
review: I ended up switching hotels to the Hampton Inn due to the horrendous experience at the nearby Fairfield Inn.  The staff at the Hampton was excellent.  They were pleasant, knowledgeable, and above all they were kind and compassionate to a weary traveler.  The room itself was immaculate and well appointed.  The housekeeping staff was friendly and always smiling.  The bartender, Rose, was very friendly and the food at the bar was great.  You definitely want to have the chicken wings...best I've had in awhile.  The pool was cozy and inviting and very clean.  The staff the the Front desk were excellent and friendly.  One lady definitely stood and that was Ann, what a darling!  She welcomed us with a big smile when we walked in and gave us excellent recommendations on getting around…

title: Excellent hotel
review: The service, room comfort, location and free breakfast offerings were superb. The staff were helpful and attentive, checking in throughout the stay to ensure all was going well.  I will definitely stay here the next time I’m in the area.

title: Outstanding Service
review: Hi Cbranom1,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great experience!
review: We stayed here one night before a cruise.  The service at this hotel is outstanding.  The hotel sent us a text on the morning of our arrival welcoming us and asking if there is anything they can assist us with prior to our arrival.  They sent a 2nd text about an hour befor echeck-in time to let us know our room was ready.  The room was comfortable, well equipped, and very clean.  Breakfast was good, with a large variety of choices that all looked delicious.

title: Great Choice...Limited breakfast meats

review: This hotel is in a great location and only 3 miles from the airport.  The mall and beach is also close to the hotel.  The customer service is great at this location.  Free breakfast and shuttle service is an added benefit to staying at this Hampton Inn!

title: Business Stay
review: Nice clean hotel with all the basics including a decent free breakfast, a small bar with some food, a gym, a pool and a friendly staff. The only thing that needs improvement is the bar food menu which has no real dinner items...just burgers and sandwiches, etc.

title: close to shopping area

title: Perfect spot off the main road
review: I am very grateful for the hospitality of this hotel. The staff was so welcoming and made the experience. I love the location too! Just a few miles to the beach. I can not wait to come back and I will be telling others about my experience.

title: Good value for downtown venue
review: Clean and quiet. Overnight stay for business travel with valet parking. Property has a pool, 2nd floor bar & light dining - both good when you don't want to get out. Rooms are clean however the shower is in need of repair both the valve and the doors.

title: Great crew!
review: We came off a cruise a day early due to Hurricane Dorian, and Carnival Cruise Line provided a list of hotels for guest. I called the Hampton Inn, they had 4 rooms available and once we got to Fort Lauderdale they picked us up.   We got a good night sleep and they took us to the airport in the morning.   They are 10 -15 minutes from the airport.  The hotel receptionist checked us in in a timely manner without any issues, she was very professional.   The rooms are big and spacious, the beds are nice and comfortable, I love the bathroom decor.   The room and bathroom were clean.  No issues.

title: Home away from Home
review: Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Gregory Arishil
review: This hotel is a great example of Hamptonality at it best!  I stayed there during a recent trip and was impressed with the front desk staff, especially David and Fatima.  Also, the valet parking staff was impressive and very friendly.  The manager, Kelly, allowed me to leave my car there while I was away for two weeks without incident.  Thanks for accommodating my request and making my stay great!

title: "Hampton Inn" is a great offer for the price and location
review: Located at walking distance from Las Olas Boulevard and other landmarks in Fort Lauderdale, Hampton Inn boasts a modern facility with very professional staff and a great price for the stay.  I fully recommend this hotel.

title: Pre-cruise stay

title: Shuttle Driver Greg Aristil's great customer service

Rooms were clean and comfortable.  Ann and David at front desk got us to our rooms as soon as they were available.  Ann also suggested a great local restaurant (Top Hat Deli) to visit while we waited for our rooms. Breakfast was good and Lester was friendly and helpful!  Thanks to George Johnson for taking care of us from start to finish - a true gentleman!  Close Los Alos Boulevard and Water Taxi.  Will stay here again!

title: Dee and Lester are the BEST!!
review: Hi Busymom,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Overnight cruise stay
review: My name is Rosita(Ro) and I would like to thank Greg the shuttle driver at the Hampton Inn at Fort Lauderdale on Andrews Avenue.  He was exceptional with his good attitude and consistent reliablity when taking me or picking me up from places I had to go.  Greg's efficiency is one of a kind and I thank him for that during my 4 week stay at the Hampton Inn.  While staying at the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale, Florida, I recommend Greg as your shuttle driver.    Keep up the excellent work Greg, you ROCK!!!   Alexis, Ro, and Morgan

title: Great staff
review: Lester & Dee are so nice and made sure our Breakfast was perfect. Jose’ our shuttle driver always made sure we got where we needed to be. Would stay here again. title: Very Good
review: The staff were very helpful and friendly especially Ann on front desk, we were her first check-in, the hotel served an adequate breakfast for our needs, everywhere was kept clean. Our room was comfortable, the only complaints was the small closet space and occasionally noisy plumbing, we saw a lot of homeless people near the hotel but never had any problems. For us the hotel was a good location. My wife and i enjoyed our stay and would stay there again.

review: Helpful friendly staff, clean comfortable beds/rooms, great breakfast w/lots of selections, clean well maintained fitness center, good location between airport and beach, restaurants w/in walking distance, felt safe

title: Outstanding Hampton
review: This Hampton is a notch above other Hampton Inns.  Staff was professional and pleasant; breakfast was outstanding and rooms were nicer than typical Hamptons. Location not ideal for family travel, but felt that was reflected in the lower price.  Complimentary airport shuttle was appreciated.  Would recommend!

title: Beware! What you prepay for and reserve is not a guaranteed
review: We flew into Fort Lauderdale the day before our cruise & stayed at this Hampton Inn.  It was great and for a small fee transferred us to the ship the next morning.  You will need to use Lyft or Uber to go to a restaurant though - there is nothing within walking distance.

title: Great hospitality
review: Hi,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Daughter's Wedding Celebration
review: I prepaid for a room with 2 queen beds a month in advance for 2 adults and 1 child. Upon check-in I was told the manager switched my reservation to a king and a pull-out. I complained at check-in but was told to take it or leave as the hotel was fully booked. Needless to say the pull out was horrible and caused back pains next day. In addition, the air condition was noisy and sounded like a freight train whenever the compressor come on making for an uncomfortable and restless night. If I hadn't prepaid I certainly would have left. What's the purpose of a reservation (and guarantee) if the guest is at the whim and fancy of the manager's discretion?

title: Awesome staff !
review: We selected the Hilton Las Olas for the price originally. We had an Wedding Rehearsal Planned before a destination wedding. Maria  the sales manager help with the food and venue. The food from the catering company the hotel had was amazing  Upon our arrival, we are to get a shuttle from the airport to the hotel. We  received text updates about how the stay was. Tim and David was great at the service desk. George who help us with our bags was amazing as well. Apple works in the café - bar area who made amazing food and drinks. They offered vegan options as well.  The rooms were clean and spacious. Cleaning staff is professional.  Lastly. Greg who is the pm shuttle driver is nice. Efficient and professional!! I would definitely stay here again. !!!

title: Amazing
review: This hotel was in a great location just off Las Olas st where lots of shopping and restaurants are within walking distance. They do offer a free shuttle from the airport and to the cruise port. The 2nd floor has an outdoor pool, breakfast, and bar with a small restaurant. The cook when we stayed on June 23rd was awesome even though she had no help she was doing a great job. Our shuttle driver Bruce was also a huge help to us he gave great suggestions and advice on how to spend our time without spending all our money. In the morning before leaving for the cruise the shuttle driver, not Bruce, was nit helpful at all. It was hot and sticky out we didn't know our way around and needed a Walgreen's or similar. This driver who appeared to be sleeping in the van advised me to WALK…

title: Very disappointed.
review: Hi Mizzturner,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Would definitely stay again
review: Our room was beautiful and clean... the breakfast spread was sensational. My husband and I went to the bar for a night cap, and there was an incident with two other guests that could have turned into a big scene but it was handled soooo perfectly by the two bartenders- Christina and Apple. I was truly amazed at what an amazing job they did. They handled everything very quickly, calmly, and discretely, but above all else they were two of the most kind people my husband and I have ever met. We were blessed to cross paths with two genuine people with good hearts who also know how to pour a drink!!! 😊 We will definitely stay at this hotel again next time we are passing through.

title: A Nice Place to stay
review: Forced out of my home due to tenting, I stayed at this wonderful property.  The room was large and comfortable.  The bed was soft as were the towels.  The staff could not be friendlier from the valet (special shout out to Tristan).  Breakfast was beyond continental.  Check in and check out was a breeze.  This is a great place to stay.  If the need arises again I will definitely stay here.

title: Hampton Inn Downtown FL Rocks!
review: Ho Stosoned,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Training in Ft Lauderdale
review: This was our first time staying at a Hampton Inn. We had a red eye flight into FL and arrived at the airport at 7am. We called the shuttle driver and he picked us up within 30 minutes and took us to the hotel he was prompt and described where to meet him so no problem. When we arrived at the hotel we asked the front desk to hold our luggage until we could check in at 3 they said no problem. At about 9am they called us and said our room was ready and there no extra charge for the early check in! WHAT HOTEL DOES THAT? We had also ordered some items from Amazon that were delivered to the hotel and when we requested the items from the front desk we were expecting a receiving charge but they said no charge. WHAT HOTEL DOES THAT? Great service from Sly and Ann at the front desk they…

title: Great Review
review: I had a great visit to Ft Lauderdale for training. The Hampton Inn provided great accommodations. From the moment I was greet by C.J. at the valet station, everyone went out of there way to make me feel welcome. Would highly recommend staying if you are going to be in the Ft Lauderdale area!!

title: We found it to be fine, but just another hotel.
review: We found the hotel to be clean and adequate.  We did take the airport shuttle who picked us up promptly.  Since we have some mobility issues, we had hoped to be able to walk to the downtown Las Olas area.  It wasn't too far, but it was too far for us.  The hotel said they would drop us off there since it was within a mile of the hotel.  They did have a shuttle service to the cruise port which was the purpose of our stay in Ft. Lauderdale.  The staff was courteous, but dining at the hotel was not optimal.  The included breakfast was very good with a lot of selections.

title: Hotel very good - parking unfortunately very expensive
review: I hosted the Success in Love Summit for the first time and George was absolutely amazing. He went above and beyond in helping to unload the items for the event to making sure the set up crew had essential items we couldnt find.  He had a positive attitude and spirit. Amazing service. I would have another event there based on his "can do" attitude.

title: Awesome pre cruise stay
review: Hi,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Clean hotel
review: For many years we have preferred the hotels of the Hilton hotel chain Hampton Inn on our travels through the USA.      If you stay overnight in one of these hotels, you know that an excellent bed awaits you and that the breakfast buffet is also better than the average.    This also applies to this hotel in Fort Lauderdale, the bathroom was new and clean as the room makes a good impression.    Unfortunately, at night - we had room 608 - one is very often torn out of sleep because passing trains ring loudly. We had asked for a quiet room, and it was understandable that then one gets one in the direction of the railway tracks that one cannot see from the room.    It's really annoying that you have to pay 20 $ for parking because you can't park outside without getting towed.    But…

title: Don't stay here.
review: There was no staff to check me in when I arrived.   No way to signal for someone.   Waited almost five minutes then just left.   The room (1111) smelled moldy and frankly gross. For the price point and options available I think there are better places to stay.

Close to the Las Olas area for restaurants which is a big plus. Room was nice and comfortable and a George Johnson on the pool deck was the man. He brought us water and was such a nice guy to talk to.

The only area for improvement for me was the breakfast offering.  I've been to HampotoWe walked from Las Olas Boulevard and saw some homeless people on the streets but we were not disturbed

title: Beautiful room, great service.
review: Everything was great, close to lots of places to eat and things to see including the science center which was great! The room was very spacious, modern, and comfortable. The only downside was that earlier in the day we tried to venture out on a walk and there were many belligerent homeless people on the street corners which made walking around outside feel a little unsafe so we took an uber to the science center and back to the hotel.

title: Perfect Location for a pre-cruise stay!
review: We came to Fort Lauderdale for pre and post cruise stay (Dayuse only)  Our rooms were ready when we arrived early and we were able to check in which was great.  The front desk staff were friendly and very accomodating.  Special shout out to Sly.  Nice man.  Very helpful  There is a lot of construction in the area - was a bit of a long walk to Las Olas Blvd.  I would recommend a taxi or even the Freebee app which would provide a free ride to that area.  Las Olas is a beautiful beautiful area.  My only complaint would be the 6:00 pm shuttle driver taking us back to airport was a bit late, drove a little too fast.  A bit scarey.  The flip side was the daytime shuttle driver stayed later on his shift to make certain that this driver showed up.  He was very nice.  Would have put us…

title: Cruise
review: Hotel was nice. Friendly staff. Nice Fitness center and pool area. Only problem was that the cruise port shuttle was 30 minutes late. I thought the price of the room was a little steep.  Especially for it's location.

title: Awesome Hospitality!!!
review: One of my BFFs and I stayed for one night pre-cruise.  Here are some of the highlights:  ▪️Clean room with a very comfortable bed! ▪️Outstanding friendly staff. Thanks Sly! ▪️A FREE shuttle service that picked up at the airport, took us to the Las Oleas area to eat, and picked us up when we called. ▪️$10.00 got us to the cruise port!   I will stay here again, if given the opportunity!

title: Over prices
review: One night stay for 230 after tax jumped to 297 then after leaving valet got charged as well and my room went to $350 they only valet is what i was told when other hotels it’s complimentary I’ll do air bnb before coming back! Also smelled like mold on the 4th floor

title: Best hospitality
review: The hotel was basic, however the amenities were Amazing.....The location was almost a mile from Las Olas, which was Great!! The hotel had free shuttle to Las Olas and back.  We took the shuttle to Las Olas twice and went to the Cheesecake Factory and to a mexican restaurant. The staff was great especially Sly, and the hotel was clean and quiet, except that it was less a mile from Las Olas you could walk if you wanted too.  If you get a chance, visit Las Olas, it's like Rodeo Drive in Los Angeles, well worth the visit.  I would recommend this hotel to my friends or anyone!

title: ok is fine - location is unsafe
review: Hi Scarp62,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Ok stay
review: From the moment we arrived the customer service was excellent. Sly help to make our stay great! He was knowledgeable about the area and very helpful with little things we needed like laundry and phone chargers.  The hotel was clean and the free breakfast was delicious. I'd stay here again any time I come to the city!

title: Basic hotel, not child friendly
review: Traveled with a toddler, had to change rooms initially because the fridge was broken and I needed to be able to keep milk on hand. Initially they told me all the fridge were broken and finally they changed us to a room that did in fact have a working fridge. The hotel is not child friendly. The bathroom door is barn style on rollers which is a major safety issue but also meant that you could either close the closet door or the bathroom but not both. This meant the toddler either had free reign of the iron board and closet items or the entire bathroom . Stair case by breakfast area is 2 story, steep open to the main area. Descent rooms but more stress than needed if traveling with a child.

title: Day room
review: Hi,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: EXCELLENT!
review: We booked a day room to wait in after a cruise and then a late flight.   Nothing special about this hotel.  They said it was recently renovated but still looked old and had a funny smell in our room.   It was fine for a quick place to shower and change before our flight but wouldn’t do an extended stay.   The shuttle was a nice touch but be sure you make reservations for it.

title: A Message to Corporate
review: Hello,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Just a place to sleep
review: We were originally booked at the Residence Inn Airport & Cruise location.  We got there after we had done online-check-in the day before and after being notified that our room was ready, and the front desk clerk told us that they overbooked and they didn't have a room for us.  They were rude.  They sent us to the Hampton Inn and by the time we arrived an hour later (11pm), we were even more exhausted and very upset.   We were greeted by Tim, who was very friendly and very helpful and it reminded us that we should have stuck with the Hilton brands!!!  The room we were given was different from what we had booked at the Residence Inn, so we didn't have a sofa bed which we needed, so Tim offered us a free roll-away bed.  He was so helpful, and friendly!  We will definitely stay here…

title: Hotel stay
review: George Johnson  Very personable and accommodating. He brought us water and ice pops out on the veranda by the pool. George is the reason to continue my relationship with trip advisor. He has a very outstanding personality and brought cheer to our day.

title: Hotel chosen by our cruise
review: This review is for mostly for the great customer service we received from George Johnson. We had a large group sitting around the pool and enjoying the day. George came out and brought us watah and popsicles! What a refreshing treat and what a personality! Hey Hampton Inn...great asset in GJ!

title: Great for cruisers!

title: Paid Ritz-Carlton prices for Hampton Inn
review: Had several problems at the hotel.  Checked in a day early for our cruise.  The hotel forgot to give us a welcome sheet for the cruise.  The lobby was a mess the next morning.  No one including hotel staff had no idea what was going on.  The cruise line had no one there there were only people from the transportation company who didn't know anything.  Hotel staff needs to coordinate with the cruise line so they at least know what is supposed to be happening!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Good value hotel in a great area of Fort Lauderdale
review: Great value for your stay at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale /downtown Las Olas Area. The complimentary breakfast was excellent. Great location and within walking distance of several restaurants, shopping and sites to see.

title: A Great Hotel with Great Staff in a Horrible Location

title: Great Hampton Inn
review: Dynamically located in the heart of Fort Lauderdale exciting downtown district alright. It is in the heart of one of the most dangerous spots in Fort Lauderdale. Don't go for a walk from here at night.. There is a bus station and the area is teaming with homeless people who aren't very welcoming to visitors.  The valet parking guy Carlos was exceptional and almost made the $20 a day parking option worth it. Made for a $200 a night stay which is a little pricey considering where the hotel is located.  If you drive it is okay but if you are driving there are so many better options available to you. It is in Unincorporated Fort Lauderdale and a short drive to some very nice areas.  I wouldn't stay there again just for the fact that the $20 a night parking on top of the already $160…

title: Personal service was the best!
review: This hotel has a beautiful lobby and friendly staff. They even have a cute little bar. Beautiful rooms and a convenient  location for both downtown Fort Lauderdale and nearby to beach attractio s. I'll be back here again!

title: Worst Hampton on the planet.
review: Worst Hampton on the planet.  Very overpriced for what you recieve.  Airport shuttle is an old suv with a trailer attached.  Parks at the check in area so if you take a cab, have the driver pick you up somewhere else to avoid walking around it into the middle of the street.  Very noisy place.  Bring a magazine to get through the check in procedure.  Takes forever.  Vanity in the bathroom barely bigger than the sink.  This place is to be avoided.

title: Spirit
review: This hotel has a nice second floor outdoor pool and patio area that is great for lounging in. And if you’re real lucky, like I just was, George just might come by with a bottle of water and popsicle! Thanks George!   They also have a decent array of breakfast options and the rooms are decent and clean. The staff is very friendly and helpful.  The location is a little less than desired especially when you are without a car you have to walk a ways to get to anything (ie food, coffee etc). Although Uber and Lyft are very easy and convenient. There are also a variety of brands of motorized scooters around that are a fun way to get around.

title: Great stay
review: Hi Amanda,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Business meeting combine a few personal vacation days
review: The hotel pretty nice and clean. Honestly didn’t see any problem with the hotel. Through my visit the valet was pretty nice and helpful and appreciate the extra help Lowensky provided.Rating this 10/10

title: Trains, Homeless, and Mold...Stay Somewhere Else
review: Do you like piercing train whistles? This is the hotel for you...there's a train station nearby and trains that lay on the whistle when they cross streets. Would you like to stay near a homeless encampment? This is the hotel for you.. across the street and in any direction you have vacant lots and homeless. There's an entire camp across the street. The icing? The room we picked via HH app smelled like mold. They were nice enough to give us another room (third one was ok) but overall the hotel is below average. There are plenty of choices in Ft. Lauderdale and I'd never stay here again. Makes me question my loyalty to Hilton Hotels. Did I mention it cost $600 for two nights? Live and learn I guess....

title: Convenient

title: Partnership with ALL Stars is super!
review: Room was clean and spacious.  Breakfast was very good.  Location excellent.  Bruce V was the shuttle driver.  He picked us up and dropped us off several times during the 3 day stay.  He was friendly and courteous and offered several useful suggestions of places to go, see, eat.   My only problem was that they could offer no wine glasses and suggested we drink our room wine from a cardboard cup.  Come on folks - a couple of wine glasses upon request wouldn't break you!!

title: Our flight was changed and George Johnson made sure our bags were safe until our next flight out.
review: Hey Jude,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Perfect for our group of women going on a cruise
review: Nice hotel with pleasant staff. Transportation could not have been easier. The hotel coordinates with All Stars transportation. It was an easy pick up at the airport and later ALL Stars drove us to dinner and then returned us to the hotel. This is a courtesy service. The drivers we had, Matt and Bruce, were friendly and could not have been nicer or more respectful. We would certainly stay here again!

title: Not great!
review: Rooms need some TLC.  Some of the front desk staff where surly and did not respond to complaints very well.  Location not too good because although it was only a few blocks from the Downtown area the immediate area did not feel safe.  Don no think I would stay here again.

title: Good Hotel but not a great part of town
review: We arrived fairly late in the evening for a one night stay. It was nice that the hotel restaurant was still open. My companions said the burgers there were some of the best they'd ever had! Generous portions, and not overpriced. The room was clean and spacious; bed was comfortable. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful.  The (free!!) hotel shuttle picked us up from the airport, which was extremely convenient.  The complimentary breakfast was plentiful, with lots of options. I was impressed.

title: Vacation
review: Hi Ottgrri,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Awesome place
review: Nice hotel. Friendly and supportive staff. Typical Hampton. However, the area is kind of rough.  Easy to walk to Las Olas for entertainment and food but the neighborhood is a bit rough. We walked to the beach but it took about an hour.

title: finally   they renovated!!
review: i used to stay here frequently for work, but the property was run down and in desperate need of security and a renovation.  finally!!   the property is renovated and there is tighter security.  rooms are nicely done.  you feel like you are staying in a brand new hotel.  security is provided in the lobby and a new feature they now require you to have valet parking, at a charge.  breakfast is nothing special, but typical Hampton Inn.  this is a well run, newly renovated property than i can return to

title: Great Staff, Great Food, and Clean Hotel for Precruise or FLL

title: Convinient location and great service.
review: We stayed in this hotel the day before our cruise. The hotel is very clean, and the staff is exceptionally friendly and efficient. The large public area lounge on the second floor is a perfect place for gathering your group together with lots of room to spread out and relax. The bar/restaurant had surprisingly good pizza, and fresh healthy options like hummus plate with veggies. We appreciated the quality of the food and the cleanliness of the rooms after a long day of traveling. The free shuttle from the airport was a nice perk. The shuttle that we purchased for post cruise was a very good deal, and they were right there waiting when we got off the ship. This shuttle was a great value for us, as we signed up for our time, and they dropped us right where our luggage got loaded…

title: Avoid.
review: Room was dirty on arrival.Allergy flare up badly (dust/mite). Can't ventilate room + central venting system turns this place into a virus and bug greenhouse.Poor breakfast.Staff was usually friendly and helpful, but you almost always had to wait 5+ minutes to talk to one.

title: Room cleanliness, and safety
review: My husband and I stayed here when we saw the show Hamilton. It was close enough that we were able to walk to dinner and the performing arts center. The room itself was perfect for a quick get away. Very clean! We used the valet parking and it was very helpful!

title: Good pre-cruise hotel
review: Stayed here prior to a cruise. The check in was easy and the room was comfortable with everything we needed although the sliding doors for the toilet was a novelty!  There is a flat screen television, coffee maker - not very tea drinker friendly, whilst the wi-fi worked well. There is also a 'shop' by reception with essential items and some drinks and food for the  room microwave.  The breakfast is on the 2nd floor with dispensable plates etc. my wife has a gluten allergy and when she asked the staff what was gluten free it was basically the banana - I wonder whether the hotel needs to review its breakfast foods to offer more options for those with allergies. The hotel also has a pool, gym and a bar on the second floor where breakfast is served.  We used the hotel shuttle to the…

title: Great pre-cruise stay
review: Hello HughMc,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Central Location, Comfortable Accomodations
review: With a cruise booked out of Port Everglades we selected this very new hotel in rapidly changing Downtown Fort Lauderdale. Hotel shuttle picked us up at FLL Airport. It serves 2 Hamptons so we stopped at the other first to drop people. On arriving at this hotel, drive helped us with bags and we checked in. We got a room on the 2nd floor overlooking a street and in the distance the new Brightline passenger rail station. We could hear trains but not to the point of being bothersome. Room was clean and attractive with good TV and internet. Bed very comfortable. Room temperature was easily controlled. Elevator service was quick. Included breakfast served on 2nd floor. There were a good variety of items available. Hotel offered shuttle service to the Port for $8/person but we took…

title: Excellent pre/post-cruise choice in Ft. Lauderdale!

title: nice service
review: A fairly typical example of this Hilton brand, with an unusual for Hampton evening bar. Location is very convenient to business and government centers, to nightlife and cultural activities, and it's a short walk to the Brightline rail terminal. Staff is friendly and helpful with area suggestions.

title: Good enough for one night stay
review: We chose this hotel for two night stay because it is walking distance from Broward Performing Arts (Hamilton).  Valet parking for $20/day. Staff was very friendly. Lobby decor and space was adequate. Breakfast quality needs serious improvement.   Our room was spacious with 2 queen beds, clean  but layout is intended for one night stay: no drawers to unpack clothes, very limited closet space, nonfunctional room safe despite being reported to front desk staff.   The in room AC unit was extremely loud, even when setting fan speed to low.  We had to turn it completely off in order to sleep.  Even the I kept waking to adjacent room units kicking on throughout the nights. That was a major disappointment for a Hilton property.  I reported this to the front desk at check out. She did…

title: Great location but $20 for parking a day not included in hotel stay!!
review: My husband and I and our 16 year old son were travelling to Ft Lauderdale from Canada to take a cruise. Hampton Inn is where we stayed before and after the cruise. Hampton Inn was very nice and clean. The first room we stayed at was a King bed with pull out couch. A little dated but adequate. Our second room on way back, was 2 queen beds and was much nicer. Seemed newly renovated compared to first one. Our TV didn't work but George Johnson (Maintenance) was able to fix the problem for us. He was very friendly. The downtown location is okay but not very many restaurants in this area of town. The beds could be more comfortable, the breakfast was okay. Staff was great, little go bags for breakfast and cookies in the evening gave it a special touch. Not bad hotel but little…

title: Great Experience, George Johnson was the best
review: I picked this hotel because it is a Hilton chain and I liked the Hampton that I stayed in brickell a couple years back. The location downtown las olas was great! Only 4 min away from all the nice restaurants and bars. The only problem is that we were not informed there would be an adicional $20 a day for parking.

title: Quality Hotel near Airport/Hard Rock Stadium.
review: This was a nice stay at a quality hotel located in the Las Olas area. It is within a short drive to the airport. Also, short drive to the Hard Rock Stadium, the main reason why I chose this hotel. Loved all the local area restaurants in the Las Olas area.

title: Not one I would go back to...
review: Hello Global,   Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Will give it a miss in future
review: First off, let me say that I’ve never had much luck with other Hampton Inns - poorly trained staff, holes in bed linens, etc., so I was leery when the cruise line booked us in here for a one night stay.  The hotel was reasonably comfortable, but certainly not a luxury property.  Furniture seems to be the standard bland hotel furnishings, bathroom was simple and clean.  The only real complaint was that no matter what we did, the temperature in the room wouldn’t go above 65 degrees.  The hotel is in a business area of downtown with restaurants and shops about a 10 block walk away.  The hotel shuttle driver will take you if he has time, but getting back may be a problem.  Lobby area can be packed with people and check-in slow with large groups of cruise passengers.

title: Friendcation
review: Hello DWare,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us.   We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Nice Stay
review: One thing that is certain the staff were very friendly from the time we arrived until we left 5 stars for the staff The hotel in a prime location for Las Solas boulevard but that is all that is going for it. The rooms were clean, good air conditioning but very noisy. The safe in the room would not work took till the next morning for a guy to come and set it up for us Free breakfast but maybe I look for something more up market but to fight through everyone pushing and pulling then finding paper plates bowls cups plastic cutlery no not my idea of breakfast. So each to their own but this one not for me.  Guys sleeping rough in the underground garage next to the hotel Certainly will not be using this hotel again

title: Do not stay at this property
review: The rooms at this property were smelly and old. The bathroom was awful smelling and there was no working heat. We are Hilton honors members traveling with an elderly person and we expected Hilton to provide better service than what we experienced. Unacceptable.

title: Great Hotel, but Disappointed by Experience
review: Hello,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great post-checkout service
review: We stayed at this hotel before a cruise because it was included in the cruise package. When we checked in, we were told that there would be drinks on the second floor from 5 to 7 and that there was also food available - we were shown a price list for sandwiches, etc. We joined several others while the bartender poured glasses of wine and beer without any question of room number. Weren't we surprised when we got up to leave and were presented with a bill of $32! The bartender said many people were shocked when they found out that it wasn't "hospitality" but a paid bar. Disappointing experience when otherwise it was a very nice hotel.

title: Convenient to the Brightline and walkable to downtown
review: Hi SuzeQ,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Excellent Service
review: After checking out and driving all the way back home (4 hours drive) I discovered that I had left clothes in the hotel room closet. I did not have cash on my when I left the hotel so I was unable to leave a tip for the housekeeping staff. I figured that I would pay dearly for that oversight by never being able to see my clothing again. I called the hotel a couple times over the next few days and no sign of the clothes so I figured housekeeping had indeed gotten their revenge. Almost a week later I thought I'd give it one last try and called the hotel. To my delight, Tammy checked and said my clothes were safe in their Lost and Found. Kelly packed them up ready for shipping back to me and printed out the UPS label that I sent her to put on the package. Thanks to the team for…

title: Great Spot for Pre or Post Cruise
review: Arrived at the Hampton Inn early morning and we were able to check in right away to our delight. The room was large and clean and had a refrigerator, microwave and safe. The hotel offers a complimentary shuttle to and from the Fort Lauderdale airport.  .  The hotel offers complimentary breakfast in the morning and offers a nice selection of food e.g. make your own waffles, fruit, yogurt, sausage, bacon, dry cereals, bagels, cream cheese, jams, bread, muffins etc. The other surprise is that they change up the egg offering for the two days we were there.  The breakfast is on the second floor as well as an evening bar and light dinner offerings.  The pool (outdoor) is also located off of the second floor and was quite relaxing with a number of lounges available and some shaded…

title: Good Location and value.

title: Awesome Hotel!
review: This hotel is located in a good location downtown, only blocks from Los Olas.  (There are homeless people sleeping across the street by a civic building but they do not bother anyone) The rooms are clean and a good size.  The service was excellent.  The free breakfast is also very good.  I would recommend this hotel.  There is valet parking that with the tips can add up.

title: Popular Despite Drawbacks
review: Hi Allan,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Helpful friendly staff.
review: We stayed here the night before our cruise out of Ft. Lauderdale.  The hotel picked us up at the airport for free the night before our cruise and the wait at the airport was not long at all, I believe we waited maybe 15 minutes.  The next day they drove us to the cruise terminal for a minimal fee. Then when our cruise returned, they picked us back up the cruise terminal and drove us back to the airport!  Everyone was extremely friendly and welcoming from the time you arrived till the time you left.  The rooms were extremely clean and the beds were very comfy.  This is a newer, modern hotel.  We didn't look around the area for things to do because our purpose was to find a hotel the night before our cruise.  The breakfast was good and there was coffee whenever you wanted it. …

title: Good location! Helpful staff!!
review: Great location close to downtown bars and clubs! 10-20 minutes from the water front A1A.. restaurants and a free shuttle to the airport and within 1 mile of hotel... free breakfast. Clean and friendly housekeeping staff as well!

review: Typical downtown older hotel. Strange odor in the room. Seemed clean, but shabby altho may have just been renovated. Neighborhood a bit scary at night - use valet parking at hotel. Won’t return to this hotel.

title: Very average.
review: Decent hotel. Says "downtown" but it's not within walking distance of any restaurants. The bar literally just has bar food, and not much of that. The "free" breakfast is okay, but I've had better. The price was way too high for what we got. I would have been okay with paying $150 - $175 a night, but this was almost $300.

review: Hotel was selected for its proximity to downtown and nearby meeting location.  Room I reserved and utilized was a single with King bed.  Room and bathroom was clean and spacious.  Female receptionist check-in person was a little frosty and unfriendly.

title: Only if you need convenient downtown location.

title: Roaches and noise in the room
review: Check in was perfect. During breakfast found mold on the bread for 2 days. Staff hasn't able to solve problems with safe inside the room. During check out staff could not accept gift card I had neither switch credit card for payment.

title: Jose A. was a great driver
review: Jose was very professional and courteous as well as a safe driver. He graciously took us to several spots we needed for personal items. Jose always arranged the perfect spot to meet and was perfectly punctual.   What a lucky find!!  Thank you.

title: I'm impressed
review: Dear GMG613,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Awesome experience
review: Hotel was clean, close to the airport and convenient to everything. Jose was the most professional shuttle driver a hotel can hire. I've been traveling my whole life so that says anything. Oh I forgot to mention the breakfast was complimentary from 6-10am

title: Great customer service!
review: Hi Blake,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Hotel Stay
review: Stayed for a business trip.  Great hotel and even better staff!  George Johnson was very helpful and one of the nicest guys you can meet! Made my day and trip! They held my bags after check-out and even had a free shuttle to the airport!

title: Good stay
review: The hotel was clean, well maintained and a nice staff.  The best part of our stay was dealing with shuttle driver Jose he did an outstanding job-friendly, welcoming, efficient. The downside of our stay was no restaurants in walking for dinner. And shower in our room only got warm never hot!!

title: Watch out
review: The hotel is situated 0.5/1.0 miles from the centre of Los Altos in a dangerous area with people sleeping on the streets and a tented site of down and outs nearby.These people try to get in for a free breakfast we were told by the hotels taxi service.Food offering was poor and breakfast rang ou of many items.General areas could do with a good cleanHowever rooms were good and cleaned well

title: Stayed here for a business trip.  Big regret!! Dirty hotel, rude staff and restaurant food poor quality.
review: Hello dochatfield,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Nice Hotel
review: Stayed here for a business trip.  Big regret!! Dirty hotel, incorrect room, rude staff and restaurant food poor quality.  Tried to speak with a manager about my reservation (they gave me the wrong type of room) but never called back and was told they were sold out and could not help.  When ask "why" I didn't have the correct room, they told me they could not track my reservation.

title: Trip
review: Hello PhilR1755,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect.  We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Good but you'll be paying for parking.
review: The hotel had a beautiful view and the room was clean. I found it completely unnecessary to have mandatory valet parking...a $20 charge. The attendants were friendly but I really didn't want to pay for someone to drive my vehicle 40 yards to a parking place. The $20 certainly didn't destroy my trip but it felt manipulative.

title: Great find for FLL
review: Dear Freedom,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Best Breakfast Experience Ever
review: Stayed at other Properties in Fort Lauderdale that are tired and worn - this property is not and is great this one is close to the new rail road but convenient for downtown and offers clean well appointed rooms, great service and friendly staff.  Free shuttle to the airport but only runs once an hour so plan accordingly. It’s only 15 min away tho’

title: Staff
review: Hi Dr Nic1,   Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great breakfast service
review: We arrived after the complimentary breakfast was closed but a very nice young man said to come right in. One we were inside George Johnson waited on us with no haste. He should be the manager of the hotel. He was fantastic.

title: Boat Show visit
review: George Johnson was so helpful and friendly. Great experience and delicious breakfast! This whole area seems to be redeveloping and really upscale. The hotel here is already very modern and hip. Close to everything.

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: Dear Tom,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Breakfast Service
review: George Johnson was great!  He was very kind and helpful to our family.  He's an employee worth hanging on too! The breakfast was great and the area was very clean.  Enjoyed our stay. Would stay here again.

title: The shuttle drivers.
review: Hi Kim P,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Wonderful location for our Ladies' Conference
review: George Johnson gave my husband and myself superior service at the breakfast. His friendly presence was much appreciated! He does his job well!  The area is spotless. Would stay here again just for his smile.

title: Close to performing arts center
review: Friendly, helpful staff; clean rooms; a decent value.  I appreciated the convenience to the Broward County Performing Arts Center.  The immediate neighborhood is not desirable, but the convenient location made it worthwhile.

title: Great Service
review: Hi Tssmyth,   Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Breakfast with a Smile
review: I was here for a month for a required training. The service was excellent the breakfast amazing the staff friendly and care about the guest!! Keep and eye out for George Johnson, he is going to take great care of you in the hotel! Bruce, Tristian, and Manny are awesome shuttle drivers and safety is there #1 priority!! STAY HERE ITS WORTH IT!

title: Breakfast
review: Hi Jamye,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Excellent services, rooms were cleaned everyday without my request.
review: While at breakfast with my family, a very nice gentleman named George Johnson said hi, asked us how we were, and gave us free water bottles! It was really nice that a stranger would be so kind, not only to my family, but to the other people at breakfast too. It really put a smile on our faces :D

title: Wonderful Employee
review: I recently hosted an event at the hotel.  The saleswomen were very accommodating to work with my budget and time constraints - both Norma and Maria.  Additionally the day of I had forgotten a few things I needed and George Johnson, an employee at the hotel was super helpful and happy to help.  He is the type of employee I would want working for me and representing my company!

title: New Policy.
review: Hi Kelly D,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Presenter of a two day seminar for AMTA members
review: Always our go to location when cruising. All stars gets us where we need to go.  Our driver Tristan was excellent.   At the end of our cruise we went to check luggage and were informed of new policy.  They no longer check bags to accommodate cruise travelers unless they stayed the previous evening.  The manager did accommodate us this time (thank you).  Unfortunately,  we won't be staying there any longer because we need a place for our luggage to rest while we walk about.

title: Mr.David Gronowicz went bound reach to help me out on my first day in USA.
review: Hi Patotraveling,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Disappointed
review: Staff has gone out of the way to please and accommodate . Maria Vernengo was extremely helpful to make my workshop a total success and also George Johnson went out of his way to attend to all my needs in setting up the room. He did a great job.   Today is my set up day and my experience was great.  Thank you.

title: One nighter getaway
review: Rooms were clean and comfyBar was good for a drinks, and watching some football, but not so much for ordering off of their food menu. Pool was good and clean, lounge chairs were uncomfortable,  they were hard and plastic but the lounge chair and table area seating was cushioned and nice.

title: Very Friendly Staff
review: Hi Swetee30,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Nice Hotel
review: The staff was very friendly and polite. Our visit started with Tristan picking us up from the airport. He was very polite and helpful with our bags.  The staff working the breakfast area were also very polite and friendly. Overall, we enjoyed our stay. The proximity to the airport was perfect. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Anniversary
review: Hi Osyria,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.:

title: beautiful accommodations and excellent service
review: Checked in late for this hotel with no problems, flight had been delayed. Drove to hotel and availed of valet parking service at hotel ($20 per day). Bedroom facilities were fine and air conditioning was good. Breakfast was good, eggs and bacon and plenty of others to choose from. Las Olas shops are nearby as is the bus terminal. Would recommend.

title: Convenient
review: Shuttle service from the airport was prompt. Shuttle to Port Everglades was prompt, reasonably priced, and very convenient. The hotel is nice. Exactly what you would expect from Hampton Inn. Overall, it was extremely easy to access both in and out.

title: Very clean, Great Shuttle Service!
review: Hi mcbyellow,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Hotel review
review: The Shuttle service was great! Tristan our driver was super informative. He told us about shuttle service to and from the cruise. The service to the water taxi, where to eat and service was offered to a strip of restautants. He handled our luggage and was particularly good will an elderly gentleman who needed assistance with a walker. The hotel is a good location. The rooms are a good size very clean. They had cookies not chocolate and snacks...muff said!

title: Comfortable stay...
review: Hi Sunshine633981,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown.  We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and that we were able to exceed all your expectations. It was a pleasure to host your stay in Fort Lauderdale. Please come back soon!

title: Mr. and Mrs. Steve Newell
review: My hotel stay was great,shuttle service and location was great for restaurants and shopping, and the breakfast service was great. Thanks to Sly for his friendly and helpful check in and check out process.

title: Successful family event
review: Hosted my grandmother's 88th birthday party and this location had not only the accomodations (meeting room for 50) but the staff was exceptionally nice and courteous.  I highly recommend this location for family functions.

title: Spotless, friendly
review: Hi Shangoodjack,   Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to hear your grandmother's party was a huge success & that we were able to share this beautiful moment with your family.  We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Outstanding Service and Staff
review: Brief one night stay as part of a cruise holiday. After awful service at another hotel in the vicinity by the same umbrella company we were pleasantly suprised. Reception staff arranged early check in for us, concierge could not do enough to help. Bed was huge with big fluffy pillows, and most importantly it was spotlessly clean! Self service buffet breakfast, small but ample. Lovely clean pool too.

title: Good Customer Service
review: Hi Gemma,   Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Great place to stay.  Will be back.
review: I would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends.  Parking is right there which the hotel staff took care of.  Sleeping accommodations were super.  The continental breakfast provided many choices and the staff was very friendly.  George Johnson greeted each and every visitor.

title: Up and Coming Neighborhood
review: I recently moved from Orlando to Ft.Lauderdale, about 45-50 days ago. I'm in search of a new place to live, because my job is located in Hollywood, FL, which is about 12 miles, south of this location. The Front Desk team was so exceptionally kind and always accomodating, because I can be a bit much during my stay, which was 8 nights.  The nights were not chosen until the next day and Aida, at the Front Desk in the mornings, would always ask if I were extending and if so, she could pre-assign my new room. She has an amazing smile and you'll see that when you stay at this location. Love that.In the evening time before going out or working, I would get to chat with Sly, another Front Desk agent, who helped me with directions  to a few places in the area as well as just a good ear. …

title: Thank you George and Marie
review: Hi StormShadow,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great Hotel 4 Miles from Airport
review: The Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale/Downtown Hampton Inn is a wonderful Hotel. It is located in the heart of Downtown Fort Lauderdale, FL with many activities to engage in while visiting the area. Also, the staff is very friendly, professional, helpful and they went above and beyond the call of duty to make sure our stay was almost perfect. The two employees that impressed me the most are: George and Marie during breakfast. Marie, whom was working alone at first, was Magnificant. She single handedly cooked the food, set up the breakfast area and made delicious hot coffee and waffles for me. Then George came along to make it all an even better expeirence. George was very Charming, a great conversationalist as he multi-tasked in keeping the dining area spotless. Thanks to Marie and…

title: Lester
review: Hi Tracy,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: Great hotel in a not great neighborhood
review: Stayed here before leaving for trip out of Ft. Lauderdale Airport. Took the shuttle from the hotel to a cool Mexican Tequila Bar called Rocco’s Tacos. Great Hampton Inn. Better than most. Perfect place.

title: World Class Customer Service!
review: I have been a guest here one week per month for close to 2 years.  The staff is always polite, smiling and goes out of their way to make you feel comfortable and at home.  Aida, David, Sly and the rest of the gang at the front desk could not possibly be more accommodating.  My room is always comfortable and clean.   Lester and the entire breakfast crew remembered my meal preferences from the very first day that I stayed with them- always making sure my needs are met.  They always greet me with a large smile and take interest in making sure that I am happy and have everything that I need and want.  They always seem to be happy which makes it a pleasant place to stay.  I feel like I am coming home to spend time with friends when I stay at this location - always greeted with a…

title: Needs a little work
review: Hi With GratitudeAlways,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: The hotel is wonderful except Tim (Front Desk Agent)
review: This hotel has a little work to do but my stay was adequate. The front desk staff, valet staff, and the breakfast crew are all five stars hands down. My issue is with the cleanliness and maintenance of the rooms. First night I noticed the toilet looked like it had not been cleaned in several days. I was tired from the drive in and decided to wait until morning to request a thorough cleaning. Morning came went to get in the shower there was dirt all down the side of the you and hair on the walls. I used the bar soap to wash my hands placed on the counter because the holder was gross picked it up later to discover about 15 tiny black hairs I assume were from the person prior shaving. Before heading down to the front desk I used the restroom and you guessed it it's stopped up! Lady…

title: Christina is the best
review: Hi Leatha219,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Transportation
review: Literally everyone here is so kind and has the hospitality gene. From Aida, Andrew & Sly at the front desk, to the ladies at the breakfast bar, the housekeepers & housemen to even valet. Unfortunately, I can not say the samething from Tim, he is not very kind, he not very approachable and he definitely does not seem like his heart or passion in serving others is in it. I would have given you a 5 star rating, but sadly he kind of ruined it with his attitude and behavior. I do advise that you speak with him, mentor him, so he can end up being a stellar Front Desk Agent like all of the rest of the Front Desk team. Thank you for a wonderful stay, I can not wait to come back!

title: Great experience
review: Very good service from all staff. Great place. Very clean. Great experience. George Johnson especially went above and beyond to give us an incredible stay, he is a wonderful staff member. His dedication to this institution is truly admirable.

title: Great night's sleep
review: Deat Latndndj,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Breakfast better than home!
review: My husband and I have stayed at this hotel before. We love the location. The bed is so comfortable - we had the best night's sleep. The complimentary breakfast is full of delicious options - more than just the usual cold continental offerings.  You can't go wrong here.

title: Quick getaway
review: Dear Leigh,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Loved this Property!
review: Trip to take my granddaughter to new apartment and college. Hotel made a personally stressful time for me much less stressful. Comfortable, great staff and food. Slept like a baby every night and looked forward to breakfast every day!

title: Great staff!
review: We stayed here for one night prior to a cruise with a large group. Everything was great. My husband and I and our two kids, ages 1 and 7 arrived at the airport late around 9:30 pm. We called the hotel and were able to get the free shuttle. It was a little confusing as to where to meet the driver, we actually got in the wrong van at first and had to unpack everything and wait for the correct one. The driver apologized for the confusion and was very kind, getting us to the hotel quickly.   The beds were comfortable, but the room felt a little muggy, even with the air conditioning running.   We had breakfast the morning of our cruise and everyone enjoyed the food. It was very good with a large selection. The staff were all very kind, we especially enjoyed talking to George Johnson,…

title: Great staff
review: Dear Cat,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Good for business
review: George, the greeter, is awesome.  He went out of his way to make our stay as enjoyable as possible.  The location is very convenient for the restaurants in the area and going to the Performing Arts Center.

title: Horrible visit
review: Dear Errolcidenberg,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: BK
review: The hotel is nice and in a great location for business. Lots of restaurants nearby for lunch and dinner meetings. The staff is helpful but make sure you have all you confirmation information as twice now I have been told I had no reservation when I did.

title: 90th BD Celebrations but we chose the wrong hotel
review: Having travelled all day, we arrived around 10PM.  Despite the lobby & front desk being fairly quiet we found the ‘reception’ poor and not particularly helpful. Too many assumptions were made regarding our knowledge about the hotel. Perhaps because we had a Hilton Honours Acct#. We both heard mention of the 2nd floor several times. Apparently the hotel bar was open until 11PM. We had to ask about Breakfast hours for the AM.  We headed up the elevator to the 2nd flr, only to find that we were likely on the 5th flr based upon our Rm# No water glasses in our room, no bath mat and the plumbing consisted of a 4 flush toilet.  The room safe req’d some “Safe Mag Strip” in order to set a password. We had not been advised of this on checkin and & no Mag Strip Card had been provided with…

title: Poor start fully redeemed
review: Hello Gord,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Not satisfy
review: Chosen partly because of the free airport shuttle, we were forced to wait 90 minutes for this service, despite calling twice and being told 10 minutes away! Clearly not true on either occasion.   The driver was very apologetic and explained the first vehicle had suffered a flat tyre. A shame the dispatcher didn't tell us that.  However, with a heavily discounted return trip to the beachfront and free drinks in the bar, we were happy with the outcome. Service is often best demonstrated by the manner in which complaints are dealt with rather than when all goes well. Full marks to the staff on this occasion.   Well appointed rooms and a fair breakfast included. The scrambled eggs were better than we "enjoyed" at the last Hampton Inn we stayed at.

title: Great Stay!!!!
review: Hello 1957Steve,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Airport shuttle near Las Olas
review: Not satisfied with couple things mostly the parking fees and the bed. I stay there for 4 night I have to sleep in the recliner that they have in the room. The bed is so uncomfortable it give me back pain the whole time. I took some days off to relax myself it turn out a night mare because I didn't sleep well. My significant other not please at all either.

title: Family Reunion
review: Very nice staff... Kelly and Sylvester were extremely helpful! The breakfast was very good and our room was very comfortable! I would recommend and stay here again. It’s very convenient and accessible to downtown and Las Olas....

title: Do Not Stay Here!
review: Hi Loloshortstuff,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Bad service
review: Sheets and pillows were clearly not changed: visible dirt, hair, and grease. When I went to the front desk to ask them to send up extra pillows to our room, they phoned to housekeeping, but housekeeping never brought them to us. My wife and I slept the night on top of the sheets and with no pillows. On top off this, the street the hotel is on is very dangerous with gang activity. DO NOT STAY HERE!

title: 4 star service and hospitality!
review: Hello sjnast,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. I sincerely apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect.  We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Stayed one night before flying to Aruba
review: I stay in the hotel week of 4th July housekeeping (for 5 days) clean my but one time .Front desk said they only change sheets every 3 days ,didn't vacume the floor it look bad.the bathroom was not clean, they give no towels for the next very bad service

title: Best anniversary ever
review: My girlfriend and I stayed here the weekend of our 4 year anniversary. First off, the staff is great, tim is the man. He provided us a map and marked all the parts of the city to visit. He was well versed in the culture surrounding the hotel.   The free shuttle was also great for getting us to and from all the places worth going. After a long day it was nice knowing we would have someone pick us up in an unfamiliar area.   The hotel was the epicenter for the nightlife and was a minute's walk from fat village art district. Its also moments away from the start of las olas which means if you're up for the walk, you'll experience all that las olas and ft Lauderdale has to offer.  All in all great trip, had a great tiime and would recommend it to anyone.

title: WILL NOT STAY THERE AGAIN
review: Hi Durgin08,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: overall, nice experience
review: From my first experience on the phone with reservation to my un-returned call from the General manager to my shuttle service to my not being able to have late check out and to my rude check out...  BAD experience throughout, I would not refer this hotel to my worst enemy................ And then when I tried to explain my experience to the GM, he said he didn't return my call because he was on vacation until Sunday.  It was Wed morning by then.  .............
