title: Ordinary Business Trip
review: Hello BenatdJ,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We certainly apologize if your stay with us was anything less than perfect.    We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Las Olas
review: Room was comfortable and clean, breakfast had variety, exercise room small, but had several machines in good working condition, shuttle service was extremely helpful.  Tristen got us to the airport in no time at all, despite all the traffic at 6 am!  Also, pool was a nice respite from the heat!

title: What a gem!!
review: Fantastic stay at this Hampton Inn.  Service was excellent.  Everyone was so helpful.  Room was delightful.  A/C worked very well.  The room was clean and fresh.  Coffee was great in the morning.  So convenient to the Broward Theater and the Brightline Depot.  Highly recommend staying here.

title: Value for money
review: Hi Sheboze,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Pleasant
review: Everyone was helpful and friendly at this location. Rooms were clean, breakfast was tasty and good service. Pick up and drop off by Airport Shuttle was punctual and Tristan was very helpful in terms of assisting with terminal location and offloading of luggage.

title: Friendly
review: Hello Miche868,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: What a find!
review: Pleasant stay- our flight was cancelled last minute so we called the hotel to see if we could book another night- they told us they had nothing available. Next thing you know Rudolph came through to help us and he was so accommodating to anything and everything we Asked for! Thank you for being you Rudolph! This world needs more people like you in it!

title: One of the finest Hamptons I've experienced
review: While the fittings are still that of a Hampton Inn, it could be mistaken for a more expensive hotel chain. The rooms are spacious and clean, the bathrooms, modern. That said, there an odd sliding barn door that either covers the closet or slides over to act as the bathroom door. The shower drained slowly, but otherwise, it was an extremely well-run, clean Hampton Inn with an incredibly friendly staff. If you drive there, note that there is secure 24-hour valet parking, and that it costs extra. Also, while close to Las Ola, it's a 4-5 block walk, and even then you're at the western end by the Art Museum. You can't walk to the beach, but its a short ride there, and the hotel pool may suffice as a substitute, even if City Hall workers can gaze at you from their window. The Galleria…

title: Overpriced
review: Hi Lawrence,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Trip to Florida
review: Not worth $500 for 3 days. You’ll do better at Holiday Inn. Staff is nonchalant. Pool is small. Breakfast is minimal and valet is required for $20 a day! Just pick another hotel. Save your money and pick a nicer hotel.

title: Great stay except $20 nightly parking
review: Hello Monchaily,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Great hotel and staff not a great location
review: We were passing through on our way to the Keys. The hotel was very clean and the staff was friendly. The valet attendants were phenomenal. They were very friendly and extremely helpful in directing us to a great restaurant! I would stay here again.

title: Stayed overnight before our cruise......
review: Got picked up from the airport and brought to the hotel to check in.  If you have the mobile app, you are able to check into a room (which you can also select) prior to arrival.  Since we arrived before official check-in, we were not able to get a room because they had not been cleaned yet.  However, they cleaned a room and it was ready within an hour.  Front desk staff was helpful and courteous.  There was a nice setup for breakfast, and it was appetizing as well.  The value is definitely worth the price paid!

title: Overnight before cruise
review: Hi Geronimo1911,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Yet again a great vacation
review: Clean hotel.  Nice rooms.  Free breakfast.  Easy to airport and cruise terminal. Friendly staff.  Location was not within walking distance but shuttle offered lots of options.  Stayed on way back too.  Would book again!

title: Great Driver with wonderful customer service.
review: Hi Mellylou02,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Great transportation services
review: I just love this hotel! My daughter and I have been staying here since last year and we are hooked!!! This trip was the very first time me met the manager Alan and he is very great! He went out of his way to make sure we were comfortable. D and Lester in the restaurant area are friendly and very accommodating! We just felt at home and this will forever be our spot in FLL!!! I can't forget Aida and Kelly who were very helpful with all the questions that I had about the area. The hotel is very clean and everyone has a positive attitude. Love Love Love the Hampton inn downtown!!!

title: One Night Stay
review: I was able to check in early with no problems. They only have valet parking at $20 a day. I’m not sure how I missed that detail. It was fine though. I left to early to speak on the breakfast. There was a shuttle available but I didn’t use it

title: Business stay
review: Hi Cassie P,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Really Nice Hotel!
review: Place is close to downtown, although breakfast is included , options are limited, good enough though. would definitely recommend it. there is a restaurant close by called Top hat within walking distance, great food ..!!!

title: Bad customer service!!!
review: Hi VJV,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. Top Hat is awesome!  Right!?!  We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Nice hotel, ended up staying twice!
review: It was over Memorial Weekend when I stayed here.  While it was all rainy due to the storm, my three-night stay was really nice.  Hotel itself was in very good shape:  rooms wer clean and updated (must have been recently renovated) and fitness center was well-equipped.  Location was excellent for my purpose:  not beachfront, but very close to restaurants (O-B House, Foxy Brown, and other Las Olas eateries); walking distance to a Publix; trolley stop is nearby; free 10-minute shuttle to/from airport.  Amenities were great:  complimentary breakfast (alternating menu items) and free wireless internet access.  Staff was very friendly and helpful:  Tami, Aida, Tim, and Aaron.  Special mention to Tristan, the very courteous shuttle driver.  Awesome guy!  Look for him when you stay…

title: Nice Choice
review: Was skeptical to choose this hotel because of previous review...However, this was a wonderful, clean hotel...with great location. Nice accommodations included. Would definitely stay here again if traveling area, side note, call hotel day of (after arrival) to make arrangement for airport shuttle pick up!

title: Front desk price did not match online...
review: Hi Pabaakaghea,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Amazing Stay
review: I was unexpectedly held in Ft. Lauderdale for an extra night due to a tropical storm. As a walk in I asked the front desk clerk if her rates would match online, or should i go sit in the lobby and book online. She told me her rates match online, so i booked at the front desk. Later that night i checked the online price and realized that the front desk charged ne almost $30 more than the online price. I brought thus issue to the attention of Tammi at the front desk in the morning and was told, "oh well you learn something new everyday." My business advice, never trust the front desk at the hampton inn to "match" their online price. Always use a third party reservation site." That way at least you will have a customer service agent who  care abouy inproper billing practices.

title: Pleasant Stay
review: Hello eacroce666,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale

title: surprised
review: Amazing Stay at Hampton Inn! Friendly and accommodating staff and clean room.  I want to give a personal shout out to ALL STARS Transportation driver, Mr. Rudolph whom was extremely nice With great interpersonal skills!

title: Transportation to Airport
review: Tristan was great. Professional driver. Tristan was very professional and treated customers right. Observed the speed limit and was cognizant of bumps.  The wait was around 45 minutes till pick up. So long wait.

title: nice hotel and food, not so great welcome
review: Hi Jeff,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Would return
review: I checked in for one night at this hotel.  Tim was the tall guy who checked me in.  He didn't say anything about being a Hilton honors member.  This is my third Hilton in 3 days, so I had gotten used to hearing that.  He didn't tell me if there was a pool,  just about breakfast and let me choose a high or low floor. I did appreciate getting checked in officially early around 11 or 12.   The room and hotel was nice,  new and modern. You drive through a bit of a rough looking area on the way there,  but this block looked to be fine. The valet was nice,  too. Breakfast was very good as usual. I liked everything about this hotel except the lack of a welcoming check in.

title: Great
review: Hi Gringatx,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Great hotel
review: We found this hotel to be very clean, the staff was very helpful and friendly, and the location great as it was within walking distance of the Performing Arts Center.  Would return should we go back to Ft Lauderdale.

title: Ok
review: Hotel was super clean, pool area was small but ok.  Food at bar was less than desirable and over priced.  Free breakfast was doable.  Area is NOT good for walking anywhere, but the shuttle service was GREAT!  They gave you ideas where to go and were very accommodating for pick ups and drop off, airport and cruise takes priority which is understandable.  Service was free as long as you stayed within a certain area.

title: Delivers the Best!
review: Hi Ragses,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Work trip
review: We wanted for nothing during our stay! Complimentary hot beverages, wonderful breakfast...a little different every day! Spotless room with the best pillows! The staff was so helpful and courteous, we felt welcome and appreciated

title: Probably not this property again
review: Hi Pygmypalace,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review regarding your recent stay with us.  We certainly value your opinion and appreciate the nice comments & feedback regarding our staff.  We look forward to your next visit with us again!

title: Great value/Great Service
review: Was in town or business and had the pleasure of dealing with your courtesy van driver Mr. Rudolph. He was friendly and helpful getting me to and from the Las Olas area. After a long day it was much appreciated

title: Homeless shelter
review: If you don’t mind the homeless sleeping in And abandon building right next-door than this might be the place for you. At least security has taken measures to keep them out of the building and off your floor but there is no getting out and walking around in this neighborhood.

title: Ideal overnight stay
review: The hotel does what it says: comfortable bed, excellent hot breakfast (included) and good location. I also enjoyed a light dinner in the bar. I didn’t use the pool but it looked nice.  The free shuttle to the airport worked well (thanks, Tristan). It goes hourly on the hour.  Recommended.

title: Good location to the River Walk area and Las Olas Blvd
review: Was there for a three night stay. Reasonable rates, accommodating staff, and quick walk to the River Walk. Clean and comfortable.Shuttle service a BIG plus- 15 minutes to Fort Lauderdale - Hollywood Airport. Tristan our driver was terrific.

title: Great service
review: Hotel was clean and pretty inside. The Valet staff was very helpful and friendly! There is not an option for Self Parking at the hotel, so you must Valet for $20 per day. Check in was quick and easy. We called on the way to the hotel to try and check in early,  but our room wasn't ready yet. The front desk called as soon as the room was available.  The front desk staff was friendly. The lobby was small but nicely decorated and clean. We stayed on the 10th floor with a view if the streets.  Not the best view, but it's part of staying in the city. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable.  There was a microwave and a mini fridge in the room. The pool was in the 2nd floor. We went later in the afternoon and there was no towels available and the water seemed a little cloudy.…

title: Great night.
review: Good location. Rooms are clean and very comfy. Staff very nice and helpful. Breakfast was served. Walking distance to stores and restaurant in the downtown area. Nice location. Nice hotel. Hilton rules.

title: Nasty Place!!!
review: The hotel staff was rude when we checked in and they barely spoke. I took this picture of my socks that were white when I put them on after an hour walking in the room they were this nasty. The halls needed to be vacuumed and the whole place had a very bad smell. Gross gross gross!

title: Family trip
review: Tristan not only drove us to the hotel, he also provided us a great deal of information about the local area.  Hotel was clean, staff was very helpful. Hotel is in a very good location.   Price was within range.

title: Don't waste your money
review: I have stayed in 100's of hotels - from tiny towns to major metro areas and this is by far the worst experience I have ever had. The hotel staff is beyond inept! It was chosen on the recommendation of our travel agent before a cruise. For its location to dining. BEWARE if you have any type of allergies of the obnoxious, over-powering room air freshener they use after cleaning. If they cleaned properly you would not need to freshen the air. Front desk suggestion was to leave the room door open to air out the smell (huh!)  There is not enough room to list the nightmares - don't waste your money  left after one miserable night. Best hotel amenity was the out sourced shuttle service driver - great guy, personable and very helpful!

title: A bare bones minimum stay
review: Dear MChristineB  We are sorry we were not able to provide you with a better quality of service. This is not typical of our usual Hamptonality and welcoming staff, and we are always looking for ways to improve our customer experience. We try hard to make sure all of our guests have a great stay as we are all about Satisfaction Guaranteed. Thank you for your feedback and we hope you will come back and stay with us again.					  Thank you, Miri L.

title: Cruise stay
review: The Hampton Inn/Las Olas (HI/LO) was selected by us at the suggestion of our tour agency, Pearl Seas Cruise, as we booked HI/LO primarily for the use of the hotel's shuttle service to/from the Airport and the Port Everglade Harbor for embarkation and disembarkation. We stayed 1 day before and after our cruise to Cuba.     HI/LO is an average business type hotel in a fairly good location to the bubbling Las Olas area...but, offers bare bones minimums. There is no restaurant, so it's best to venture out into the local area for some nice dining.  There is a small bar and a basically limited menu of food...Not Great and Not Good. Breakfast is buffet, serve yourself and you can expect plastic & paper service. Again, food not that good.    Rooms were spacious, clean and with a view…

title: Use your nose
review: I have stayed here for years, this is the first bad experience, my room smelled like urine! Room service came in and sprayed deodorizer all over the floor, to the point it was slick.  I had to prop the room door open with a towel to get fresh air into my room so I could sort of sleep.

title: Great Visit
review: We stayed there for Tortuga. Super close to Las Olas and everything they had to offer. Our driver from and to the airport were great. Super helpful with our luggage and making sure they were there for us when we were ready

title: Stop over before Cruise
review: A one night stop over before joining a cruise. Picked from an Internet web site. Nice hotel & rooms but very basic. No drawers to put anything if you were staying a few days. Breakfast choices quite poor by American standards & hot items barely warm. Like the location close to Los Olas & fit for our overnight purpose, but wouldn’t recommend as a holiday destination hotel.

title: Great Location
review: Dear ritaanneae,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and are very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us. Your feedback helps us improve. Thank you once again for your comments.

title: One night post-cruise
review: The location and service was great. I enjoyed staying. It's quite a bit of a walkable distance to Las Olas Blvd main strip but it definitely can be done. There is a deli straight done the road that serves great food. The other thing that I liked was that they have a complimentary shuttle to and from the airport.

title: Phia - NY
review: Love love this location. Would definitely visit again once I arrive through fort Lauderdale airport. Staff was pleasant and the location was good for me. Rooms was well clean and bed was comfortable. Oh the breakfast was good along with the staff that morning. Great stay!

title: Breakfast, quiet, lots of service & shuttle
review: Great place to stay. Free breakfast, coffe all day, quiet all over and Tristan, the shuttle driver is timely and helpful.   The pool is nice and hidden from outside sight on lvl 2, laundry room as well.   Walking distance to lots of restaurants and markets

title: Cruise - Bon Voyage Package
review: Room was clean. Hallway smelled of marijuana though it was Spring Break. Breakfast was good. Shuttle to cruise was good, shuttle back was messed up and confusing. Aida fixed it for us. I’d recommend staying here for cruises though the return driver on All Star transportation was very rude.

title: Shuttle
review: Thanks Tristan for informing me that they have a new free shuttle service - All Stars Tours & Transportation. Great customer service!  Nice hotel...clean and usually pretty quiet. Convenient to downtown and short drive to beach.

title: Awesome shuttle service!  Clean!  Inviting!  Like home!
review: Tristan (one of the excellent shuttle drivers) picked me up from Publix today within seconds of my calling the Hotel for the complimentary shuttle service (w/ in one mile radius of hotel).  The breakfast is awesome, just make sure you get down there early! ;) Laundry room works great... $2 to wash... $2 to dry... The little hotel market sells lots of yummy treats... Great business center, gym, pool, and a really cute mini restaurant/bar area that operates at night.  Free Internet.  Rooms are newly remodeled w/ contemporary decor and comfy beds/towels.  Highly recommended!!!

title: Would stay again
review: From the Valet to checking in everyone was very nice and helpful, beautiful clean hotel, you need your room key to get up to floors-every hotel should have that, breakfast is the usual fare but good, clean areas, staff was friendly, one of the best Hampton Inns I’ve stayed at and I’ve been to a few

title: Very Clean and Convenient Location
review: This hotel was very nice and everything is renovated so I had no issues with the hotels appearance. I would definitely recommend this hotel because they provide complimentary shuttle service to the airport and several convenient areas. Great location!

title: Good room, great breakfast
review: I work in downtown Ft. Lauderdale frequently, and was looking into a new hotel to stay at that would be cheaper. This one was a great business stay. The room was pretty standard, the bed was comfy, breakfast was really good. Wish they had a hot tub, and I did have some temp issues with the room, but nothing too bad. Overall I'd give it an 8.5 out of 10.

title: Great service & love the renovations
review: Had a fantastic experience at this newly remodeled Hampton Inn.  Great service with friendly smiles all throughout my stay.  Breakfast was great and housekeeping also did a great job.   Didn't need a car, being so close to downtown and restaurants.  Will definitely return to this hotel in the future.

title: Pre cruise one night stay
review: Friendly efficient staff. Easy access to cruiseport. Nice variety of self serve breakfast included in price. Not a great walking neighborhood however hotel shuttle will take you at no charge to restaurant or stores.

title: BED BUGS!
review: I would NOT recommend people staying here. My colleagues' room on the 9th floor was infested with bed bugs. Live photos of them crawling across the sheets! After reporting the incident to local authorities, staff at the front desk could only offer a comped night or a free night stay at another Hampton Inn. Who would want to stay at another Hampton Inn after experiencing that?!? There were zero attempts made by staff to express sympathy or even really apologize. Staff were very unprofessional. I can honestly bet the room was rebooked the following night and nothing was done to address the bed bud infestation. My entire group was shocked to see a Hilton establishment being run that way. Very disappointing.

title: Pre-Cruise Stay
review: This hotel was perfect for our 1-night pre-cruise stay.  We arrived very early at FLL and called the hotel for their free shuttle service.  We waited about 15 minutes for the driver.  He was a nice guy and gave us some information on the area.  We arrived at the hotel about 9:30am and luckily our room was ready.  The front desk staff were extremely friendly and welcoming.  The gentleman who helped us take our luggage up was jovial and made us feel right at home.  We walked all over the downtown/Las Olas area that day and also used the Sun Trolley.  Had a late lunch at Briney's Irish Pub on the Riverwalk which we enjoyed.  We had some drinks in the hotel bar that afternoon and some of their wings/pizza by the pool because we were too tired to go back out.  It suited our needs as…

title: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale. A nice place to stay
review: Hi L75317,  Thank you for sharing your opinion and your valuable feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We certainly appreciate your comments and we hope you will choose us again when you visit Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Nice Night Downtown
review: The Hampton Inn, Las Olas has been refitted. The upgrades are clearly a good thing especially in the guest rooms. Nice plugs and internet ability. We had a quiet and very comfortable room. Plenty of storage and a refrigerator was a plus. I am not so happy with the forced valet parking which is seemingly turning into an industry standard. Perhaps a deal with complimentary in and out parking would be appropriate.

title: Cruising? Hotel near port, $8 Shuttle!! But pricey.
review: This was my first stay at this particular hotel, and I think it's the first hotel I've ever stayed at with only valet parking (no self-parking). You basically pull up to the hotel's rear entrance (off NE 3RD St.), and the valet greets you at your car and gives you a ticket. You then enter the hotel and check-in. The $20 per night cost of the valet parking is automatically added on to your bill. After you check-out you hand the ticket to the valet and they go get your car for you. This actually worked out pretty good. I didn't mind the $20 fee. Location was everything - right in the middle of downtown Fort Lauderdale. The hotel itself was very nice. It looked like it was recently modernized / renovated (rooms and public areas). Everything seemed clean to me. Hot water was a…

title: Excellent Choice
review: A very clean, spacious room, great breakfast selection, friendly staff shuttle service to/from the airport and within a mile of the hotel and a convenient location. What else could one want or need?!  I would make a point of staying here again.

title: Excellent Guest Service
review: Hotel is located within minutes of Las Olas' main strip, close to the Airport and Cruise Terminals. Great Service, specifically Sly at the front desk was absolutely incredible - thanks for being so personable Sly, it really made our trip!

title: Great staff, clean rooms, and centrally located
review: We were referred to his hotel by the medical hospital and found they had the best price, staff was friendly, rooms were clean and modern (recently updated), great breakfast...overall a great hotel. Will stay again if the opportunity arise.

title: Dirty breakfast area, moldy bread and muffins, no hot water in room!
review: The breakfast area was filthy, staff was busy socializing and did not have time to change out utensils or fill empty pans. The english muffins were moldy. The water in room was never hot, at best it was cool to warm when turned all the way to hot. The evening desk clerk who checked us in had an attitude problem. The counters in room had to be cleaned, they were stained. The valet parking is a joke. The area is full of homeless drunks and drug dealers who are more than willing to advertise the drugs they have for sale.

title: Nice stay
review: Thank you for your feedback. We are very sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the quality of your breakfast you experienced during your stay. We are working to improve our offerings and welcome your comments. We will also address the service level you received from our front desk.  We hope you will come back and stay with us the next time you are in the area.	Thank you.

title: A perfect place to stay the night before a cruise./
review: We reserved a room a few months before our cruise was leaving, and I am glad we did.  The hotel is very nice but was booked up the day we checked in.  Fortunately we had reserved and had a wonderful room.  The bed was extrememly comfortable with a nice large bathroom and plenty of towels.  The room was nicely furnished and very clean.  There is a wonderful pool to enjoy.  We didn't swim but we liked sitting outside and enjoying the nice weather.  The hotel has a great shuttle service and we got a ride to a restaurant that our driver recommended.  It was a nice walk back to the hotel, and then the same shuttle took us to the cruise port.   It was a nice place to stay.

title: Continues to meet expectations!
review: Last visit was 3 yrs ago-hotel has been remodeled..sleek, modern furniture and soothing color scheme.  Able to select room location the day before on the app-makes for a very smooth check-in. The hallways were pleasing as well although the air was frigid. The room and bathroom was very clean-I especially loved the  most relaxing divan lounge chair with the movable "bedside stand table! Lot of USB and electrical outlets and Wi-Fi free worked well. There is enhanced elevator safety using room card access.  Staff pleasant and helpful, especially the breakfast crew ...breakfast at the pool works for me!  Fitness Center was well equipped. Took an Uber to airport for ~ $11! Will definitely return next trip.

title: Really good value and service
review: This is my second review of this hotel. They’ve always been super pleasant and helpful, but I want to give them praise for consistent good service and value. We have a condo right next door, and have had family stay there when in town. They’ve done an improvement and it’s consistent with what all the hotels are doing now. Their breakfast is good, the rooms are clean (in a previous review I mentioned a musty smell that’s gone), and they act like a full service hotel at a bargain brand price. It’s not on the beach, but it’s one hell of a good hotel for a great price.

title: Needs some attention
review: Very pretty hotel inside but definitely needs some staff attention. No coffee or tea available when we went to get some/ carafes sitting at elevator. Hotel not as clean as it should be. Paper towel all over lobby bathroom,soap not refilled from day before( used same stall day before and was no soap.) paint peeling on bathroom ceiling in room. No staff to be found anywhere when main breakfast items missing. We had to grab a muffin instead cause we had to leave for our flight. No towels at pool, had to go and ask, some staff appear lazy. it was not what u expect from a Hampton!!!

title: Nice Stay - Renovations Are Good
review: I’ve stayed here a time or two, mostly due to the proximity of Las Olas and dozens of restaurants.   Unlike a typical Hampton Inn, there is valet parking only for a charge, and a full bar.   Staff has always been very nice when I checked in.  The whole place has been renovated within the past couple of years and they did a great job. Room was clean, A/C worked well, TV was good, bed was nice, and plenty of electrical outlets.   It’s about a mile to the Las Olas area and I have walked that for dinner or taken Uber if it was dark; about $6.00 to get there.  Nice place and I’ll go back when in the area for business.

title: Disappointed
review: If it weren’t for management’s prompt attention to my phone call, I would have rated this hotel a 1. I was hoping to raise my rating as the week went on, however, other issues came up other than what prompted my call to her on day 1.  Upon arrival the room I was placed in appeared clean, however you can see by the picture of the phone that housekeeping does a generally poor job. They moved my room that had hair in the tub, so I made a call and sent an email to the manager with my concerns. She was very gracious and conducted an emergency meeting with housekeeping to deep clean my room. My co worker took picture of her remote and wipes, which were literally black after she wiped down her own remote. A deep clean was done on her room as well.  After we thought this was settled, we…

title: Comfy 1 night stay
review: My Husband  and I were looking for a room for night before our flight home. We drove around and noticed the Hampton Inn and I called while I was out front. They reserved   right away. We parked and they checked us in. They only have valet parking and that is $20.00. The Hotel was very nice and clean. The room was clean and King bed comfortable. It's about 5 miles to the beach and Las Olas Blvd is nearby. It's good to drive over. If your hungry they have a bar on the 2nd Floor. I had the crab cakes sandwich which was ok but if your looking for really good food. You can go down to Las Olas Blvd where the restaurants are. They also have complimentary breakast but we left at 4am the next day to catch a flight.

title: Hampton Inn Is a gem!!!
review: The hotel is wonderful. Rooms clean and quiet. The hideaway is a gem of a place. The servers remember you and they will work with what ever dietary needs you may need. The go above and beyond to make your stay 5 stars!!!

title: Cheer Comp
review: First we were checked in for the 9th floor but we arrived we were given the 7th floor. Our door was so difficult to open and close. They also don’t have self park. You have to pay $20 per day for valet parking.

title: Stay prior to cruise
review: LOVED that there was free shuttle service from FLL to hotel AND back and forth to Las Olas.  $8pp from hotel to piet.  Is walking distance to Las Olas, however  a little sketchy at night if alone so wouldn't recommend.  Shuttle service back/forth to Las Olas runs until 1am.  Complimentary breakfast was ok, other Hiltons are better.  Room and bathroom were great for our needs-traveling with husband pre-cruise.  All kinds of eateries and shopping on Las Olas!  Have stayed at Hilton in beach and chose Hampton to save a few bucks and stay closer to Las Olas and for the restaurant variety.

title: Don't be fooled by the name
review: This is in a terrible neighborhood. When you are in the work out area, all you see is homelessness. It is a sold 10-15 walk to Las Olas and it doesn't feel safe when you are walking. Yes, they offer a shuttle, but it was never available when I needed it. I would never stay here again.

title: Hampton Inn Gem
review: Highest quality accommodations and staff of any Hampton Inn accommodations I've stayed in, and I've stayed with them all over the U.S. Perfect location for the Performing Arts Center, walkable to downtown area. Very impressed, would return.

title: Expected more
review: I thought due to locations d cost it would have been nicer.  Bathroom was old and sink didn’t work.  Barely any hot water.  Vent by door was covered with dust. Paid $20 a day for valet to park in a structure that was connected.  Ugh

title: Average hotel, nice staff, below average location
review: What a mixed bag this place is. Summary: I would only stay here if I was working nearby (which I was). Wouldn't bring my wife or kids here and would probably stay somewhere else next time.   Positives: Many of the staff are really nice and really try to please. However some are a little oddly rude-ish. I found the parking valet guys to be a real mixed bag with one not seeming to comprehend anything I said and not able to guess what I wanted - his colleague had to explain it all to him (first day on the job?). One of the staff members was pretty curt as well for some reason. If I owned this place I give them some training since the style was inconsistent across everybody - not professional hotel feeling like most of this brand.  My Negatives: The location is funky with a…

title: Great Hotel
review: The hotel was very beautiful, and the staff was friendly. They have a free shuttle, which made it easy to travel to Las Olas BLVD and enjoy dinner and night life. I would recommend staying at this location!

title: Nice hotel / bad area
review: The hotel is very nice; however, the location leaves much to be desired.  Due to the high concentration of homeless people walking to food isn't recommended or safe. Valets made patrons a bit uncomfortable expecting tips at every encounter - retrieving and dropping off the care - which was in addition to the $20 per day valet fee (which I feel was a fair fee if it weren't for the valets being a bit pushy).

title: Hampton inn ft lauderdale
review: We have stayed here several because of the park and stay option they offer.  When you are on a cruse you can leave your car there for several day in a secure area and they offer a shuttle service to and fron the ship terminals and then you can pick up your vehicle on your return.  Stay before or after your cruise.  As always the rooms are excellent and breakfast is provided.  This is a great service and a whole lot better than parking in a unprotected lot.

title: Great weekend getaway
review: Located in a great part of Ft Lauderdale in the Las Olas neighborhood near some great restaurants and shops all within easy walking distance. I’d definitely would stay here again. As a matter of fact this was my second stay at this location and I look forward to another visit.

title: Hotel Stay prior to our cruise
review: We like to stay at Hamptons wherever we go and this one did not disappoint!  The hotel shuttle was excellent with the most informative and pleasant driver we've ever experienced. He explained the ease with which we'd catch the shuttle in the morning to our cruise terminal. We had Italian food delivered easily to our room from a local restaurant.  We were exhausted and slept 11 hours, right through breakfast.  It might have been the most comfy bed EVER!!!!

title: Wonder hotel and excellent staff.
review: My husband and I stayed at this hotel after he was discharged from the hospital. The hotel is well kept and the staff is very friendly and helpful. I want to thank the staff for their assistance in making this a pleasant stay during a difficult time for us.  A special thank you to Mr.Sly for his thoughtfulness. Whenever he saw us he always inquired how we were doing and if we needed anything to make us more comfortable.

title: Nice Hampton Inn, weird area
review: This Hampton Inn is handy if you're dealing with the Fort Lauderdale or Broward Co government because you're next to it. City Hall, County Jail, the library, US Federal Courthouse are all within a few blocks.  The Hampton Inn itself is what you'd expect from a Hampton Inn. Nice breakfast area.   However, the surrounding area is weird. For one, as there are a lot of government buildings, it's deserted after work hours. Las Olas is a fancied up area, but you have luxury condos facing the county jail there. There are also a whole bunch of homeless services around, and the local homeless like to hang around the library. They didn't cause us any trouble, but single travelers should be aware.  However, we were assaulted by some random dude in the street who took a swing at me while…

title: Staff was rude.  Facility not what I would expect from a Hilton property.
review: The hotel is not in the best neighborhood. We arrived late and had to be buzzed in. There was an employee sleeping in the lobby. I'm guessing this was the parking valet.  There is an extra charge for parking.  The staff that we encountered were rude and not what I accustommed to at other Hilton properties.  The room was very noisy. The breakfast was horrible and no one was around to address any problems.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Very nice clean hotel. No hot tub but a nice pool. Restaurant on the 2nd floo was really good! Crab cake sandwich yummy. Didn’t know there was no self parking. Close to the airport. Would stay here anytime again. One of the nicest Hampton Inn’s I’ve stayed at.

title: Great location!
review: We loved this hotel for it's great location. Easy walk to Las Olas Boulevard, but there was a free shuttle from the hotel if required, which took us to the airport at the end of our stay. Nice rooms, clean and fairly spacious. The pool was a good size, looked very inviting though we didn't try it. Nice and secure, comfortable bed, reasonable price. What more could you ask for!

title: Will Be Back
review: We chose the Hampton Inn for our trip to FLL for the Fort Lauderdale International Boat Show. Very pleased with the staff and hotel, as is usual for Hampton Inns they are all the same in terms of service.  We took a cab to the show the first day and after that we drove. The hotel is within walking distance of the Las Olas district with a large number of good restaurants and bars.  All in all a very reasonably priced place to stay for a very expensive boat show.

title: TOTAL LACK OF HOSPITALITY
review: Good location, clean, and sufficient amenities.  Staff was rude.  There is forced valet parking, which means a forced tip.  Air conditioning/heat was confusing.  Sign on unit said climate was controlled by wall unit.  Wall unit didn't work.

title: Unexpected Stay
review: After missing our connecting flight due to mechanical problems our airline put us up for the night at the Hampton Inn.  Upon arrival we were greeted by front desk staff and were checked in quickly.  They were friendly and had no issue as others have noted.  The hotel did not look old or worn down but we did not care for the area of this property.  Not sure how comfortable I would be walking around late at night.  The morning included breakfast was basic but it worked before heading the airport.  This Hampton would not be our choice to stay in the future mainly due to the location and the surrounding area.

title: Comfortable
review: We had a day room because of a late flight. Staff were friendly and rates were reasonable . Our room was on the 7th floor and very clean and comfortable with good tv , we would not hesitate to stay again.

title: Horrible staff
review: The staff was rude, difficult to talk to, gave bad information and didn’t care. Acted like my family was an inconvenience and bothering them, from the moment we walked in until we left. Fought loudly with other guests and rude to everyone.

title: Rudeness
review: We stayed here after a family vacation so as not to have to rush home.  Booked it months in advance but it was still really pricey. Over $200 per night I do expect a quiet and pleasant experience,  not what we received.  At check-in the front desk person was cold, acting like it was too much work to get it done. We had a room with an adjoining door to a room full of young adults who were celebrating New Years Eve very fully. From the time we returned from our dinner about 9 p.m. until they left the room to go out (around 9:45) they were running up and down the halls, yelling, slamming doors, etc. When we let the front desk know it was disturbing us, the response was "it is New Years Eve". We were able to sleep while they were out, but when they returned around 1 a.m. it started…

title: Florida trip
review: Fine hotel but not really “downtown” - they offer a free shuttle within a mile or so from the hotel otherwise they do charge. They also require a $20 daily valet parking fee. They do have a very nice complimentary breakfast the helps makeup for parking charge.

title: End of the Year Relax
review: This visit was very important to me. I  had been in Florida since Christmas Eve. I came here for to begin my Spiritual Growth & Alternative Healing.  I  was exhausted when I arrived to the hotel.  This was my second time staying here and I  must say I was definitely impressed upon my arrival. Valet was added and the Lobby gave a very upscale inviting yet warm feel. The Rooms have a modern decor at home feel that I like a lot. The Beds sleep like a little bit of Heaven so I was so glad when the our room was ready. I have a service animal,  Spade,  whom the staff made him feel like a Diamond Member also. Thank You Steve for taking care of my early arrival.  Hats off to Aida she's such a pleasure. Every time without failure she greeted me with a smile and asked me if I was OK and…

title: Worst staff ever
review: Not everyone was awful, only the front desk who told us they didn’t have an airport shuttle when we called asking (for the record, they do and it’s free), the housekeeping lady who was yelling at a guest down the hall that if they didn’t let her clean then that she might not come back and do it later, the woman at the breakfast who, at 10:15 had removed all the food and coffee while people were still waiting because “it’s done at 10:00” and the front desk person (Not Aida) who was clearly angry with us for staying there. The man who took the cereal and coffee back out, Aida, and the shuttle drivers were kind and professional.

title: Christmas weekend was wonderful!
review: I was well accommodated. Close to the beach. We loved our stay. Front reception was very kind . We were surprised that we had to pay Valet parking. I should be able to park my own car, however everyone in the valet department was very kind. $20 worth of kindness.

title: Very Nice Stay....Staff was great
review: Totally enjoyed my 5 night stay. Staff was very nice, room accommodations were excellent with very good housekeeping team. Great location with easy access to all of the fun spots in FLL. Will definitely stay here next time my travels brings me back to Fort Lauderdale.

title: Clean and Convenient
review: Room was very clean. The sink was not working properly and maintenance fixed it quickly. Housekeeping also brought me items I needed in a timely manner. Great service from staff. Convenient location close to Las Olas street and the beach. There is no self parking, only a daily $20 valet service.

title: Several issues need to be addressed
review: The hotel is located in downtown Fort Lauderdale, on a rather quiet avenue (although there are railroad tracks about 4 blocks NW). The hotel charges 20$ per night for parking. We didn’t use the parking but were still charged for it, so double check your bill.   The hotel lobby is bright and huge. The rooms on the other hand are small - - we had a 2 queen beds room and there was not enough space to leave our suitcase open without bumping into it. There was also a problem with the door: the door was smaller than the doorframe, something we noticed when we went to sleep, as light from the corridor was creeping into the room. We put a towel to block the light coming from under the door but there was still a gap on the side.   There was also an issue with the bathroom door, that was…

title: It’s a Hampton Inn - but it’s great if you are cruising
review: When you walk in you think “Wow, this looks nice!” ( they were decorated for Christmas too which helps). We stayed here the night before we went on a cruise. Our room was very “Hampton”, not gross but not really nice either. The best part of the hotel is they have a valet that will take you to the ship ( 8 bucks a person). Our guy, Springer was super helpful and knowledgeable about where to go which port, where to drop our bags etc. he was wonderful!!! Worth the money to use him vs an Uber or taxi which would end up being the same price anyway.

title: Disappointing
review: I stayed here the evening of November 29th for a meeting at City Hall the next day. They refused to honor the contracted rate although I had been given a copy of the actual contract.  They said they were fully booked - however I saw room availability at several internet sites. This was an important meeting set up for me by the City at the last minute - so I chose the hotel anyway due to the location - I could walk to the meeting and it was close to the airport.  That turned out to be the only positive about this place.  I arrived around 7:30 p.m. and was checked in quickly.  There was debris on the carpet outside the door to my room and the carpet in the room was also dirty.  The sink stopper didn't work and the bathroom floor and tub were not clean either. I was very tired and…

title: Pre- Cruise Birthday Celebration
review: I purchased the "Bon Voyage" package, as we arrived 1 day before our 5 day cruise. This package allowed me to leave my car parked at the hotel during the duration of the cruise with complimentary round trip shuttle service for 2 (there were 3 of us so it it was $16 round trip for 1 person)  to and from the port from the hotel. It was perfect...no hassles, no problems!

title: Convenient location, clean, complementary shuttle service to town a big plus
review: The wait to be picked up at the airport was about 30 minutes which was a bit lengthy.  The property itself was pretty much the standard Hampton Inn one finds everywhere.  The staff was friendly, the breakfast was fine and the shuttle about a mile out to town was greatly appreciated.  Shuttle service from the hotel to the pier on departure day and from the pier to the airport on disembarkation day was efficient and fairly priced.

title: Great location and customer service
review: This hotel is blocks away from Las Olas Boulevard, which we wanted to visit prior to our cruise, so this was a great location.  Also close to Publix - to pick up some wine for the cruise :)  Staff was friendly and helpful with storing luggage until our room was ready and getting us some water when we came back drenched from the heat.

title: Great stay, great location, excellent staff.
review: Enjoyed the stay near everything in Fort Lauderdale and Las Olas, clean, safe and great staff. Walking distance and close drive from the best restaurants and shopping area Las Olas Shopping Center.  Will stay again.

title: Excellent
review: Amazing!!! Great job to everyone who works at this hotel. It was a great place to stay and the Hampton lounge at night was very convenient after long days and Michelle always had great food available. Front Desk, Sly and Aida were great and valet (Jose and team) always assisted with my car and luggage.

title: Rooms not as most Hampton Inns
review: Bed was not as other Hampton in quality, sheets had rips in them, crumbs on carpet and AC was very noisy.  The hotel staff were very friendly, breakfast buffet was good, hotel shuttle was good, location was not the best area.

title: Average hotel.
review: Standard facilities. Average to below average for Hampton. Pretty decent for a good night's sleep. Clean comfortable beds. Nothing special about the hot breakfast. Staff seems unfriendly  ( no smiles🤐 ) however they get things done. Would not recommend this hotel for a vacation stay especially with kids.

title: Weekend in Foert Lauderdale
review: We were able to leave our baggage before check in after a 15 day cruise.  After a large lunch the evening meal at the hotel was just the topping. Friendly staff and excellent accommodations.  The location is central to the downtown area and Las Olas in particular.

title: Overnight stay
review: Stayed here to avoid driving to and from a wedding.   The hotel is perfectly located, very nicely updated and very clean.  The staff was very nice and helpful.  You won't be disappointed staying here. Walking distance to the best parts of downtown Fort Lauderdale.

title: Great hotel
review: Most of the time when am traveling to FTL am staying in Hampton inn the rooms a great and comfortable the breakfast is till 10 am with small variety of food i think they need to upgrade the menu.The area is quiet, free Wifi and parking. Great value for the money. Recommended

title: I like Ft. Lauderdale Hampton Inn
review: I had a very pleasant experience on my 4 day stay at the Hampton Inn in Ft. Lauderdale.  The staff is very efficient and friendly. The location of the hotel is very good. Valet parking available and breakfast until 10:00am

title: Great hotel! Will come again
review: The room is always clean. The bed and pillows amazingly comfortable.  I feel so relaxed when I stay at the Las Olas Hampton. The airconditioner cooled great, every corner of the room was spotless. The shower was strong and water temperature was perfect.

title: Perfect stay!
review: We stayed here at the end of our cruise vacation. The hotel is very clean and we loved being in the big city. The free shuttle to the airport was a plus too. Check-in staff was very friendly, and they accommodated us with a to-go breakfast bag because we had a very early flight. I would definitely stay here again!

title: Trying but not trying
review: Some employees are trying to provide good services, others not so much. The hotel has been redone. Cleanliness in the bedroom was good. The area near the hotel is shady towards the north ( bus station), good towards the south. It s right by City Hall and other Corporate Buildings.

title: The hotel was besuitful and for the most part the staff were very nice and helpful.the breakfast is by far the best
review: Great hotel,nice staff for the most part.the hotel is clean .the pool is beauitful.loved it because I got to sit by the pool and do my job.the service to and from the airport was very nice and the driver was very helpful and speaks very nice to all the customers

title: Great Customer Service
review: Close to downtown night life Grocery stores etc, Sly at the front desk was hilarious and very helpful! The van drivers were also the bomb. The breakfast served is not your ordinary breakfast........... it was delicious and we made sure we didn’t miss it!

title: Great Location
review: The Hilton Hotels are my favorite from the hotel business, this Hampton in stands for its brand. It offers a great location and the recently renovation looks really nice. The hot breakfast is really good. The shuttle offering around town and the new bar area is a nice add on in terms of service.

title: Hillary Clinton Stay
review: I had a wonderful experience here. Very friendly staff members and helpful getting to know the area. They also recommended good restaurants and how to get to the beach by public transportation. It was a very pleasant and delightful experience.

title: Helping me they a difficult time
review: It was a pleasure to stay there as I was there to lay my mother to rest the staff was wonderful. The setting was pleasant and everyone was always attentive to all my needs. I can’t say enough good about my stay

title: best hampton
review: Good price, great staff, nice room.  We especially liked the gathering area that had a bar.   This is the same area that they use for breakfast in the morning .  Spacious.  Clean pool.   They will shuttle you were shopping within 1 mile radius of the hotel. This is a free service

title: Great place to stay
review: Very nice hotel and I will return here when I'm back in this area for business purposes. There is a very nice food/bar area on the 2nd floor. Breakfast is complimentary and there are a few items available after hours for convenience.There is computer areas as well.

title: Not recommended !
review: Dirty bedding / rug needed vacuuming / Toilet wouldn't flush/ tub dripped water non stop! Had a meal at hotel ice cold Hamburg/ fry and dry!  No ketchup / no mustard  Dry Received 2 rooms and was not impressed on both rooms.

title: My trip to Ft. Lauderdale
review: Very nice hotel, clean and neat. The staff was friendly. The evening restaurant staff was good and the food was tasty. The breakfast was also yummy and the staff kept everything clean and tidy. I would stay at this hotel again if in the area.

title: Good Hotel before your cruise
review: Nice Hotel before you cruise Lots of restaurants around and Free Shuttle to most places  Will pick you up and take you to Airport Free Breakfast and rooms are clean Check in Easy and staff friendly There are trains that you can hear but not bothersome

title: Wonderful place
review: Hi, I stayed here for one night on Sept 6th, 2017 before heading to the ft lauderdale airport on the 7th to evacuate to Texas from Irma. It was just myself and two toddler boys- a 1 year old and 3 year old. I was scared and nervous. My husband had to stay back to get everything ready for the hurricane before leaving himself. From the very first phone conversation all the way up until check out, the employees here were just amazing. The front staff had smiles, were so sweet to myself and my boys. The complimentary breakfast was awesome and staff in the kitchen so nice. People walked up to us, smiled and were seriously so kind. We have a family owned resort in The Florida Keys, so we know how much that extra stuff means to people. Especially in time of crisis. The room, hotel,…

title: Horrible customer service
review: Hotel is NOT CLOSE TO ANYTHING,  You HAVE TO PAY $20 daily for parking and hotel staff is Jist Plain Bad...When i checked in no customer service,  no one asked me for ID she just gave me my key and that's it. NO EYE CONTACT, DID NOT INFOEM ME ABOUT BREAKFAST OR ANYTHING.  JUST BAD CUSTOMER SERVIVE

title: Great customer service EVER!!!
review: Shannon and Sylvester made this the best experience!! It's rare finding customer service this great!!! The rooms were comfy as well!! If I'm in this area  again...I'll definitely stay here!!! The price was great! It was close to eating places and the shuttle service as awesome to have!!

title: Ripped off a Hilton Honors member
review: I had a reservation for $120, but the hotels were all full and I had no where to take myself and my wife except a park.  So, they charged me $140 for a hotel room with no electric, no A/C (Florida heat), windows that don't open, no pool, and no breakfast.

title: Great hotel
review: Stayed at this hotel during hurricane Irma and couldn't have been more impressed with the staff and hotel.  Every staff member went above and beyond to see that all guests were comfortable during a difficult time.  The rooms are well appointed, the bar and light bites a great addition.

title: Excellent
review: I really can't say enough to let you know how incredibly amazing management and staff was at this hotel. We were there during hurricane Irma and everyone remained pleasant, attentive and as accommodating as possible. Our experience couldn't have been any better. We live in Fort Lauderdale and will have our family and friends stay here when they come to town

title: Hampton Inn Stay
review: The Hampton by Hilton was a wonderful place to stay.  The breakfast was hot and tasted good, and the room was clean and well equipped.  I would definitely stay here again.  It is very close to work and many fine restaurants.

title: Quick stay
review: Megan made my check in process seamless and was very concerned about my family's safety as guest, I would stay here again because of her professionalism and hospitality. Thanks a lot Megan for making our stay pleasant.

title: Staff are like friendly neighbors
review: Everyone on the staff is very friendly. I was here with a service animal and we both enjoyed our stay.  The complimentary breakfast had a lot of good options; much better food than received in your local drive-thru.

title: Hotel located in dangerous neighborhood
review: I'm a Hilton Honors member who chose this hotel because it was supposed to be located near Las Olas Blvd.  We were kind of disappointed with the location.  It was not that close to popular Las Olas Blvd.  Hotel located in somewhat dangerous neighborhood with vacant lots on all sides.  Not safe to walk around neighborhood.  Room was clean and recently updated.

title: Shannon F. and Aida are AMAZING at the Front Desk
review: I checked in on Friday Sept 1 at 6pm and met Shannon who from the start had a smile and welcomed me...when she told me my total which I was given a different total I was very upset but still Shannon was smiles and apologized and it was her professionalism that made me feel good about not looking for another hotel asap...Shannon is kind and AWESOME and she deserves to be recognized.  Aida is also AWESOME...I spilled coffee at the coffee station and when I told Aida she came over quickly with a smile and cleaned it up without hesitation and engaged me asking if my stay has been good so far.  Then on Sunday I told Aida my issue with the wifi and she guided me to the solution...bottom line these two ladies were and have GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE!!! YES   The gentleman that worked with…

title: Not happy!
review: Need more competent chambermaids.  Need to keep pool sitting area clean.  Need better food at the cafe.  Will not stay at the site again.  Only two individuals were cordial at the front desk.  Kept it too cold in the hotel.

title: Nice Hotel / Great Locations
review: I thought about staying at a hotel on the beach, but this Hampton was a great location. Walking distance to Los Olas Boulevard where there are plenty of great places to eat.   The hotel itself is really nice. My room was very large and spacious. Of course breakfast is included...I took mine out to a table by the pool.   This Hampton Inn also has a lounge that is open in the evenings for food and cocktails. And the valet parking staff was really outstanding.

title: Worth every Penny🙂
review: I had to get a hotel at the last minute while going out of town and I was really surprised at how  Nice this hotel is and the great location. Valet staff A++ Hot breakfast and its worth every penny.! My child didn't want to leave

title: Expect More
review: Mediocre hotel.  Reception staff ranged from callously indifferent to functional in body.  My most disappointing hotel stay in a long time. Goodby Hilton honors Diamond.  Hardly any staff, it's minimal.  Food plates, knives etc all disposable - McDonalds standards. One day, no eggs for breakfast, another no boiled eggs.  Toaster broken all week - and only one for everyone.  Go somewhere else where service is a focus and you're not just $ vis a brand.  Such s downer to have done business here.

title: Good variety breakfast but worse everything else
review: Carpets were stained dirty in all the hallways  There was hair on the floor in our bathroom When we arrived . Lastly there was a wad of pink gum On the ceiling in the hallway by bathroom Fridge was not cleaned . My worst hotel experience Ever !

title: Everything we needed
review: Great location and wonderful pool for the kids.  Full bar available!  The breakfast area fills up quickly on weekends but that is expected.  It's a bummer to pay for parking but at least the vehicle is secured.

title: Ft. Lauderdale/Downtown Las Olas Area
review: Staff is amazing. There are no first floor rooms! If you book through HH be aware that there is a $20 a night parking fee that we weren't made aware of. Breakfast is great! Rooms need better cleaning and some maintenance. First room was gross! Second room had maintenance issues. Do not walk around outside of the hotel at night, sketchy area of town and many people loitering.

title: Seminar
review: Staff was exceptional polite and helpful. As well as the valet parking staff. Room updated clean and comfortable. Location not really walking distance to anything however free shuttles to downtown area is available and efficient

title: Not good
review: No business friendly features. There were no carts when I needed to unload carriage. I was very tired and took forever to unload and carry up my luggage! No help from staff. Spent almost 30 minutes before I was told there were no carts and received no help. Had to make excessive trips. No help with a fax. Non attentive, rather cold staff

title: Great overall experience!
review: I enjoyed an excellent 1 day stay. The from desk surprisingly accommodated me with a great room at the time of my very early 12 noon arrival. The entire staff I interacted with was very friendly, courteous and professional. I truly enjoyed my visit as I will definitely book this hotel when I return to this area.

title: Indeed a pleasure!
review: Very clean and nice Hampton.  So convenient to all bars/restaurants along with the golf courses in surrounding area. Told it was on the Beach and wasn't so we were rather disappointed!  Should have looked on line at the photos.

title: always good
review: Hampton Inns never have disappointed.  Always clean always pleasant and a nice breakfast.Goood variety.  Pool was down for our visit.  But, did not get a chance to use.  nice seating area for breakfast  very satisfied

title: Hampton inn Fort Lauderdale
review: Convenient to Las Olas area. Upgraded rooms are ok. Nothing fancy. Hotel seems to cater for persons passing through to cruises not needing much or for weekend stay overs. Not a place for long term stay as in vacation with kids etc.

title: Lose cosmetic
review: My wife lose her cosmetic during our stay, i report it, at the time there is no manager because its late, they say they will get back to us, but they did not. it never get resolve, we never get a sorry. So dissapointed, consider this is a big hotel.

title: Shuttle service and breakfast poor
review: Breakfast complimentary and very minimal and lacking.  Shuttle goes 1 mile before they want to charge you..  Unless it's to the airport which is handy, our shuttle driver was a nice guy.  Pool closed for the week we were there.. Just sad

title: Bad building
review: Staff didn't recommend parking but their own lot which was $20. AC leaked and soaked the rug, got my socks wet. The room smelled damp and musty. Pool was green & the towels were old n rough. 👎🏾👎🏾👎🏾

title: Very Comfortable Weekend
review: I was attending a weekend class being held at the Hampton Inn - having a microwave and frozen meals for sale in the lobby allowed me to get so much done!! The rooms were quite clean and comfortable and the staff was great. I would definitely chose a Hampton Inn the next time a I travel

title: Cruise
review: This is a very nice hotel, the  Night staff could have been more helpful. the breakfast was wonderful.  the rooms are clean and very comfortable.  The airport shuttle was great.  Shuttle around town was good as well.

title: Great stay
review: Staff was wonderful shuttle service from airports prompt and to us to several other places and also enjoyed pool and complementary breakfast thank you great hotel to stay at close to airport we chose to stay for a couple days before our cruise very relaxing

title: There on personal business with my friend. Could not have chosen a better hotel.
review: The rooms, staff from front desk, housekeeping, shuttle drivers and every person we dealt with were Great! Sly, at the front desk was amazingly helpful! He and the other front staff could not have been better.  The bar and grill staff & food was top notch. Complimentary breakfast was adequate.

title: Newly remodeled
review: Nice hotel. Newly remodeled. Clean rooms and comfortable beds.   Best part was the free shuttle to the airport. No info about it in the room but when we were checking out it was getting ready to leave. Super convenient for us, although shuttle driver seemed very unpleasant. Maybe just a bad day for him.   Breakfast was pretty bad compared to all the Hampton breakfasts I've experienced.   Front desk didn't have a corkscrew so we had to leave our bottle of wine in the fridge since we couldn't take in carry on luggage.

title: Great experience, nicely renovated and AWESOME complimentary breakfast!
review: Hotel was not near the beach, but that was not the purpose of my trip. Great complimentary breakfast, appreciated that it was on the 2nd floor with plenty of room and many great selections including various bagels and delicious scones! Room was newly renovated and clean.  Would stay again!

title: Friendly Staff and Free Shuttle
review: Our group of nine stayed here, in three rooms, for one night in preparation for our cruise.  Every time we come to Fort Lauderdale for a cruise, we always stay in the same location but this time I decided to give the Hampton Inn a chance as the price was about $60 cheaper, per room, than the Holiday Inn we normally stay at.   Upon entrance of the hotel, the staff was very friendly and greeted us with a smile and conversation.   The hotel has recently been remodeled and looks great.  There was complimentary water/coffee and hot tea available and plenty of seating in the lobby.   The hotel offers a free shuttle to nearby establishments for you to grab food or any items you might have left at home.  The shuttle will take you other places, for a fee.  We wanted to go to the beach…

title: Royalty
review: Great place to stay. My man Sylvester is the one to see. The guy from Valet was awesome. Our lady to clean our room, was so sweet and helpful, beautiful person. Great price and location to beach. Cab ride away for $10.00.

title: Stay Away!
review: Shuttle service from the airport to the hotel was supposed to be 20-30 minutes but took an hour, with 10 of us waiting in the hot sun. We booked a room to accommodate 5 of us, and were told we would get a room with 2 queen beds and a pullout sofa. We instead were given 2 queen beds with no pullout sofa. When we spoke with the front desk person, we were told they couldn't accommodate us, he refused to call the manager because "I know what we have" and he said "at least you are staying only 1 night!" Pool was dirty with white flakes and black matter floating in it.

title: Great little gem, reasonably priced!
review: This Hampton Inn was meticulous- valet parking for $20/night, exceptionally polite staff and very well located a few blocks from Las Olas. They were amenable to a late checkout (2pm) since I had an evening flight.  Decent breakfast. Quiet and rooms extremely clean and comfortable bed! Will stay again for sure! Excellent all around!

title: Very nice stay
review: I made reservations at the last minute as I wasn't sure I'd need to be in town the next day.  I called and asked about availability (and that I was an Honors member!)  I was quickly and efficiently assured that there was a room available for me.  The rate was good, so was the room. Nice to be able to rely on a steady nice place to stay when on the road!

title: Hampton Doentown/ Las Olas area
review: Outstanding stay, staff is very accommodating, friendly and always eager to assist guests. Rooms are spacious and clean, free internet to keep in contact with friends and family or business needs. Breakfast each morning and a nice friendly cocktail bar for a relaxing drink after a busy day.

title: Great place to stay
review: Only valet parking available but great technology at this hotel. Close to restaurants on US1. Very close to airport by 10-15 mins. Only thing was that they charge $20 per day for valet parking on my bill

title: Place to sleep after cruising
review: This place was awesome!!!!  When traveling, most people have lots of devices to plug in and most hotels don't have  enough outlets for the entire family to use. Not the case here!!! I love that there was PLENTY of outlets to use!! The room was comfortable and had a refrigerator AND a microwave!!! Just what we needed. They offered Neutrogena products for bathing and shampooing and the bed was soooo comfortable. We definately will stay here again on our vacation!!!

title: Convenient to Las Olas Blvd
review: My stay here was great.  The free breakfast buffet was plentiful and the staff was great.  I didn't notice many restaurants within walking distance and I ended up driving out for food, etc.  The room was clean, bed was comfortable, and check-in/out was quick.

title: Night before cruise.
review: The bed was extremely comfortable.  The staff was very friendly. They offered free breakfast, free shuttle from the airport and did not allow pets which was important to me because I'm highly allergic.

title: Great experience
review: My overall experience was great...I have no complaints everything was organized the rooms where clean, beds comfortable, staff friendly, food was great...polite staff, the reception was absolutely amazing

title: Las Olas Gem
review: Great location for cruise, beach, restaurants, and airpot.  Great breakfast, pool and airport shuttle.  You never know what a hotel is like until you stay there, and I picked a good one in staying at this Hampton.  Do NOT hesitate to book it.

title: Needs improvement
review: Shuttle driver not knowledgeable of area. Beds are uncomfortable. Refrigerator in room wasn't working. Woke up to spoiled food. Had to catch a flight the next morning without any food to bring with me because it was spoiled in the morning.

title: Wonderful Accommodations
review: I have stayed at this hotel before the renovation. It has greatly improved. I enjoyed my stay at the hotel and was comfortable and modern. The breakfast food also improved from what I remembered from previous stay.  I just think valet parking should be optional. It was expensive at $20 a day plus tipping the hotel staff.   Overall the stay was pleasant.

title: Ga
review: The hotel is in a nice area.  The staff is very nice and professional. Valet parking staff was very helpful. I do think parking should be free. I did not eat the complimentary breakfast, but other family members enjoy it. I would recommend this hotel to others, and I look forward to staying at this hotel again in the future. 😀

title: good place to stay
review: Had a shuttle that would take you most places in town.Room  nice nicely decorated. Rooms were large and well appointed.Close to downtown. Staff very helpful.Cookies and coffee in the lobby.Breakfast room very spacious, so you did not feel crowded. I would diffently stay there again.

title: Conveniently located!
review: Nice hotel, staff were all very friendly, rooms were nice with fridge and microwave, hot breakfast was complimentary and convenient.  There is a small bar on the 2nd floor, she had decent snacks and cold beer.  Valet was a little pricey, but I suppose that's to be expected.  All in all, it was a nice hotel near everything you need in FLL.

title: Best staff ever
review: The staff I had to deal with with were amazing!  Marcus, Sly, Ada, and Andrea always welcomed me with a smile (Marcus always addressed me by my name).  Lester and the morning crew for breakfast always went out of their way too if we needed anything.  The Housekeeping supervisor, I believe her name is Sandy, always checked to make sure our room was serviced.  The drivers for the shuttles Jermaine, Springer, and Chris were helpful in getting us to wherever we needed to go in the Las Olas area.  I appreciate all they did during my stay and hope to visit there again one day.  The only reason I didn't give it an excellent review is the area is unsafe at night due to the homeless but the lobby was secured at night and a security guard on duty.

title: Very Nice Hampton Inn
review: Stayed at this Hampton Inn for a night before going on our cruise.  Very nice hotel and would stay here again if I was in the Ft. Lauderdale area.  Very convenient for us to go the port. The hotel offered free shuttle service to/from the airport and a $8 per person to the port.

title: Review
review: Very nice hotel; the social problems of the city are affecting the hotel (e.g. homeless, police). I was there to go to my graduation ceremony. I requested an extra bed which was not ready at the time of arrival. we have to call a couple of times to require the bedding for that extra bed. We have to call a couple of times to request more towels as there only 3 towels for 5 family members.

title: If it wasn't for AC problem I'd give them a 10. AC not working is a BIG PROBLEM.
review: 2nd time staying at a Hampton inn with same problem. Jesrsey Hampton inn was terrible....problem was not solved. Left my number for manager never called me back. Fort Lauderdale at least solved my AC problem right away. Never the less I should not be inconvenienced w these problems. Check your AC before assigning a room plzzzzz

title: AWESOME
review: The wonderful experience started with the valet staff and hotel front desk.  The lobby and rooms were very clean. Everyone was nice I would recommend this hotel. Location was great easy to get on the interstate. Walmart is close if you would need to pick up any last minute items

title: Wonderful!
review: Stay every time I come for business. Excellent location and amazing staff! Hotel is brand new and clean! Will make this hotel my reoccurring business trip spot. Marcus has checked me in every time, and i look forward to seeing him again!

title: Amazing staff to the rescue - great hotel!!!
review: This hotel is a short ride from the Fort Lauderdale Airport and is an extremely comfortable and convenient place if you need to overnight close by or have business in the area. I had just been up 24 hours on a flight that was diverted from Costa Rica, I lost my credit card, and I probably looked like and smelled like a vagrant after three days of cancelled flights and non-stop travel. Again, I  looked like a complete mess when I walked in tattered from my long trip without sleep . Your staff couldn't have been more welcoming and went way over the top to help me get checked in. I was so tired I accidentally booked the wrong hotel on Expedia (another Hampton Inn in Lauderdale :) - Staff to the rescue! The front desk manager (or assistant manager) whose name was Andi I believe,…

title: Nice place, a little pricey
review: Staff was very pleasant and property was clean. Conveniently located near the port. They ran out of some items at breakfast so I would not count on it as a value-added feature. Tried to have telephone customer service to help with an on-line booking and they totally messed my reservation up; had to go thru an act of congress to get it straightened out but finally did.

title: Weekend getaway
review: Our room was nice and comfortable and had a great night sleep. It's close enough to downtown and the beach. It was really easy to check in and out with the digital key feature. We were  also able to pick our room.

title: Vacation
review: Stayed here prior to cruise and after.   Service was excellent!   Very beautiful place!   The staff was excellent.  The room was exceptionally clean.   Any question we had the staff was very helpful.  Will visit here again.

title: Very nice
review: Bedtime property as busy as Disney but they could handle it if you wanted to eat or drink there you can free happy hour drinks every single day even though it's at all large big hotel all the service said was perfect everybody was happy and accommodating low prices for the Suites very nice close to everything I would go there time and time again I was very impressed

title: Great customer service
review: The staff at this location are so accommodating and friendly. The hotel is super clean, breakfast is your standard continental and they have a small pool in the back. The hotel even has a van that can drive you within the mile to other restaurants and bars.  Only downside is location, there is not much to do in the area and you have to drive to the beach. If you're purpose is to be close by though, the hotel works well.

title: Great Hotel
review: was comfortable clean beds ,power full a.c unit  The valet parking was awesome knowing  I could do Laundry on the premises was great I would certainly vist again and recommend to friends and family great place to stay

title: Great customer service
review: Great customer service and friendly staff. They went above and beyond to make your stay amazing. I strongly recommend this hotel. I'm telling all my friends and family. They only downfall is paying twenty dollars for valet parking daily.

title: Hampton inn Fort Lauderdale
review: Great service!  Shuttle to area restaurants was very convenient  and timely.  Bar staff were extremely knowledgeable of area and recommended locally owned establishments for our group of six. Good location to conduct business in the area while convenient to the FLL airport

title: Weekend holiday stay
