Van broke down and passengers were not advised when additional transportation would be available.  Guests walked about 2 miles to debarkation point.  Neither hotel or limo service would reimburse passengers for inconvience.  Would recommend guests arrange for own transportation.

title: Overpriced
review: Over priced for what you get, this could be due to the location, but the hotel itself seemed a bit older and could use some updating. Half of our TV channels did not work and the internet service was absolutely useless.

title: Good stay. But Housekeeping kept knocking on door
review: Had a very pleasant stay at this hotel. Room was clean. But had put Do No Disturb sign on door handle and housekeeping came by three times in morning, knocking on door. I had to come out of bathroom to answer one time and was told they would come back later. And the woman bolted off before I could respond. The third time she knocked and opened the door immediately. It wasn't checkout time, so I don't know why she kept coming by. When I finally checked out I noticed the sign had been taken off the door.  Not sure who removed it, but it caused a bit of a nuisance.

title: Excellent facility and front desk person Marcus was superb, knowledgeable, and friendly.  An asset to Hilton Chains worl
review: Excellent location, great rooms, friendly staff, walking distance to Las Olas and all restaurants and clubs.  The room was spotless, the AC was great and quiet. I found the front desk staff to be extremely courteous and efficient.

title: Pleasant Surprise!
review: This place surprised me for a Hampton Inn. It had nice amenities, friendly staff and room was large and clean. We had one problem, AC wasn't working, we called housekeeping and someone came in minutes to replace the thermostat. I would go back and recommend it.

title: Pleasant Stay
review: We stayed just one night because we were there to attend a concert in town.  We didn't spend much time in the hotel but the location was perfect for our stay.  It was clean, the staff very pleasant and helpful.  The next morning we strolled along Las Olas Blvd. before heading back home.  It was a very pleasant experience.

title: Pre Cruise Stay
review: Dear Guest,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your review regarding your recent stay at our hotel!  We do have a lot of guests come in town for concerts at some of the local venues.  We would have to agree that we are the closest and most convenient location when attending a show downtown!  We are delighted to hear you found our staff to be pleasant and rooms to be clean.   We hope to see you again in the near future!  Happy Holidays,   Hampton Inn Management

title: Clean, Safe Place to Stay...
review: My family stayed here for one night before boarding the next day on Royal Caribbean's Oasis of the Seas.   We arrived late, near midnight. Cab fare was approximately $20USD from the airport to the hotel. There isn't much for food after 11pm. We ended up cabbing to the near Denny's for a very late dinner.  The rooms are spacious and clean. The bedding is superb and will leave you with a well rested night. The bathrooms could use a reno but it serves its purpose.   The complimentary breakfast was perfect! Everything you could want to start your day. The free shuttle to the cruise terminal was fantastic.  The staff were quite friendly and helpful.  Overall a nice stay however the location is something to be considered if you're looking for late night food options.

title: Hotel Experience
review: Hello from sunny south florida!  Thank you so much for you wonderful review of your stay with us.   We are so glad to hear you found the rooms to be clean and bedding to be superb!  We get compliments often on how comfortable our Hampton Inn beds are!  Our complimentary breakfast and cruise port shuttle is definitely one of the amenities that set us apart from other hotels.  Our team will be very happy to hear they have made another lasting impression on one of our guests. We hope you had a wonderful time on your cruise and we look forward to seeing you next time you are in Fort Lauderdale!  Best regards,   Hampton Inn Management

title: Disappointed
review: Overall a solid stay. Very close to the fashionable Las Olas downtown area, this hotel is a bit dated, but very secure and clean. The staff here is quite amazing - all very helpful, friendly and accommodating. Marcus and Widny are particularly stellar employees, so be on the lookout as they are solid resources for all things related to your stay inside and outside of the hotel. Pool area very nice and gym is always kept very clean as well.

title: Pretty cruise.
review: Ready for a remodel. Make sure you get a city view,  other side is kind of depressing.  Friendly staff, good staff easy walk to Las Olas. You probably don't want  to walk way from Andrew Ave.  Beds are comfortable.  Standard Hampton Inn breakfast.  Same bar with limited menu. Rooms do have microwave and refrigerator and the do sell microwavable foods.

title: Disappointment at a high price
review: I stay at hotels more than 40 nights / yr. about half business and half leisure.  at a four night cost of over $500 I expect a spotless bathroom. This one was certainly not.  I understand an occasional lapse but the floor had ground in dirt and the tub was not close to white.  Breakfast area and bar were fine and bed and bath linens were clean but the bathroom really ruined it.

title: Florida Getaway
review: Our 1st time at a Hampton Inn and we can truly say we enjoyed the whole experience.  The *free* breakfast was wonderful and the staff was always keeping it fresh and clean. The pool area was relaxing and the pools temperature was perfect.  We will be sure to chose a Hampton Inn again and hope it will keep it's same quality as our Florida hotel.

title: The management goes above and beyond
review: There are many choices in the Lauderdale area, but you won't be disappointed with this property.   I am a frequent business traveler and I give this Hampton high marks !   The team of Peaches Crawford, general manager, and Leslie Dean, director of sales, are running a great operation.   If you have a problem, ask for them, they can't do enough for their guests.  Note:  The garage is tight, so don't rent a full size SUV...lol

title: Nice stay close to Port Everglades
review: Stayed here the night before our cruise ship sailed out.  Nice clean rooms.  Free breakfast was exceptional with cooked omlets, sausage, potatoes, cereal, fruit etc.  Clean Pool and hot tub. Out door patio to sit on by pool.  It was a $23 cab ride from airport to hotel.  Restaurants and drug store were in walking distance which we walked during daylight hours and felt safe.  $10 per person transportation to the Port Everglades, make a reservation when you arrive.  They had an appetizer/cash bar set up in the evening.  Workout equipment could use some updating.  Would stay here again.

title: Ft Lauderdale
review: We spent 2 nights at the Hampton Inn in downtown/Las Olas Ft Lauderdale.  The hotel was clean and the lobby was bright and inviting.  The front desk personnel, Widny and Cynthia were quite friendly and made us feel welcome right away.   The room and bathroom were clean.  Towels could be nicer (they were somewhat tattered and thin).  The bar / breakfast area was pleasant and clean.  Breakfast food was fresh and hot items were hot.  The pool area was clean. The location of the hotel was convenient.  A $15 taxi ride from the cruise ship port as well at $15 taxi ride to the airport.   We walked to restaurants and the water taxi.  Important that you are aware that the hotel is definitely in the middle of old downtown area near the courthouses so the outside surroundings are a bit…

title: Would like to give this more stars
review: as always very happy at any Hampton Inn....and have stayed at many.............but........the room stunk with a smell like a really strong horrible perfume! Literally had a semi allergy attack from it. Our friends also got a room on another floor and same issue! so must be in all rooms. Thinking it is something coming through the air conditioning vents? gag me.

title: Casting Crown Concert
review: Had a nice time, close to Las Olas.. The view we got wasn't the best but it worked for us we were there for just one night.. The bed was very very comfortable. The room was spacious although the bathroom were not that big.

title: Between Cruises
review: Conveniently located close to Las Olas Boulevard, clean and comfortable room with free internet (good speed) and free cooked breakfast. Be sure to get the free 10 am shuttle to the cruise port as the 12 o'clock run can be busy.

title: Great Staff
review: This was a great hotel.  All  staff were extremely pleasant.  Everyone was lively and greeted you and truly treated you as a guest.  I would recommend this hotel for business or pleasure.  It is conveniently located downtown in the downtown area.  I would recommend to my friends or to anyone going to Ft Launderdale.  We will definitely go back and stay at this hotel.

title: GREAT HOTEL BRILLIANT STAFF
review: We would recommend this hotel for its value the position of the hotel in Downtown Ft Lauderdale the helpfulness of the staff who go about their daily routines in a happy manner and who went out of their way to make our stay so enjoyable. We have stayed here before and will do so again in the future.

title: Pleasantly surprised
review: Place was great. I can honestly say that this could have been one of the best places I've stayed. Tiny bit off the beaten path but we walked to Las Olas and other places with no issues. Very clean, breakfast included, staff friendly and awesome parking. Beds are soooo comfortable!

title: Great hotel with friendly staff
review: The hotel was really good. Friendly staff that helped us with all our questions. Really comfortable beds. Breakfast, that was included, was simple but good :) the hotel had wifi, which was a good thing too :)

title: Great place to stay pre cruise
review: We booked this hotel a few weeks before our cruise as we are Hilton honors members, and got a good rate.  Arrived at the hotel a few hours early, yet our room was ready. The hotel was decorated for halloween.  There is a spacious lobby area, and different from most Hamptons we have stayed at, the breakfast area is on the 2nd floor along with a bar area and the poolarea.  The pool area was large with many seating areas and a small hot tub.  The room we had was a king one bed with plenty of room and many outlets to connect laptops and cell phones.  The one item I was disappointed in was the $12 a day parking fee. We didn't even spend 12 hours there. I feel that one of the perks of being an honors member should be free parking,  One safety feature I did like was the use of key…

title: Clean
review: We stayed at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale following a cruise. The location is in the heart of downtown and approximately 5 minutes by taxi to Fort Lauderdale Beach and just three blocks from the lower end of Las Olas Blvd.  We found the front desk staff to be very helpful in providing information on how to best get to the beach via taxi or the Sun Trolley ($1.00 to the beach). The rooms were large and included a microwave, refrigerator and safe. Television included a large number of cable stations. Nice complementary breakfast was enjoyed by all four of us including the two grand-daughters. The hotel office had a large business office including three computers and a printer. We contracted with an onsite vendor to travel to the Ft. Lauderdale airport for $25.00.

title: Happy with my stay
review: Hotel had a very upscale feel.  Beds were comfortable.  Pillows were flimsy.  Room was good size.  Breakfast was very good.  Not as close to Las Olas as I thought it would be still had to take a short drive to get over there but the hotel was nice overall.

title: Hampton Inn
review: Very Nice,Clean,clean beds,clean bathrooms,hot water,good shower.Hot breakfast,staff on point,pool and cabana area really nice you could stay out there all day.They had really good coffee,also youre right at las olas with great shops and food,beaches two minutes away.the air conditioning was so cold,it was a very nice stay for a two star hotel.

title: Yes
review: Dearest Guest,   We truly appreciate you taking the time to write a review regarding your wonderful stay at our hotel!  We are delighted to hear you recognized the high standards of cleanliness we have for our guest rooms and hotel overall.  Our complimentary coffee served 24 hours a day is also a hit with many of our guests!   It sounds like you enjoyed our close proximity to Las Olas Blvd and the beach!  We hope we will see you again when your travels bring you back to Fort Lauderdale!  Sincerely,  Hampton Inn Management

title: Rooms Need DEEP Cleaning and Better Experienced Front Desk Help.
review: Great pub just down the block, area can be a little sketchy, but in revitalization process.  Easy access to !95 so was a convenient place to stay.  Only negative was that they charge for parking, usually don't get this with a Hampton Inn.

title: Great price and location!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for your review of the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!  We are very happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us and found our hotel to be in a convenient location downtown.   We hope to see you again in the near future!  -Hampton Inn Management

title: Great place to wind down but Reception Staff could do better
review: The room of this Hampton Inn was great and super clean. And the beds super-comfy. A nice feature is the outdoor swimming pool, where you can sit in the evening for a smoke and a glass of wine. Really nice! Parking is adjacent and very convenient, but you have to pay for. There was an issue with my credit card (double charge), but the receptionist was pretty rude and almost yelled to me that I was giving her a hard time and I should call my bank...Strange. The hotel is not close to the beach, but Las Olas is a 3 minute drive away.

title: Fast Efficient Clean
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay at our hotel.  We are so glad that you were able to relax and enjoy a glass of wine by our pool.  Our pool area seems to be a favorite among guests for coming together in the evenings and enjoying a cold drink from the bar.  I am glad that you found it very easy to access Las Olas Blvd as well.    We apologize if there was miscommunication with one of our staff at the reception desk.  We do our best to ensure all of our guests receive the highest level of service.   We look forward to having you here again when your travels bring you back to Fort Lauderdale!  -Hampton Inn Management

title: Worse Hampton Inn I Have Ever Stayed Inn
review: I was a able to have an early check-in, due to my cruise having an early departure, I just wanted quick availability, and a clean, comfortable room. The customer service was amazing, and the room was comfortable and clean. and when I needed transportation, the hotel was more than willing to call me a cab. I would recommend this location

title: Great place to stay!
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to do a quick review on your recent stay at our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that we were able to accommodate your early check-in request and assist you with your transportation needs.  Our staff will be excited to hear they have received another great review from one of our guests.   We look forward to seeing you here again!  -Hampton Inn Management

title: Honest review. Read this before you stay here.
review: This Hampton Inn needs work. The bed was not a typical Hampton bed and was not comfortable.  Many of the carpets both in the room and the hallways were threadbare.  We booked a complete cruise package which included one night stay, a drink at their bar, a welcome bag, and parking during the cruise.  When I checked in, I had to request the parking which the gentleman originally was only going to give me one night, I never received the welcome bag or the drink coupon and the transportation was only one way (which was indicated during the reservation) however no one had any idea how to book return reservations.  The breakfast was ok, but the staff was only so so, not very friendly like many of the Hilton hotels I stay in.  All in all when I return to this area for another cruise or…

title: An Amazing Stay!!!
review: This hotel was absolutely wonderful.  From the service to the amenities, it fit the bill.  We were in walking distance to most things that we wanted to do and when we weren't, we took either the Water Taxi which was about a 10 minute walk, that picked us up at Stop 1 right in front of Briny's Irish Pub (great tables by the water with a cold draft and yummy chicken wings with Blue Cheese dip) or we took the Sun Trolley that has a run along Las Olas Blvd., to Fort Lauderdale Beach.  The rooms were great, the pool I'll be dreaming about this winter (so clean and warm) and the free breakfast was magnificent.  The staff was very helpful, but in particular a lovely lady named Janise that looked after the breakfast area was a standout.  She is a hard worker that is very friendly.  I…

title: Nice location.
review: We stayed there for 3 nights when we moved to Fort Lauderdale. 11 floor was beautiful, you can touch the sky. I liked a lot pool and lounge area, feel so comfortable and relaxing. Breakfast was super good and stuff friendly. We could walk to our new apartment from there, location of hotel very good. Now i can see the sign of hotel from my room. A big "+" for smell in the room and hotel. Usually when you coming back to your room from breakfast it's smells like stuck air. In Hampton smell always fresh!!!

title: Not bad
review: Staff were super nice and helpful. Pool was beautiful.  Many homeless nearby and didn't feel safe to walk, but accessible by taxi. Elevators had security of key cards needed to assess, so that was nice. Lobby was beautiful. Breakfast was average. Fruit salad was below average. Waffle options were nice. Rooms very comfortable, pillows excellent. Even liked wallpaper in the bathroom.  Tub drain was not working properly.

title: Another Great Hampton Inn Stay!
review: Stayed on the stay and cruise room rate. Staff was excellent and such great customer service skills. Breakfast was good and shuttle to and from the cruise terminal was super. Will definitely stay here again when cruising from Port Everglades.

title: my2cents
review: The hotel is average quality however the area is undesirable.  There are restaurants within walking distance however even the ipad maps app gave a 'safety warning' stating it was not advised to walk in this area.

title: Nice place for a short stay
review: We stayed here for 2 nights before we departed on our cruise. This was a nice hotel for that purpose. It was a $23.00 cab ride from the airport. Staff were wonderful to deal with. Wecan't say enough nice things about the way we were treated. Free breakfast was pleantyful, bed was very comfortable, shower was great and it was very reasonably priced. Free shuttle to the port was a bonus. This hotel is about a 15 walk from the restaurants on Las Olas blvd. and about 30 minute walk from the beaches. We came back late from dinners and felt very comfortable walking in this area. If you are looking to be in the centre of things,this may not be for you. If you are looking for a hotel that I described above and don't mind walking then this will work very nicely. Train sounding its…

title: Fort Lauderdale Hampton Rocks
review: I really enjoyed my stay at Hampton , the employees were polite and made me feel like I was their number one priority. Not to mention the white covers were really clean and soft. I slept like a newborn baby all week. I shall return!!!

title: Great Location near downtown and Great Service
review: Great Service at this hotel.  Bathroom tubs could use some attention as they look like they either need to be redone or replaced.  Other than that it was great, no issues.  Craig in the restaurant is a huge help and does a great job so praise him as you encounter with him.

title: Great Hotel near Las Olas Blvd
review: We chose this hotel being close to Las Olas Blvd. Upon arriving, we experienced a down pour, which is normal during this time of year. We just waited an hour and walked to Las Olas for dinner. The room we had was nice,  clean and quiet, even though we there was a huge group staying at the hotel. The bed was great, slept like babies!  We will use this hotel again, if we come back to the area!

title: hampton inn review
review: Only place I stay when in the area. Hotel and staff are excellant. Hotel is convient to many shopping and restaurants. Also very close to beach. Night life entertainment is very easy to get to. Pool are at hotel is always clean and well maintained.

title: We'll be back!
review: From the moment we walked in to the lobby we felt welcomed. Very friendly staff, clean hotel, great parking security. Our room was large and very comfortable with great pillows! The breakfast was excellent with good variety of foods. We left a hat in our room and I called and the lady was so nice and accommodating. It was mailed ack to us within one week.

title: Nice on the pictures only
review: Old hotel, bad neighborhood (drunks on the street).  far from the city center. (15 minutes walk to reach the main street). beds are not comfortable. did not have roller bad to add in the room. small room.

title: Vacation
review: Very good hotel and location to downtown. Staff was very accommodating with late arrival in providing a meal in the bar. Parking adjacent but limited. Those comforts on the bed are not needed in the warm South of the country.

title: Hampton in Review in Fort Lauderdale Florida Downtown
review: Rooms need to be updated. Sticky note place on head board telling us the linen was changed and clean. Bottom of cabinet in which the refrigerator was sitting was missing. The bathroom was clean just not to my standards. Very outdated, my 19 year old daughter couldn't stop laughing, at the décor. Glad our stay was just for the night.

title: Great location
review: The location and price of the hotel are awesome. Walking distance to Las Olas and short drive or taxi ride to all other attractions like the beach. Friendly staff! Great breakfast! I would definitely recommend staying at this hotel!

title: Great Place
review: I have to say I was nervous when I booked this hotel as I had read a few reviews online that were not good. Let me say they were all wrong. Not only is this hotel in a good area but it was secure and clean.   Our room was spacious, clean and well stocked. We had a great view. Even when our air went out in the middle of the night the night desk reception was quick to change our room to one that had sir and a great view as well.   The pool are is lovely and the hot tub was amazing. Parking garage is secure as is hotel no one get s in without a room key. We were in walking distance from wonderful restaurants, and historic downtown where we could shop and just relax.   Breakfast was very good from hot cereal and cold to eggs, bacon, waffles , fruit, coffee, tea and juice. Simply…

title: Fabulous and Awesome
review: When in Ft Lauderdale I stay at this hotel when i need to work overtime,  since it's close to work. The people at the front desk are awesome. They go out of their way to make sure your stay is a pleasant and a comfortable one. And if for any reason you experience anything less, they will make it right. Big thumbs up!!! Cheryl, if you check this, you and your crew are the best.   Sincerely,   William Harper

title: No complaints
review: Can't say anything negative about our stay.  The staff was excellent, the rooms were clean and an overall nice property close to all.  The were able to accommodate us early when the room was ready and had given us a later check out as a Honors member.

title: Hampton Inns Are CLEAN
review: I have become quite a fan of Hampton Inns. I've stayed at several now in different cities. The best part for me are the crisp, clean white sheets and towels. You don't have to turn around and tip someone every minute like some comparable hotels. I can carry my own bags, no problem. And they had a cruise package that let me park my car for free for 7 days.

title: "Hampton Man"
review: Smiles...and more smiles is what I get when I think of how satisfied and pleasant...not to mention, clean and affordable, all came together with my last visit at Hampton Inn (250 North Andrews Avenue, Ft.Lauderdale, FL 33301)  Veronica...who is so outstanding at her job, along with the others, have truly made a "Hampton Man" out of me..smiles. I like clean...I certainly found that, I like a comfortable bed...I found that also, and I also like when I can afford the product. And yes I found it all wrapped up in the Inn...Hampton Inn. And now I'm a "Hampton Man"...I guess it will be for life...smiles ~ Sam Chatelain : )

title: CEO
review: property is a bit out of date - dire need of remodeling. tile looks dirty, bedding old, customer service so so. bathroom is way out of date. price was not bad.  just on the out skirts of downtown - a lot of people hanging around the out side of  the property.

title: GREAT SERVICE
review: Was exactly what was expected.  The service was GREAT.  Breakfast was a REAL breakfast not just donuts and coffee but real home cooked food.  Would have like more shade in the pool area and maybe a bigger fitness area but we were on vacation and spent most of our time at the beach and around town.

title: Great views and friendly staff
review: This was our first time staying he r e and would go back again.  Great location with lots of restaurants and night life close by.  Very clean and exactly what I would expect from a Hampton Inn.  Very reasonable rate as well as reasonable  parking fee.

title: Great Stay
review: Clean, Comfortable and Safe.  Staff was wonderful!  Beds we comfortable.  Great Location.  Wifi worked good.  Breakfast was good, not the typical Hotel Breakfast.  Don't agree with paying for parking though.

title: Good stay
review: Friendly and professional staff Good value and location $12 per day parking additional charge about half of other similar hotels Decent breakfast food Great coffee Not very pedestrian friendly, although possible.  Would not walk at night. Would stay here again

title: Moving to the area
review: I used this hotel the night before I moved into my new apartment.  They were so accommodating of my moving truck, helping me to find a safe place to park it when it wouldn't fit in the garage.  The bar employees were also great, and the snack choices in the store at the check in were awesome and reasonable.  Will recommend when I have friends in the area.

title: Disappointed in location
review: We had tickets to ride the Jungle Queen in Fort Lauderdale, and decided to make a night of it, coming from Jensen Beach. We researched the area, and narrowed it down to two hotels, the Hampton Inn and the Riverside. The reviews of the Riverside made us think that the hotel would be too old and the rooms not to our liking, so we picked the Hampton Inn, always a favorite of ours. And looking at the map, we felt it would be an easy walk to the action on Las Olas. First let me say that the Hampton inn itself was exactly as we expected. Clean rooms, courteous staff, a really nice older hotel. It really was a very short drive, maybe 6 blocks, from the trendy area of shops we wanted to be in. However, the area was so sketchy that you would never think of walking from the hotel to that…

title: Happy with the Room, Staff, Hotel!
review: This is located on the edge of downtown, but nearby las Olas and other places.  Worth it with great rooms, great pool, great breakfast, great price.  I was lucky to find it on a 4th of July weekend.  Lots of families.

title: The Hampton Inn Served Its Purpose Well
review: My family and I were in Fort Lauderdale for the July 4th weekend to kick-off our summer and visit relatives.  The Hampton Inn was conveniently located and more reasonably priced when compared to the other hotels near the beach. Complimentary breakfast was great, except as we neared July 4th and more guests arrived, it became like a zoo (felt a bit like the "Hunger Games" -- some guests were very greedy and food ran out as the 10 am end-time drew near). Room was average, housekeeping cleaned every day. Laundry room was convenient for washing swimsuits and towels. Gym was horrible though. I didn't break a sweat after 20 minutes on the one elliptical machine there (they should have a treadmill at the very least). Also, they lock all doors to the pool at 10 pm! I wanted to sit by…

title: Nice Hotel in an Odd Area
review: I stayed at this Hampton Inn before flying back to California after a two week road trip around the south. The area was a little odd. I have never been to Ft. Lauderdale, so I don't know if it was par for the course, but the immediate area around the hotel is a little surreal and Twilight Zone-ish. We were there on Sunday and Monday and there were no other human beings outside at all. There were a few homeless dudes enjoying the free AC at the library a few blocks away, but other than that I felt like were all alone in the city. Even Las Olas, which I thought was the main street in Ft. Lauderdale was dead. That being said, our rooms were nice, with nice beds and linens, and a good TV to watch some women's World Cup. House keeping was great. The girls at the front desk were…

title: Service and Price
review: Although the actual location of the Hotel is not prime, not a great view, and on the edge of downtown, you are a 7 minutes ride to the beach, restaurants and wherever you want to go. The area is safe. The price is very good, although they charge you for parking. But as almost all Hampton Inn, you have free wifi and a good breakfast. Rooms are what you expect from this chain, comfortable and roomy. Service excellent. We didn't like the room assigned and they switched us right away, our plane was leaving late in the evening and we were able to check out after 3 pm, and leave our luggage till evening. So we were able to spend the morning at the beach, had lunch and then go back to take a shower. Overall good for your money. We are a little bias since we like Hampton Inn as a chain…

title: Awesome Experience
review: Wonderful experience staying at the Hampton Inn Hotel, special thank you to Veronica and David that operated the front desk very professional and I must say were very friendly and nice and made my accommodation one of the best. All staff were awesome they attended to my needs, continental breakfast was great.   My overall experience was excellent.

title: Stay Experience
review: Front desk employees were excellent. Extremely helpful, Anything I needed was attended to immediately.Accomodations were what I have come to expect from Hampton. Really do not have any serious problems with either this Hampton location or the total experience.

title: Parking SUCKS!
review: Folks, this is a standard Hampton Inn... it's 'fine'.  But the only parking available is a ridiculous, poorly built parking structure that puts your vehicle in jeopardy at - literally - every turn.  The aisles are very narrow, the turns are completely blind, and before you know what's happening, you're nose to nose with another car.  Hopefully you avoided the accident, but now you have to figure out how to get past each other.  There are other Hamptons in the area... take a pass on this one.

title: Cruise Port Convenience
review: Recently my wife and I took a cruise out of Fort Lauderdale.  We found it convenient to drive down with a rental car and spend a night there at the Hampton Inn before the cruise started.  During hotel Check-In and through-out our stay, we found the hotel staff to be very friendly.  Check-In was quick and efficient.  When we got to our room, we found that I could not put a new combo on the room safe.  Maintenance responded quickly to my call and resolved the problem by clearing an old combo and setting it to accept a new one.  The room was nice size and very clean.  It was located facing a side street and was very quiet.   The AC system had been updated so that you can control it from a wall mounted thermostat.  The fan was pretty quiet.  During check in, we asked for…

title: Overall
review: Overall the hotel has great accommodations. The staff can be a little more friendly . Be assertive with them if you happen to want or need something for they were not as attentive as they should be. But over all the hotel was in a great location and the amenities were very good and worth the rate

title: Enjoyed Our Stay - Good Value
review: Stayed 2 nights recently. Booked on-line, no check in problems. Room was clean. Breakfast was good. Staff was friendly. On site parking garage ($12) night was a plus. Central location was close to Las Olas and the River attractions. We would come back.

title: Needs updating!
review: Best thing about the hotel is the location. Lobby was extremely hot and so were the hallways. Took 2 hours for them to bring the crib to the room. The bathroom is old and needs updating. Did not have granite countertops like other Hampton Inn's I have stayed at in the past. And you have to pay $12 for parking. This hotel did not impress me.

title: Like home away from home
review: My husband has been working in Ft Lauderdale for over a year and after trying many hotels in the area, settled on this Hampton. I had the pleasure of traveling with him recently and got to find out what it was he liked about this hotel. The number one answer from what I experienced is the staff! They literally treated us like family! From Laurence at the front desk who greeted us when we first arrived, and Cynthia, also front desk both of whom handled several requests I made like it was no problem whatsoever (although I'm sure it was!), to the various bartenders at the cozy bar in the hotel including Heather and Melissa. Not to forget Marcus (sorry if I'm spelling the name wrong) who seemed to be covering just about everywhere. I love it when people use my first name after only…

title: Excellent customer service
review: We were so pleasantly greeted by Veronica. She was very warm and accommodating to our needs. We were so close to Las Olas for the annual Wine and Food festival. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a nice comfortable stay with very reasonable pricing that won't break the bank...lol. I forgot to mention the pool and bar area... Very, very nice as well...

title: Enjoy even your unexpressed desires fulfilled and exceeded!
review: Our stay at this property was the second time, and while our first stay was satisfactory, this second stay was notably better. I am in the Hospitality business myself and this recent stay was  as if the hotel had been bought and was flying a different branded flag. "Fatima" the front desk Agent on Saturday took extraordinary measures to assure our stay would be perfect in every way and her Guarantee was astounding exceeded. I can appreciate that the hotel has many different wheels in gear, but more than pleased to say that her co-workers upheld the same standards in the Food and Beverage as well as Housekeeping to name a few. Veronica was our departure Agent and was as well very cordial and an extreme example of Hospitality taken to the next level. The GM, Craig Park, like any…

title: Ft. Lauderdale
review: Good central location at a reasonable price.  Good service with breakfast and evening drink included.  Next to city hall for conducting city business.  Also has convenient parking although they charge per evening stay which adds to room cost.

title: Home Away From Home
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed our delicious breakfast and bar! We hope to see you back soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: A great staff draws in guests
review: Great place to stay when you're away from home.  Customer friendly staff, clean facilities and good breakfast options.  The hotel is conveniently located near restaurants and shopping.  Easy to get around the area.  Very helpful staff.  Can't wait to visit again.

title: Clean and alot of perks
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. It brings us great joy to know that we are your home away from home! We strive on making sure our guest enjoy a wonderful stress free trip. We can not wait to have you back at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Heather at the Bar on Floor 2 is the bomb!
review: Great service.  Great attitude.  Decent bar food.  I look forward to her great personality every time I travel to Fort Lauderdale.  Also, the rooms are clean, the parking is very secure and the wifi speedy.    Joe B (aka Eric)

title: ONE DAY STAY!!!!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We are so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and that Heather was such a great impact on it with her wonderful personality! We look forward to seeing you soon on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale.   - Craig Park General Manager

title: Not sure what to say...
review: I would like to start by saying that this hotel has a great staff.  Fatima and Veronica were amazing hosts to myself and my family who just wanted a quick getaway.  We enjoyed every aspect of this property from the LOBBY to POOL, BREAKFAST, AND A FREE DRINK COUPON.  Very close to Water Taxi which we enjoyed.  I will like to truly again THANK FATIMA AND VERONICA for making our stay special!!!!!!

title: Excellent!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to write this great review. We are so pleased to hear that Fatima and Veronica truly made your stay and that you enjoyed all aspects of our hotel! We look forward to seeing you soon for another little get away at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: EXCELLENT STAY AND THE STAFF IS ALWAYS HELPFUL.
review: I stayed at this hotel because our travel planner arranged it.  I stayed 4 nights from a Monday to Friday.    Let’s start with the pros:  Check in was a breeze now that I can do it online with Hilton hotels.  Took no more than 5 minutes.  I chose a room on the top floor away from the elevator.  Hotel is safe – requires key card for the elevator to go to any residential floor (and there’s a reason for it.  See “cons”).  Rooms are adequate and relatively clean.  Bed is comfortable.  If you stay during the week, it’s quiet.  Breakfast in the morning was typical of a Hampton Inn - self-made waffles, sausage, scramble eggs, coffee, etc. On Thursday, the cruise crowd came in.  Not a big deal, just a bit more people at the bar and during breakfast.  Free internet was adequate, I didn't…

title: Would definitely return to stay at this Hotel
review: Memorial day weekend posed a problem for us to find a hotel to stay in on a family emergency. Thankfully Hampton Inn was there. Wonderful staff arranged a room for us for 6 days. Staff was amazing and the stay was excellent Clean comfortable room with all that you need on hand. Great breakfast (complimentary) Pool and hot tub clean. 2 Thumbs up

title: OK location, bad internet, bad staff
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are so happy to hear that we were able to comfortably accommodate you during a busy weekend. It brings us great joy to know that you enjoyed your stay and give us two thumbs up! We look forward to having you back at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Overall experience
review: Stayed for a weekend to do some deep sea fishing.  Internet worked intermittently and when we approached staff about it they were not helpful at all.  Very disappointed with their handling.  Breakfast was good though.

title: Amazing concierge service.
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We hope this does not stop you from giving us another try on your next deep fishing trip in Fort Lauderdale.   - Craig Park General Manager

title: Centrally located
review: Nice Hotel except for the aforementioned note. Staff was extremely efficient and friendly. I had failed to mention the air conditioning. The thermostat had "low battery" which possibly was causing erratic cooling. I grade "A" except for the "Corporate Rule" concerning Military.

title: Best Hotel Bed Ever!!
review: Great place to stay while in Ft. Lauderdale. Centrally located, it is easy to get to local as well as south Fl. ( Miami Beach ) attractions. Can't say enough about the king size bedding. I have a bad back, and I enjoyed the most restful sleep that I've had in months! Can't beat the excellent, varied free breakfast to start your day. Highly recommended.

title: Nice hotel.  Seedy area.
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your recent stay. We are so delighted to know that you enjoyed yourself with us! Our wonderful beds play a big role in making sure that all of our guest have a relaxing stay and the delicious breakfast is always a plus! We look forward to having you back at our hidden gem, Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Ready To Cruise
review: The hotel itself is what you would expect from a Hampton Inn.  However, the location actually scared me a bit.  It is located a couple of blocks from the intersection of Andrews and Broward roads.  The McDonalds that's on the corner had homeless standing outside and sleeping on the ground by the nearby dumpster.  The dining area, bar, and pool are all on the second level of the hotel and you need a room key to use the elevator.  Also, this hotel does not have a shuttle to/from the airport.  Again, the hotel itself was nice; the staff was pleasant; the room was comfortable, but I do not think I will stay at this Hampton Inn again due to its location.

title: vacation
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our pleasant staff. We hope the area does not discourage you from coming back and enjoying our wonderful Hamptonality!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Nice little dowtown gem
review: We stayed at this hotel the night before our cruise out of Port Everglades.  We chose this hotel because we LOVE the comfortable beds and the breakfast that is included.  This time, we chose the cruise and stay package.  That allowed us to leave my car at the hotel in a secure and covered lot.  The only drawback is that the hotel only offers shuttles TO the cruise port and not a return trip when you get back into port.  The taxi back was $26.

title: Anniversary
review: This hotel was a very nice and clean place to stay. The desk clerk, Fatima was very friendly and helpful! I hope I'm spelling her name correctly. She even gave us $25.00 for our anniversary and other perks too. The whirlpool and swimming pool was very clean, and the bed was nice too! I would recommend this hotel to everyone. Close to the beach too.

title: Laurence Abo - GREAT CUSTOMER
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed your Anniversary stay with us! We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our gift and the area. We hope to see you soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Troubled stay but attended to quickly and professionally after stay
review: I would like to commend Laurence Abo at the Hampton Inn (250 Andrews Avenue), although this hotel is not in an ideal location and was a bit noisy for me, Laurence is what made the difference for me.  I have spent many nights at Hilton Hotels, and Laurence by far is one of the GREATEST when it comes to good quality, good ole fashioned customer service skills.  A LOT of the Hilton Hotel employees have gotten away from satisfying th customer, but NOT Laurence, he has been exceptional and for that reason and that reason alone I am rating this place EXCELLENT.  Thanks again Laurence.....

title: Disappointed
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so pleased to hear that Laurence truly made your stay with his wonderful and excellent customer service. I will make sure to personally recognize him for doing such a great job with our guests! We look forward to having you back soon at The Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Thank you for the Excellent Service!!!
review: My husband and I were in the area for a conference in Ft. Lauderdale.  I arrived on a Wednesday, while my husband arrived the next day.  We booked the handicap accessible room as I have mobility issues.  I called in advance to see if I could get some assistance getting my things to the room.  Since this is not a typical offering for a Hampton property, I was pleased when they assured me there would be someone there to help me.  Upon arrival, just as promised, the front desk called someone to help me with my baggage to the room. Once I was settled in the room, I noticed that there was a white film on the bathroom wall, as well as covering the towel bars.  The refrigerator was smudged with what looked like food and the microwave was dirty.  The next morning, the second of a three…

title: Conference room
review: Service was excellent, Lennox did a great job, as well as Mr Lawrence front desk manager.  All staff were on top of all our needs.  Great place highly recommend this Hampton Inn.  Fabulous top shelf customer service.  Look fowarded to our next business stay and use of your conference  facilities.

title: Stay here if you go to Revolution Live
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to write this review. We are so pleased that you found our staff and customer service to be fabulous and top shelf! We truly look forward to having you and your business back soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: A short walk to Revolution Live concert venue and many restaurants and bars, this Hampton takes the stress away from driving and parking hassles, there is a great lounge area with full bar and food, excellent staff and rooms, centrally located in the downtown area and a ten minute drive to the famous Ft. Lauderdale beach.

title: You can feel the love!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review  your stay. We are so happy to hear that you were able to enjoy a stress free time with us! We strive on making sure all of our guests feel right at home. We hope to see you soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Management has everyone on point.
review: I was booked in this hotel by a business partner and from the first minute of my arrival to the moment I left the hotel, I felt looked after.  The front of the house team/ receptionist were always attemptive and always talked to one with a smile in their face, independent of the time of the day or night.  I haven't had an opportunity to fully enjoy all the hotel facilities. On the days I had breakfast, I enjoyed it and there was plenty to eat (self-service). I am not keen on disposable cuttlery so, this wasn't so positive in my opinion.  The bedroom was very clean, free wifi and powerful enough shower. These are the main important factors for me in a hotel of any category.

title: Recent Stay
review: I only rate this hotel "terrible" because of 1 incident - my Tag Heuer watch I left in my room when I checked out, grew wings or grew legs, and disappeared out of the room.  When I called the next day, (nobody stayed in the room the day I left), I asked if anyone turned in a watch, and the answer was no.  When the housekeeper was questioned, the answer was no.  Hmmmm....I spoke with the Asst GM, who told me in nicer words, "We are not responsible for anything left in the room after you check out.  Also, since the housekeeper has been working here for many years, and there have been no incidents after she has cleaned rooms in the past, I believe her." First time for anything...Lesson to you if you stay in this hotel - don't leave anything of value in the room, as it may grow…

title: Wonderful Service
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay. We hope this does not stop you from returning.  - Craig Park General Manager

title: EXCELLENT STAY
review: After a cancelled cruise we were greeted by a wonderful woman, I unfortunately did not get her name. Great service from the beautiful female bartender. Marcus at the front desk was so helpful as well. Thank you for welcoming us.

title: Lance's Fantastic Voyage
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We are so glad that you enjoyed our wonderful customer service and your stay with us! We hope to have you back soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Safest place in town!
review: Thank you Lawrence, Marcus, Cheryl, Widney, David, Alan, Janice, Roselyn, Heather and Billie for making our stay on April 18, 2015 "AWESOME". You all went above and beyond to accommodate our large group of nearly 60. My husband and I enjoyed the hot tub, delicious breakfast, complimentary drinks and cleanliness of our room. Thank you so much for your support with Lance's Fantastic Voyage!! The gift bags were awesome!! Whenever in Ft.  Lauderdale, Hampton Downtown Las Olas is where we will stay!!!

title: so-so experience
review: I was neither thrilled nor disappointed---  the room was a bit smaller than I anticipated.... The breakfast buffet was free-- selections very limited.  Somehow, I missed the parking expense of $12---- it did not break the bank but I missed the fee in the small print-- and that is all on me.

title: Eh
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are sad to hear that you did not fully enjoy your previous stay. Please feel free to let us know what would improve your trip during your next stay!  - Craig Park  General Manager

title: train noise
review: This is your basic Hampton Inn with a few exceptions.  It says it is in the Downtown Las Olas area but that is very generous on it's location.  It is a few minute walk or short cab ride to get to Las Olas.  Walking is a little dicey if you will be returning after dark.  If you get off course by 1 block you could really be in an area that you don't want to be.  The typical free breakfast was provided but since I was there for 4 nights, I grew tired of the same selection every morning.  The bar area and pool area are nice and relaxing.  Both are fairly basic but do the job.  I would not choose this hotel if I were vacationing with my family.  I would stay there for business again if I really had to but I will look for a different hotel the next time I go to Fort Lauderdale.

title: Works well for pre-cruise
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our bar and pool area during your stay. We hope to see you soon!  - Craig Park   General Manager

title: Mr Anthony Miller
review: This hotel had two problems:  (1) freight train noise throughout the night woke us up several times (our room faced the tracks, on 10th floor) and (2) equipment problems in fitness room.  Otherwise would have been ok. Not close to anything particularly nice either.

title: PreCruise
review: Very good services ! The room and bathroom were very spacious and clean. We loved the pool area with sofas and nice spots to relax. The breakfast was nice !!! Staff very friendly specially the supervisor and housekeeper (Josephine). We spend time walking from hotel to Las Olas and the next morning we had the free transfer to Port Everglades (15min).

title: Enjoyable stay!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay including our staff, our pool, and the great Las Olas area. We look forward to having you here again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park   General Manager

title: Everywhere we wanted to be was a short walk or short drive.
review: We had a very nice 1 night pre-cruise hotel stay at this hotel. We walked to many attractions from the hotel. Check in staff greeted us warmly and answered a few questions we had about the area. Lobby area is very nice and the hotel is very clean. Nice bar for a few drinks in the evening that also serve tapas. We were each given a free drink voucher for the bar when we checked in, another great surprise. The included breakfast buffet was very nice and did include some hot items. This hotel is a great choice.

title: Nice Property
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this wonderful review. We are so glad to know that you enjoyed all aspects of your stay. From check in, the bar, and to the Las Olas area. We look forward to seeing you soon!  - Craig Park   General Manager

title: We'll stay here before and after every cruise
review: The good:  -Good location -maintenance and housekeeping staff were friendly.   The bad:  -Toilet by the seat hinges was dirty, complete with a hair.  -They charged us for our last night, which was pre-paid through AMEX points. We had to call for a refund. - Need another person at the front desk as other have said

title: Not the best Hampton
review: The bed wasn't very comfortable & the air conditioner didn't work well but the cleaning lady, Greta, did a great job! We waited quite a while too check in but it was about 10:30 at night & there was only 1 guy working at the front desk. Not a bad walk to a lot of good places though.

title: Amazing customer service!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced during your stay and hope that this does not stop you from returning.    - Craig Park   General Manager

title: Great Location and Staff!
review: Stayed here for a conference. The location is a little off of Las Olas but it's a nice hotel. Free breakfast and on site bar which I did not expect at a Hampton inn. Most importantly the front desk associate Marcus was amazing! Extremely helpful. He provided great information regarding local attractions and handled our check in with ease.

title: Nice Hotel, Customer Service could be better
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our wonderful hotel and that Marcus was able to assist you with the area. We look forward to having you back soon!  - Craig Park   General Manager

title: Need More Help At Front Desk
review: Being a Travel Agent the first thing I look for is how I am greeted.  I have to say that the welcome we received at the front desk was amazing!  I will definitely be sending my clients to this hotel!  The location was great for night life as well as being able to walk to anything you need.  I will definitely be back!

title: perfect jump off to a cruise
review: Stayed here night before our cruise dropped the car at the airport caught a free shuttle to the Princess terminal. The hotel is maybe 20 minutes from princess or the airport. The Hampton is always awesome but this ones staff are great. Breakfast was decent as well.

title: Team Leader
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are all very glad to hear that our wonderful staff really made your night with us! We hope you have a safe and fun time on the Princess cruise! See you soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Excellent
review: The hotel staff was amazing. Their attitude of hospitality was quite impressive.  From front desk staff, sales, and the house staff the experience is worth repeating. They lived up to everything I expected for service, efficiency,  professionalism and courteousness! Something difficult to find these days.  Parking was clearing marked.  Shuttles readily available. Great job by all we encountered.

title: Extremely rude front desk staff
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to write this kind review. We are very pleased that we exceeded your expectations! We look forward to having you back soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Perfect couple of days
review: Amazing service. Amazing stay at a top notch establishment. The staff was so friendly and helpful at any hour.  Would stay there again anytime. We were treated like royalty. Breakfast was great! Beds were amazing.

title: Greatest staff ever
review: We. had the pleasure of staying there 2 nights before our cruise. The staff was great,rooms clean and location was the best. I'm a travel agent and I will be recommending this to my clients.  Great place to stay

title: Perfect location, if you're not into beaches!!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and our wonderful staff. We look forward to having you and your future guests here at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Nicest staff ever!
review: We had 2 stays in the last 10 days. We started our vacations with a 5 night stay, before going on a Bahamas cruise for 3 days and we returned to the Hampton Inn for 2 additional nights.  First of all the location is excellent. You're walking distance to Las Olas Boulevard for restaurants and shops, to the Water Taxis (which is a great way of discovering Fort Lauderdales) and many other attractions.  The staff is also very good, from the Front Desk to Housekeeping. The only "negative" area is at the breakfast, where the staff seems overwhelmed by the task. Several time during our total of 7 nights, we had to wait for eggs, bacon, milk...  Our first 5 nights stay was ok, as the bed and pillows did showed their age and was not that great, on the 4th floor. Our second stay, on the…

title: Nice hotel in optimal area
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are so delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our staff. We hope you had a wonderful trip to the Bahamas and that we see you soon!  - Craig Park General Manager

title: Clean/A small walk to restuarants
review: We only had one night in Ft Lauderdale and booked a room at the Hampton.  The room was very clean, the location convenient, the parking secure, the breakfast delicious but the best part of our stay was interacting with the nicest staff ever!  Everyone - desk personnel, cleaning staff, breakfast preparers - was helpful, courteous and friendly.  I would definitely stay there again.  It was refreshing to be around a staff that was genuinely happy to have you stay at their facility.  They took pride in their work and made you feel welcome.  A +!

title: Excellent Service, especially Lennox!
review: I stayed at the Hampton Inn for a trial team competition over the weekend, and the service was spectacular.  This should actually count as 8 reviews because my eight teammates agree.  From the moment we checked in everything we needed was taken care of quickly and courteously.    Lennox was especially helpful setting up the conference room for our team meetings and practice.  He was kind, always smiling, and enthusiastic to help us out.  Billy at the bar was cool too, as was everyone at the front desk.  Zero complaints.  Walking distance to a bunch of great bars and restaurants.  Five star service in an affordable comfortable hotel with excellent accessibility to the action in Ft. Lauderdale.

title: Great Location
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you and your team mates sharing your experience with us. We are so delighted to hear that you all enjoyed your stay and that Lennox and our team provided you excellent service! We look forward to having you all back at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.   - Craig Park   General Manager

title: four days and nights of recharging and relaxation
review: We liked that we were walking distance from the riverfront and museums. Staff was helpful and accommodating. The bathtub needed a face-lift to clean up the rust, but overall was a good time. There was lots to do with St Patricks day festivities and we used the local bus terminal is close for easy access to shopping and other attractions.

title: D Roberson
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and found our hotel conveniently located in the heart of all the St. Patrick's activities and Las Olas Boulevard. We hope to see you again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park    General Manager

title: Great service & clean
review: I usually do not write reviews on trip advisor but being an avid traveler for personal and business reasons this Hotel stood out for great service. From the moment I checked in Cinthia at the front desk was very friendly and informative as well as Billy at the bar and manager Kelly checked to see that my stay was exceptional, (which it was) When i return to fort lauderdale i will definitely be staying there again !.

title: Not recommended. Wait until they finally renovate
review: Let's start with the check in process.   A homeless man brought in all his belongings and decided t make the lobby his new home, harassing. Guests.  The hotel is way overdue a renovation.   Carpets stained and worn.  Internet didn't work and ofcourse they at first try to blame your computer, but I explained it didn't works on three different devices.  Hilton, time to enforce your quality standards or lose diamond customers like me

title: NJ Traveler
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your stay. We will be renovating the hotel soon and look forward to having you back!   - Craig Park   General Manager

title: So so Area does not feel safe
review: My wife and I had an excellent experience on our recent stay March 8-12.  The breakfast was superb. The staff went out of their way to provide us vegetarian choices for egg dishes.  The manager Laurence Abo also went above and beyond providing us free drink cards for our loyalty and provided us an extended checkout when I return flight was delayed.  Overall a great hotel, friendly and helpful staff and a central location for beaches, museums or shopping

title: Pretty much what I expected....
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your stay. We are beyond pleased and excited to know that we were able to exceed your expectations. We look forward to having you and your family here again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park   General Manager

title: GREAT PLACE TO STAY IF TRAVELING ALONE
review: When you see is near las Olas blvd when making reservation you are happy the soon as we arrive we notice the hotel was not worth it, bad are, Hotel worn out somehow dirty carpets look old, the ac did not work well

title: Not worth the money.
review: I have traveled enough to know that hotels will charge more for location.  I almost always stay at Hampton Inns for the consistency of quality and cleanliness.  I didn't care for this Hampton, first it was 229.00 for the room, 12.00 for parking and then add on a tax of almost 25%.  This place was not worth 266.00 a night.  Then they add on a charge that supposedly drops off after a few days for possible incidentals.  I am waiting to see if that happens.  The room was dark, small and old.  The halls are also dark(which lends itself to a dirty feel) and need brightening.  The darkness is due to the cheap cfl light bulbs that are used every where.  The breakfast area has few tables and mostly high tops or couches to sit on and is fairly limited when compare to other Hamptons  On…

title: It's a Hampton Inn - No more no less but decent considering!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay and hope that this does not discourage you from coming back.   - Craig Park   General Manager

title: Ft Lauderdale Downtown
review: I picked the property as it was the closest I could find available to Las Olas strip with restaurants and shops. Close to meeting also. I knew what it would be like so not surprised. It is about a 12 minute walk to the shopping area and maybe one skuzzy area in between. For Hilton Honors members, front desk is not versed with benefits even though there is a clear tray with goodies for members so you have to ask. You also get coupons for a wine/beer/soft drink but again ask. Gym was substandard although I pointed out each morning to the front desk and no real area to run as there is at the Riverside. BUT bar on the second floor is reasonable, decent appetizers to fill you up and the morning breakfast wasn't crowded and offered a decent selection. Also the breakfast bags at the…

title: March13th,2015
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for any inconveniences you experienced during your stay and hope that this does not discourage you from coming back.   - Craig Park   General Manager

title: What is this???..Mexico
review: Even though this hotel sits in a very busy area, it is very clean and the staff is very professional and helpful.  They even booked our shuttle to the cruise port and to the airport on return. Was very pleased with all the service and breakfast was great...

title: Solid option
review: Seems to cater to a mix of the business traveler and a sprinkling of tourists, owing to its location near downtown (such as it is) rather than the beaches. It's a bit of a walk to Las Olas Blvd where you'll find most of the shopping and restaurants but there is a municipal trolly bus that stops at the hotel every 15 minutes. I didn't use it but I believe it was free or very low cost. The hotel itself is everything you'd expect in an urban Hampton Inn. Decent, clean rooms not spectacular but what do you expect? It is a Hampton Inn not a Ritz. Actually on Hampton Inn standards I would rate this one a cut above (hence the four stars). Very nice lobby, small but nice pool, friendly and competent staff. It has the typical included breakfast, which is fine (and can be enjoyed by the…

title: Pre-cruise stay, just OK
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us as well as some of the amenities we have to offer! We look forward to having you here again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park    General Manager

title: Maybe the worst Hampton inn yet
review: This hotel is about a $20 cab ride from Airport. We knew this before we booked, but it would be nice if they offered a shuttle service, especially with the rates they charge for the Friday & Saturday night stays for pre-cruisers. As mentioned in other reviews, it is a 10 -15 minute walk to any decent restaurant as the hotel is slightly off the main Las Olas area. Not sure I would want to walk around this area at night. The hotel needs to address what appears to be a propane smell when entering the lobby. If it is from the gas dryers, it cannot be healthy for guests or staff. The staff were all pleasant and helpful and the breakfast was adequate. It has a nice pool area near the breakfast area. The rooms are tired. The carpeting appeared to be fairly new, but the bathroom, walls,…

title: Clean, friendly hotel
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and are pleased to know that all of our staff were pleasant and helpful. We look forward to seeing you soon!  - Craig Park    General Manager

title: Pricey but clean and secure hotel
review: The whole place needed a good cleaning first off, first in the corners of the rooms and hall ways. Mold in bath rooms dirty sheets, just not up to standards of a Hampton inn. The employees were nice and helpful, but management needs to spend some money or pay attention.

title: Hampton Inn Las Olas
review: Hotel was very clean, staff was very helpful and management was very professional. Good experience, I would come here again. I had a business meeting here and the staff made the experience very enjoyable.

title: Never too late
review: Dear Arguello99hk,   Thank you for taking the time to provide us with a review on your recent stay. We feel that it is our exceptional service that sets us apart from the other hotels. I hope in all encounters with our staff, that they were able to WOW you during your stay or meeting. Its always great to know that we made a lasting impression with just one short business meeting.     Once again thank you for your kind comments, I will be more than happy to communicate to the staff on how great our guest say they're doing! We look forward to serving you again in the near future.  Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: It is what it is
review: This was my first visit to Ft Lauderdale, and I was really pleased.  The staff was wonderful, the hotel and room very clean, the location was perfect. Would highly recommend.  Was there on business and the central location made it perfect for commuting to various areas.

title: Pre-cruise stay
review: Dear Corinne S,      Thanks for staying with us and for taking the time to share your thoughts and observations regarding your recent experience at the Hampton Inn. It's so lovely to hear that our staff was accommodating and that the overall presentation of the hotel met your expectations.      Your feedback is very important and the voice of our guest is the best tool we have to make improvements in the quality of our product and service. Once again thank you for sharing your thoughts and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future!\  Sincerely,  Craig Park  General Manager

title: Great Place to Stay
review: The hotel is OK.  Precruise overnight visit. Staff was friendly and attentive. Room was clean, comfortable and a good value. Location near city hall was a short walk to the Las Olas shoping area though we were a bit uncomfortable walking home at night from a nearby Riverwalk restaurant, passing by many homeless in the park.  I was surprised that they did not offer a free shuttle from the airport, a $25 bill I wasn't expecting. The free shuttle to the cruiseport was appreciated though we will have to cab back to the airport after the cruise.

title: Service Excellent - Bathroom a bit "tired"
review: My wife, son, and I stayed here for one night when we flew in a day earlier than planned.  Check in:  Seamless.  Very friendly staff provided handy map for nearby restaurants.  On premises garage parking was convenient but the $12/nt charge was a bit of a surprise.  The room:  Standard double with very comfortable beds.  Very clean.  A/C worked well and was quiet and easy to adjust.  Bathroom:  The only negative.  Tub had some discoloration and the tile in the corner was dis colored (looked dirty).  The bathroom was very clean.  I speculate that in the most recent renovation they did not change any of the plumbing or tile work so that is why.  Breakfast:  As usual for Hampton Inn.  Breads, cereal, omelet, turkey sausage, breakfast potatoes, fruit, coffee, juices.  Well-stocked…

title: Awesome location, safe location to walk to and from downtown area
review: Dear Roamin_Candle    Thank you for providing us feedback in regards to your recent stay at the Hampton Inn. We appreciate your positive feedback and are delighted to hear you say we provided "Excellent Service". We appreciate you highlighting the positive aspects of your stay, as well as areas that may benefit from additional attention, in particular the overall bathroom condition.  Thank you for the kind words of praise for our hotel. We look forward to your next visit, to show you how we are continuously improving.  Sincerely,  Craig Park  General Manager

title: Glorified Motel 6
review: I spent 2 nights alone and enjoyed the comfort of the Hampton Inn with the great breakfast buffet-good selection of fresh and cut up citrus fruits, the usual waffle maker and hot/cold cereals. I sat by the pool for breakfast. The coffee was a good brew! The bar is also located in the same area and offers a happy hr type of early evening with tappas.  Its a several block  walk(10 min) to Las Olas Blvd and the River Walk or up Andrews Ave to easily view the Andrews St drawbridge in action!  Easy access to both placse and only a 15 minute ride to the airport. The room furnishings were clean as expected with the super comfy linens.

title: Better for Business Travelers
review: Dear Joan M,     Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas! We are ecstatic to hear that we have accomplished excellent service. I’m sure the staff would love to hear your compliments on things such as our: Great breakfast selection, warm and inviting bar and the comfort of our rooms.     Giving our guest a home away from home is what we like to provide and I am pleased to know that we surpassed that. We look forward to serving you again and thank you for your generous feedback!  Kind Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: convenient hotel close to las olas
review: I inquired to staff about getting power bars or oatmeal packets for breakfast since I had to leave at 5:00am to run a marathon.  Staff does NOT make exceptions to the weekly breakfast bag for a weekend day.  Got the runaround to see if I could get a late checkout so I could shower after running 26 miles.  Mind you, I returned at 12:15pm; just 15 mins past checkout.  Good thing I had not checked out and I was finally given the go ahead.  When paying  $300/night  for a room, I expect more than Motel 6 service.  Employees should be empowered  to make decisions.

title: Pre and Post Cruise Accomodations!!
review: This was my 4th time staying here in the past 11 months and as per usual I am beyond satisfied with my stay here. Just happened this time to personally meet the manager of the hotel who gave me excellent advice on dining locations and attractions in the Fort Lauderdale area that I had not been aware of. All the staff were very welcoming, friendly, and very helpful. I stayed here before my cruise and it was great. When I arrived after my cruise was over the staff stored my bags for me at around noon and called me as soon as my room was available for me. With a pool, hot tub, evening bar of appetizers and drinks, and well stocked fridge and snack concession on the main level what more do you need! Still highly recommend staying here any time you visit Fort Lauderdale. For $4-16…

title: Great Hotel
review: This hotel was in a great location, the room was very clean and the bed was awesome. Probably best of all was the provided breakfast. It had plenty of options and the quality of the food was great. I liked the security inside with having to use your room key to utilize the elevators.

title: Great place near cruise ports and airport in Ft. Lauderdale
review: Dear DennisL,   Thank you for choosing to stay at the Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas. It is great to hear that our breakfast selections was to your liking. Your saftey is extremely important to us and we ensure we have the best security system in place for our guest. On your next furture visit we encourage you to pass by the front desk for the best recommendations of attractions within walking distance.  Once again thank you for staying with us and for your five star rating.  Sincerely   Craig Park General Manager

title: pre and post cruise
review: A snowstorm in Chicago stranded us in Ft. Lauderdale as we were returning from a 2 week Caribbean cruise. Our airline found this Hampton Inn for us and we were so happy they did! It was clean, well-maintained, and had a free breakfast the next morning.  There are not alot of restaurants nearby, but we did find McGuire's Irish Pub a few blocks away and watched the Superbowl there. We'll keep this place in mind when we go to Lauderdale for our next cruise. Not cheap...but was a good find.

title: Convinient
review: Dear Sandinmyshoes1,    Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to provide us feedback on your recent stay. I'm ecstatic to hear that our hotel could turn an unpleasant experience into such an amazing one! Your 100% satisfaction is our main priority and I am pleased to know we have met your expectations. I will be sure to share you wonderful comments with the breakfast staff, maintenance and housekeeping department.  Once again thank you for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back!  Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Family Reunion July 2014 (will stay again)
review: We had the best time at this hotel, we had a block of 30 rooms for a 4 day weekend in July with a family of 135.We held a Saturday night event and all went well, out of all the family I heard no complaints, the rooms was clean, the food was good and the staff was great, we really enjoyed the 4pm cookies each day.What I really like was that you couldn't go from floor to floor without your room key.

title: Excellent Staff
review: Dear Jack1044,   Thank you for leaving your comments for the travelling community of TripAdvisor. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you found exceptional customer service at our hotel. We are pleased that our staff and sales team were able to assist you with your block of rooms and that you enjoyed our cookies.  Once again, thank you and we look forward to your future stay with us again!  Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: pre-cruise stay in Fort Lauderdale
review: The hotel is fine--typical for a Hampton Inn--2 queen beds, clean room, mini-frig.  We didn't get to explore the area but I would like to come back and see Las Olas area in the daylight.  The hotel is very secure--you cannot get the elevator to move unless you have a room key. What really set this hotel apart was the staff.   Our trip plans had changed at the last minute & I booked the hotel the night before.  The desk clerk was very helpful regarding about our reservation. When we arrived, Leonard helped us with parking and our bags.  He was friendly, helpful, and good-natured.  We next met Amelia, the desk clerk.  She, too, was very friendly, accommodating, and willing to work with us because our flight out the next day was very uncertain.  The next morning I explained our…

title: Decent hotel
