review: Dear Hiflyer,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback on your stay. We were pleased to see the high score for Service. We take all of the reviews we receive very seriously as they allow us to identify areas that may benefit from additional attention. As it has always been our goal to be the very best choice for service and accommodations we value the feedback of our guests.  We strive to provide our guests with an extraordinary experience and we are pleased to have the opportunity to do that for you during your visit with us. Your positive feedback makes it all worth our efforts. We look forward to welcoming you back to Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas area.  Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Hampton Inn and Suites
review: I knew that I could get a good nights sleep at a Hampton and have something for breakfast.  I needed to decide whether to stay near the airport and perhaps get a free shuttle to there and then take a taxi to the port the following day OR to take a taxi to a hotel near the port and then take a free shuttle to the port.  I am not sure if I did it the right way, but it worked out fine.  The two issues were the difficulty of getting a taxi at the airport (a lot of Friday evening arrivals, including me) and the traffic at the port that the shuttle had to go through before getting to my ship.

title: Good and Bad
review: The reviews I see Today Jan 28 '15) are either old or for a different hotel.. (Miami?)  Here is  one from a frequent cruiser.          the hotel itsself is clean and rooms are fine,breakfast is great and the soft tacos from the bar are fantastic.You will have to payextra for a shuttle or taxi to get to and from the cruise port but it is  a bit less pricey than closer hotels.           Location scared me at first, near city hall with some seedy buildings and homeless folks hanging around. If this doesnt bother you, a five or ten minute walk  will take you to their  huge new library,  wonderful art museum, city park, the canal and the very fun, full of shops and restaurants Las Olas district..We dont recommend eating at the nearby loud Scottish pub.There is a delightful little…

title: Fabulous experience!!!!
review: Dear Mellietex,    Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us your feedback. Your comments are highly valuable to us and will assist us in our continuous efforts to maintain and improve the service level we aim for. I am elated to know that you had a satisfactory stay at our hotel and appreciate your compliments regarding our hotel amenities and room accommodation.    Once again, thank you for your feedback and we hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back again very soon.  Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Spacious and comfortable
review: I had such a great experience that I signed up for the hotel loyalty program!!!! It was really nice that the reception staff identified me as soon as I said my family name... Was treated like a VIP... Great selection for the complimentary breakfast and really nice bar.  Very very nicely crispy clean room and bathroom... I will definitely be back!!!!

title: A good stay
review: Dear Dolapo A,    It is ALWAYS pleasant and humbling when our guests provide feedback that supports what we are in the business for; to make our hotel into something that people want to experience more than once. It is guest like you that makes this a fun industry to be in.       To be able to meet and exceed guest expectations is really why we are here, both challenging and rewarding for all of us. Always looking forward to being of service to you and yours again. Thank you for the comments!  Best Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Stay away!
review: Handy location with lots of amenities. Hotel in very good condition but the surrounding area is in a little decline, but nothing the hotel can do about that. Walking distance to Las Olas area, plus plenty of parking right beside hotel. Internet and breakfast included in second floor lounge a big bonus. Wouldn't hesitate to return. Airport shuttle would be helpful though.

title: Another good stay
review: This was our second stay at this hotel (since 2011) but this time was not as good (3 1/2 stars) though I would still recommend it.  I'm told that the hotel is under new management and it may account for some of the changes.  Firstly, the complimentary ride to the cruise port is limit to 2 guests per room.  Extra person is $7 each which is very reasonable except that there are only 2  scheduled- 10 am and 12 noon.  The bus took a long time to make the drop offs to all the ships and ours was the last one.    Secondly, we're not sure if it's because of the holiday period (Christmas) but the breakfast area was very crowded and everyone was scrambling for a table.  One staff was on duty and she was having a tough time keeping up.  This was a very different experience from my last…

title: Disappointed
review: Dear TImbuk2Ontario,   Thank you for taking the time to relay your comments regarding our property during your recent stay. I am happy to hear that our location worked for your needs. However, I understand that your stay was negatively affected by the crowded challenges. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience these may have caused you. We greatly appreciate your feedback as this gives us the avenue to improve on our guest services.  Once again, thank you for taking the time to write a review. We value you as our guest and hope you will continue to choose Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas  for your future travel needs.  Sincerely  Craig Park General Manager.

title: Great location very affordable and a 10 on cleanliness!
review: I’m surprised at all the good reviews for this hotel. I would not recommend it to anyone. The main reason we booked this hotel was because we’ve always stayed by the beach and wanted to experience downtown. This hotel is not located in a nice area of downtown. There are many homeless people in the area and we did not feel safe walking in this neighborhood at night. If we had to drive at night I would have stayed by the beach and driven in.  Our room had a funky odor of smoke mixed with some kind of cleaner trying to mask the smoke which gave me a headache. I went to get a glass of water from the tap and the water coming out was yellow. Overall it was not the experience I was hoping for and I will not be staying at this hotel again.

title: Nice Hotel
review: Dear Ja_caro6   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us and choosing to stay with us. On the other hand, it is disheartening that you were not able to fully enjoy some of our facilities. Allow me to apologize for any inconvenience the housekeeping service provided and location  may have caused. I have taken note of your comments and rest assured that these will be considered when making improvements in order for us to provide you with a more desirable stay.  Thank you again for taking the time to review our hotel and we truly hope that we will have another opportunity to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Craig Park General Manager

title: good location, good choice
review: Had a great stay at Hampton Inn N. Andrews Ave./Las Olas So affordable for Ft Lauderdale area. Easy to get to and great location...i.e. close to pretty much all the area has to offer. What's more is comfortable rooms and very clean. Can't ask for much more in a hotel! Really only downside is the parking. Not a typical parking lot you usually see in a hotel. Because of it's great location it has a secured parking lot with a gate on property that requires a walk. Not the best thing in the world if you're dressed and ready for. a night on the town in uncomfortable italian loafers lol All in this was a great stay that had me looking forward to getting back to my room after a full day.

title: Great stay!
review: This is by far the best hotel that I have stayed in, in a long time. The service was above average and I give it Five Stars!- clean, comfortable, caring, and on point! Most of all "Lennox" (who works at this fine establishment) was the most helpful of all the staff for me and my family, you don't find nice and helpful people like that just anywhere. I highly recommend "Hampton Inn" to anyone of my associates!

title: 6 DAY STAY
review: Dear ENOT1313,   Wow! Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us with feedback regarding your recent stay at the Hampton Inn. I am very pleased to read your comments on our service level. We always aim for 100% satisfaction and its always great to see all the results from our hard work. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.  Best Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Convenient, clean , caring
review: made use of public transportation from airport using instructions from hotel manager, was a quick easy ride. check in was very easy, very polite staff. we were given free drink coupons for use in the upstair bar. (1st time we ever saw a bar in a HAMPTON).very nice  the next morning while enjoying breakfast by the pool, staff member LENNOX greeted me with offer for towels, we engaged in small talk about himself, the area and hotel, what to do and what to see.LENNOX is a HAMPTON type of guy, this is the type of person that  represents HAMPTONS quite well. the breakfast  was hot, tasty and well maintained.OVERALL, WE TRULY LOVED OUR STAY.

title: OK Stay
review: Dear Eric S,   Thank you for staying and sharing your review with us. I appreciate your compliments regarding our friendly hotel staff. It was our pleasure to have hosted you and glad that we were able to make your stay enjoyable and comfortable.  We certainly work very hard to ensure our guests receive the very best service we can provide each and every day. We welcome you back  during your next trip to South Florida and look forward to surpassing your expectations.  Sincerely,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Helpful staff
review: This is my 4th stay in this property while traveling to/from cruises leaving from Port Everglades. First let me sa that I own and operate a small hotel in NY state and am used to having everything at my fingertips, free good working wifi, convenience and excellent service. This hotel meets all of my requirements. It's clean with comfy beds and pillows, convenient to Las Olas with great restaurants and shopping, easy access to the beach via a $1.00 adorable trolley ride and a complimentary ride to the cruise port. The staff, especially Lawrence, Craig, Fatima and Amelia are all very concerned with your comfort. The price is fair and they do offer AAA and Senior rates. Overall, not a beach property, but clean, convenient and caring,  I recommend booking early as they sell out…

title: Rooms were clean but
review: Other areas of the hotel were not. The corridors did not appear to be vacuumed. A pen lay on the floor outside the laundry room for 4 days. They charge $12 a day for parking, perhaps they could use that money to pay someone to remove the weeds, clear the rubbish and empty the bins. I have stayed at this property before when it was much cleaner and better maintained. I cannot fault our room which was clean, spacious and comfortable. Free breakfast was very good although can be very busy. They had open a bar which was a bit cramped and stuck in a corner. Staff were pleasant and helpful. Check in was quick and efficient although getting parked in the short stay car park can be difficult as large SUVs filled it up. Next time we are in Ft. Lauderdale we will probably stay elsewhere.

title: Pre-Cruise Trip
review: Dear Dagnewtownards,    Thank you for taking the time to review our property. Your 100% percent satisfaction is our main goal and your feedback is greatly appreciated. I am pleased to know that you enjoyed the conditions of your room and the staff. We apologize for any inconvenience the location of the bar may have caused you, unfortuanetly we have a limited space . In regards to the appearance of the property please be assured that your comments have been addressed and rectified with the proper departments. We look forward to providing a new and improved experience for you, during your next visit to Ft. Lauderdale and apologize for the shortcomings.    Sincerely,  Craig Park  General Manager

title: awesome service
review: We stayed 2 nights here before our family cruise. The rooms were nice size and the breakfast was good, though crowded. You could easily walk to the Las Olas area from the hotel. But not at night as there was very questionable characters across the street from the hotel.  We ate at the hotel bar one night - pizza and shrimp tacos, and this worked out well since we had already had a large lunch. We took the free shuttle to our cruise but I do not recommend it at all. There were 7 cruise ship stops on our bus and what was supposed to take 45 minutes took 2 hours! What was even worse was that they dropped off the smallest groups first at the Princess docks and the large Royal Caribbean group last. By going to Princess, the bus had to constantly make left turns to get to the next…

title: Very nice hotel, good location, good price.
review: Dear Mike M,    Thank you kindly for your feedback on your recent stay with us. I am pleased to hear that you were satisfied with your accomodations and our lounge area. We strive to provide our guests with an extraordinary experience and we are pleased to have the opportunity to do that for you during your visit with us. However, I want to extend my deepest apologies regarding your overall experience with the shuttle. This feedback was shared with the appropriate people that have helped us make a difference to ensure our valued guests' needs and expectations are met in the future.   Thank you again for your review and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Great visit
review: Awesome service! Ask for lennox...very willing to help...love that it is within three minutes walking distance of las olas nightlife... highly reccomend... Perfect service..rooms very clean.. very worth it. Breakfast is top notch and complementary. Free coffee free business center.

title: Just a few blocks off Las olas
review: it is a comfortable hotel. It is the first Hampton in  I have stayed at that had a bar. i have no complaints and it was a very good price considering I stayed during the highest season of the year. I would stay there again for sure. Parking is easy, the pool looked nice and the security was good. You probably would not want to was from las olas to the hotel at night, but it is a very short and cheap taxi ride.

title: Good night's stay
review: Dear thetraveler420    Its amazing to recieve such great feedback as we continually strive for excellence in customer service, we maintain the ideal of keeping guest satisfaction as our top priority. Your feedback is of great importance to us and allows us to monitor and improve our product and service continually. The Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas looks forward to serving you again during your next trip to the Ft. Lauderdale area.   Kind Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Pleasant pre-cruise experience.
review: This Hampton Inn is on par with any I have stayed in before. the Staff however was extremely helpful, and accommodating. Only 3-4 blocks from good restaurants, nice pool area, good wifi, breakfast included. All made my family comfortable before and after our cruise.

title: Family vacation
review: Found the staff to be very pleasant , welcoming and helpful. Facility itself, while a bit older, is updated, in great condition and clean. As mentioned in other reviews, the area is a little sketchy, but the hotel and parking is secure including elevator access. No worries there. The only minor areas for improvement would be with the ac unit in the room.  Couldn't get it below 72. Also in the afternoon the pool area was left sloppy by other guests and it never got cleaned until much later in the evening. Better monitoring of that would be an easy fix. Loved the on site bar which is unusual for a Hampton. Also loved the complimentary cruise shuttle. Definitely would stay again.

title: Good hotel close to las olas
review: This hotel met all expectations.  Enjoyed the bar/restaurant on property.  Kids wish that pool had been heated but they still enjoyed the pool.  Breakfast area could be rather crowded and staff working seemed a bit irritated by that but there was everything available to choose from.  Parking was difficult.  It was a holiday week so hotel was at capacity.  Deck was full often and people would park along sides of deck making it hard to get in and out of parking spots.  Parking across street available but not made known at check in.  Overall the hotel is very convenient to all Fort Lauderdale attractions and beaches.  We enjoyed the stay and would stay again.

title: Great location/price
review: Stayed 2 days pre-cruise within walking distance to many nice restaurants and lots of activity's. Hotel does provide transportation to cruise ship's for free, but not to and from airport,take a cab it is less than $20.00 for the cab for 2 people,the hotel charges $15.00 per person.The staff is wonderfull beds are comfortable and rooms are clean, for the price in that area you can't beat it. If you have a full day go to water taxi only cost $22.00 per person for all day and night till 10:00PM and you can see most of everything.Once again KUDO'S to the staff and the breafast buffet was plentyfull.

title: Excellent service and gr8 staff
review: Dear Tony B,     Thank you so much for taking the time to provide us feedback on your stay with us here at the Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas. I'm very pleased to here that your stay with us was pleasant and the entire team was amicable. Unfortunately we do not offer complimentary transportation to and from the airport. However, as you stated the hotel will be able to kindly provide various alternatives for transportation. We look forward to having you stay with us the next time your travels bring you to Ft Lauderdale.  Best Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Ok hotel, disappointing!
review: The assistance by front desk was always helpful and even went out of the way to help me. Thank you Lawrence, Synthia and Fathima making my stay better. The only drawback is not many options nearby for eating out.

title: Great deal for pre new years cruise
review: Dear Leroy- Dmello,    Thank you for taking the time to provide us feedback on your recent stay at the Hampton Inn Downtown Las Olas. I am pleased to read that you had a great stay with us, I will relay your kind comments to the front desk team. From your Hampton Inn family we send our kindest wishes and we really look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Downtown Ft Lauderdale. Happy Holiday's!  Best Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Wonderful staff
review: Due the "downtown" description of the hotel we decided to book it without renting a car as we thought we could walk around to the venues in the city. However, the location is quite far away for walking to the main venues in the city like main shopping street, restaurants and etc.. and the surrounding doesn't look safe, with many homeless people walking around day and night. The streets in the evening are dark and populated by the homeless people.  The check-in could have been better. A Spanish accented lady speaking very loudly informing us that the hotel was fully booked and there wouldn't be any other choice but the room she was "giving us".  The breakfast was included in the price, and the assortment was good for an American breakfast. The staff working in the breakfast area…

title: Quiet stay, room smelled like cigarette smoke
review: We always love and stay at Hampton Inns.  All over the US we have enjoyed the comfort and excellent staff.  This Place was fine, excellent check in, loved the complimentary breakfast, free WiFi, and location.  We were able to walk into the restaurant areas in town, a big plus.  The Big Problem was the smell in our room.  It seemed like it was being brought into the room by the air ducts.  We don't smoke, I cant tolerate the smell, but had to endure it during our one day and night stay.

title: Hotel rating
review: Extremely rude front desk staff and a front desk supervisor, very friendly maintenance, food and housekeeping staff/dangerous and unsafe area outside hotel both during the day and at night, extremely clean and comfortable accomodations/poor internet connection.

title: Good Location
review: This property has good location near downtown and Las Olas. However, sits on a side street in a not that great neighborhood. They have secured parking but it should be free not $12. The property is well maintained, rooms are clean but need a bit of refreshing. Ok for 1 night, but wouldn't do extended.

title: Post Cruise Delight
review: Dear Jennifer B,      Thank you for your feedback in regards to your stay. I am glad that you were able to enjoy the amazing area of downtown Ft Lauderdale. Las Olas has amazing shops and restaurants near our hotel which is a great convenience for guest traveling without a vehicle.  I want to assure you that we have great security staff on premises and your safety is always important to us.  We look forward to having you again next time your in the area.   Sincerely,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Highly Recomend
review: The hotel is two blocks off Las Olas near City Hall in a quiet business area.  The interior is a sunny cream yellow with great pictures.  The pool deck, on the 2nd floor is accessed from a large lounge area where breakfast is served.  There is also a cozy little bar off to the side.  It's the first Hampton Inn I can remember with this set-up.  The hotel definitely has character.  It was decorated with Christmas trees in the lobby and on the second floor.  The rooms were spacious and comfortable.  The front-desk staff is very pleasant and personable.  The hotel was not crowded and the pool area was a lovely retreat for my wife and I.  Thank you Cynthia for correcting one inconvenience.  Thank you Laurence for the very nice room placement, and thank you Cheryl for the comps. …

title: good customer service, decent rooms , nice pool area
review: Downtown Ft lauderdale location - I stay here frequently for work, front desk is always effecient. Rooms are pretty typical Hampton Inns - although the thermostat on the wall was not working and the toilet kept running - so a few maintanence issues, but they were responsive.  The couple of blocks around the hotel can be a bit iffy for walking at night - lots of homeless, i think there is a shelter a block away. Very close to Las Olas and all of the restaurants there. breakfast in the moring is pretty good, decent gym, wifi and TV worked well - although for some reason no ESPN when I was there. Nice lobby for a Hampton, secure parking garage, although with a full size SUV it is a bit tight.

title: Perfect precruise
review: Dear CDY,     Thank you for your feedback. It is lovely to hear you liked our location and we appreciate your kind words regarding our staff. We strive to provide the best possible experience and it is great to read from our guests on how we are doing. We are sorry for letting you down with regards to the room quality. Please be assured that your comments will be used for the purpose of bringing improvements needed.   Thank you for staying with us, and we hope to have an opportunity to keep serving you again.  Best Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Nice Stay
review: Clean with a great staff.  Complimentary transportation to the ship.  Complimentary breakfast.  The area around the hotel is not so great, but within quick taxi ride to great restaurants.  Nice bar in the evening with a complimentary drink.  Bed sleeps well.

title: A Great Place to stay when cruising.
review: Dear Andy Crna    Wow! Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We are truly honored that you feel your recent stay with us has been pleasant. Thank you for kind words on our amenities, such as our complimentary shuttle to the ship. We hope to have the chance to surpass this accomplishment in a future visit.  Warmest Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Older hotel but average
review: The hotel was in good repair and the staff was very helpful. The downtown location wasn't the best however you can see that the city appears to be trying to work on it.  The breakfast was good and offered options. Overall it was a good place to stay for the night before a cruise.

title: Great place to stay, great layout, nice staff.
review: Hotel staff was very friendly and accommodating. Rooms were very clean. Layout of the breakfast area was different, and much nicer than most. There is also a bar near the breakfast area on the second floor. Parking is convenient, and secure.Access into garage through steel gate. Highly recommend this hotel.

title: Comfortable stay
review: Dear Richard J   Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Hampton Inn- Las Olas. We appreciate your feedback and are truly delighted by your kind words for our hotel and staff. Our team was overjoyed to read your comments especially the breakfast staff.  Thank you for staying with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Satisfied
review: My family stayed here on our way back home from our Thanksgiving trip to visit family in FL.  We called that afternoon and got a room for that same night.  When we arrived at the hotel, they had upgraded us to a king suite.  The room was nice, clean and comfortable.  For being downtown, it was pretty quiet.  We had to catch the Amtrak the next morning, they called us a cab and it was at the hotel in a few minutes.  Cab fare to the Amtrak station was less than $10.

title: CRUISE AND STAY
review: Dear Jenmac75,     Thank you for taking the time to share your experiences at the Hampton Inn Ft Lauderdale/Downtown Las Olas. I am happy to see that we are your hotel of choice when visiting the area, and that our staff has been friendly and responsive creating a great first impression. As for your description of our room let’s just say it made me daydream a bit about enjoying it as well. Thank you for your feedback. We look forward to having you with us again soon!  Warm Regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Business Stay
review: Amelia was our first impression upon check in and the person I met with later in my stay regarding some correctable issues. She was polite, professional and efficient. Even with some issues I was satisfied with our stay and would stay again.

title: Pre Cruise
review: Overall the hotel was great. Great pool and services. Would be nice to have had more hours of the bar and refreshments during a Saturday.  Breakfast was good, but did not do well in refilling items. Location was ok, shops, and restaurants were about 3-4 blocks away. Great new Tilted kilt 3 blocks away. Room was comfortable and quiet. Shuttle to the port was good and timely. they also coordinated the shuttle post cruise to the airport.

title: good pre cruise stopover
review: Dear Tom K,     Thank you for your feedback. It is lovely to hear you liked our location and we appreciate your kind words regarding our service. We strive to provide the best possible experience and it is great to read from our guests on how we are doing. We are sorry for letting you down with regards to the bar service hours. Please be assured that your comments will be used for the purpose of bringing improvements needed.    Thank you for staying and we all look forward to an opportunity to serve you again on your next future visit.  Sincerely,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Relaxing and restful
review: stayed prior to a cruise. the hotel is up to all hampton standards. room was clean and neat. the breakfast was good. the shuttle was on time and got us to the port with no hassle. very nice third floor pool and hot tub. we did enjoy the complimentery beverage upon check in. the indoor secure garage is a very good choice for parking during a cruise. i would recommend taking a cab back to the hotel upon disembarking. it's much easier and quuicker than waiting for a shuttle

title: Very Nice-Good Price
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed your recent stay and our wonderful amenities. We look forward to seeing you soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Nice Pre-cruise stay
review: Great place to come and spend the evening after a hectic work day. The room was very clean and well maintained. The staff was accommodating and welcoming. I would stay again without question and recommend to my family, friends and business associates.Thank you so much!!

title: Good Location
review: We were leaving on a cruise the following day so we had time to explore the area on foot.  Probably a 5-6 block walk you will cross the river and not only picturesque but lots of great restaurants.  The hotel has a wonderful free breakfast and they also have a bar on the second floor that also served a limited menu which is convenient if you don't want to go out.  Our room are nice, bed comfortable, bath a bit dated.  They provide free transportation to the ship, but you need to pay for a cab to/from airport.

title: Honors Member, But....
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay. We are so pleased to know that you enjoyed our hotel and the amenities we have to offer! It also brings us great joy that you were able to experience the wonderful scenery Las Olas has to offer. We hope to see you soon!  - Craig Park

title: Good idea, but poor execution
review: We give this hotel an average rating because of the following situations and conditions we found at this Hampton Inn location. First, the location seems to be in the middle of-nothing. We started to have suspicions when the list of restaurants we received from the front desk contained all local restaurants-nothing national. We didn't think it was a good idea to eat in a local restaurant in a town we had never visited the night before a cruise. We found it odd that the only thing nearby was a McD's and a KFC. The hotel itself was just average. We have come to find that on the rare occasion we are disappointed by a hotel it seems to be associated with older hotel buildings. We got our free drinks from the front desk and went to our room where we found that the safe provided nor…

title: Amazing time
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for your recent review of your stay with us.  We truly appreciate all feedback we receive so we can continually improve our hotel!    As you mentioned, Las Olas Blvd which is a few blocks away has 30+ restaurant options, most being local restaurants others being smaller chains commonly found in Florida.  Las Olas Boulevard is South Florida’s most architecturally unique, authentic, and eclectic shopping and dining district.  In addition to all the restaurant options there are 2 world class museums, 10 major international art galleries and 65 different shops along the Boulevard.   Our in-room safes are provided so you may secure your valuables and require key card access.  They are not designed to be accessed using your credit card but rather your room key.    Our elevators do require room key access for extra security which we have found to be an added benefit to our guests.  You will not find many hotels in the Fort Lauderdale/Miami area that don't have this feature.   Our parking garage is connected to the hotel as you mentioned and is secure as room key access is required.  We apologize if you found the garage to be a bit tight.  We have many spots on the first floor that we use for larger vehicles.  There is also an additional lot across from us that may be used if additional parking is needed for larger vehicles.    Thank you again for taking the time to share your review as we greatly appreciate the feedback.  We will use it as a tool to continually improve.   Safe & Pleasant Travels!  Craig Park General Manager

title: Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale/Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale
review: My family has stayed at this Hampton Inn several times.  It's a great location to park our car in a covered garage  and then take a shuttle to our cruise ship the next morning.  The pool and hot tub are great.  The staff have always been friendly and helpful.  Our room has always met or exceeded our expectations.  A couple of years ago a bar and a limited menu restaurant were added. For this visit, we received 2 free beverages from the bar.   This was a great idea as many guests do not want to search out a restaurant after a long car ride, or an uncomfortable plane ride.  Most want a beverage and something to eat soon after they check into their room.  Good idea, right?. The execution has not been so good.  Now, after over two years in operation, they only have 3 copies of the…

title: EXCELLENT all around place, staff, and atmosphere!
review: I've traveled many places but this hotel and staff was absolutely amazing!  Will definitely be returning when in the area again! Hampton Inn hotels are always good but this front desk staff went above and beyond to accommodate our needs. Glad to know there is such great professional people left in the world!

title: Wow..what a nice experience..I like it!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write this review. We are so happy that you enjoyed our staff and your recent stay with us! We look forward to seeing you soon here at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park

title: very good value
review: I generally do not give excellent for anything, but the Hampton experience was pretty close. The entire stay for us, from beginning to end, in every aspect was just wonderful. If there was one thing that stood out, I would have to say it was the staff. Their helpfulness, kindness, and concern should be recognized and applauded...good work...ThankYou!

title: Wow
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us. We are so pleased that you were able to enjoy our wonderful Hampton hospitality! I will be sure to thank all of my staff for all that they do. We look forward to having you back at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!   - Craig Park

title: Awesome
review: Great location in FT. Lauderdale; large rooms, clean and great breakfast and pool area to enjoy your coffee.    Located very close to River to catch the hop on off and access the beach.   Good restaurants alone river.  Have stayed before and will stay again.

title: FABULOUS STAY
review: I recently stayed at the Hampton Inn Las Olas with my family.   We were pleasantly surprised to see the upgrade in customer service since our last visit (same time last year).  We've always enjoyed this hotel.  The location couldn't be better!  As a person who travels a lot for work I have become a bit of a 'room cleanliness' snob.  This hotel passes even my test for superb attention to room detail.  We look forward to our next visit.  When we are in Ft Lauderdale this is the only place we'll stay!

title: Not what I expected from a Hampton Inn
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that it got better since your previous one. We look forward to having you again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Good
review: When I booked this hotel, I was assured by friends that Hampton Inns are generally reliable properties. However, it was located in a seedy, rather scary neighborhood and that was not portrayed accurately on the hotel's website. I was afraid to go out alone even during the day due to vagrants, etc. The room itself was nice enough, clean and relatively comfortable, except for the non-functioning a/c. The a/c only worked sporadically and did not really cool the room perceptibly. I was lucky it wasn't very hot outside. The water pressure in the shower was good. The free wireless internet was a decent speed and reliable. The high point was the complimentary breakfast. Everything there was absolutely delicious, especially the yummy fresh cooked hot oatmeal. I was very impressed with…

title: AWESOME!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are glad that you enjoyed your stay and our amenities. We look forward to having you with us again!  - Craig Park

title: Will not return to this Hampton Inn
review: I was there for one day. It is very clean. Very nice bathroom. Staff ok. Keeping luggage after stay. Very good and complete breakfast. Not far to the main street. Id liked that. price its ok with breakfast included.

title: Not worth the money
review: Room was not well kept, stuff was falling apart and customer service lacked to do there job. I checked into the hotel and the front desk mispelled my last name wrong after seeing my ID and credit card, therefor I couldnt log into the internet to order food, by the time they fixed it everything was closed. Went to take a shower and the light switch was glitching out and the light would randomly turn off, plus the shower head was on some weird setting and I went to switch it over and the shower head fell off! When I went to turn the TV on, it took about 10 minutes for the picture to actually come on, the front desk said that it does take a couple minutes to turn on sometimes.

title: Consistent and comfortable
review: We stayed at this Hampton Inn because we had to attend a friends engagement party in a bar/restaurant in the area. We clearly didn't feel like making the trek back to Miami after such a night. If you've ever stayed in any other Hampton Inn, you'll know they're consistent with quality, this one is no different.

title: Hidden comfort
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your recent stay with us. Though it was just an overnight stay, we are so pleased to know that enjoyed your stay and that you were provided with quality service! We look forward to having you again.  - Craig Park

title: Sketchy neighborhood, okay hotel
review: This hotel is in a mixed neighborhood that is trying to rebuild. The hotel is clean, nice staff that are helpful,  a normal hotel breakfast is included with your stay. They do charge additional for overnight parking. It is close to riverwalk and museum. There are trolleys that help some with local commute. Its comfortable clean and hidden amongst businesses .

title: A short holiday
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your recent stay with us. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our staff. We are also glad that you got to experience the services Las Olas has to offer. See you soon!  - Craig Park

title: Excellent experience again!!!
review: This was my third time staying at this hotel this year for a vacation. Great staff always helpful with directions or any help I needed. I come and go at all hours and am always welcomed back! Highly recommend making this a place to stay for business or vacations.

title: I arrived at 430 am and definitely felt safe and at home.
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to write this review. We are so happy to hear that you are a returning guest and that you have enjoyed all of your stays with us! We also thank you for recommending our hotel for business and leisure. We can not wait to see you again here at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: NOT Good
review: I was looking for a hotel room because I had a 6 hour lay over.  I called the 1866 number for Hilton and became so frustrated with the service I recieved from the main reservation line.  I used to work for Hilton and was appalled at how little the main res. Person knew.  I called and spoke to Kelly the AGM she was a gem and got me the best rate possible for the stay.  I love staying at Hamptons they are usually clean comfortable and good breakfast.  When I arrived the doors were locked and I had to be buzzed in.  I love this feature I felt so safe.  I had a speedy check in and went to my room and crashed.  When I went to take a shower the next day the tub was gross the shower curtain looked old.  The tub had a ring of dirt around it the shower curtain looked old and I was really…

title: Well worth my time
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and felt safe with us! We look forward to having you here again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.   - Craig Park

title: Average
review: The hotel is okay in appearance, because the furniture is worn out. they need to renovate. The breakfast is the worst I have had in any hotel stay. My brand New Channel Chance Perfume worth $115.00 and I called to report it and they said they would investigate and call me back. I still have not heard from the hotel! All of the soda and Ice machines were broken on all floors! I called to ask if they had Tooth paste and they said yes, however I needed to go downstairs and pick it up. When i went down they did not have any available.

title: Totally Comfortable
review: The Hotel was awesome but the neighborhood is not so great.  The pool/jacuzzi awesome, Oh and I felt very safe in the Hotel.  You need a room key to get to the different floors or the elevator doesn't/ work.  The complimentary breakfast was awesome those waffles rock! Just keep you eyes open in that neighborhood. .

title: Business travel basic
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review your stay with us. We are so delighted that you enjoyed your stay and all the amenities the hotel has to offer! We hope to see back real soon for some of our delicious waffles here at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park

title: Great Stay!!
review: This is a little tired but clean hotel close to teh Fort Lauderdale down town and somewhat walk-able to the downtown and river walk areas. It is a 15 minute walk to the Broward Center for the performing arts.

title: Good hotel wish location was different
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. It brings us great joy that you enjoyed your stay and the area! We hope to see you back again real soon.   - Craig Park

title: good hotel
review: Unfortunately I do not have the name of the gentleman who checked us in but he was younger with dark hair and was lovely! He was very accommodating with my requests! The rooms were large and very nicely kept! It is a great location for dinner and drinks on Las Olas/ Downtown area. Our cab ride home was only $3! The front office manager is a sweetheart also and was so kind with everything! I would love to go back and stay at this property!! I believe Cynthia was the front desk agent in the morning and she was just as kind as the rest!!

title: Very  Nice!
review: Room was clean, nicely decorated and the a/c worked  perfectly, no musty smell and not too noisy. The bed was very comfortable.  The bathroom was large and very well lit, and plenty of counter space. One reason I actually went as far as to give this rating a 5 was the small details. A well lit bathroom is important to me, nothing worse than poor lighting for trying to get ready to leave for the day and put makeup on in a dimly lit room. Another bonus!.....magnifying makeup mirror and neutrogena shampoo, etc.  Front desk staff were very courteous, helpful and friendly and security in the hotel involves using your room key to be able to operate the elevator. Breakfast was included and consisted of a large  variety of choices, eggs, bacon, waffles, fruit, yogurt, cereal. Highly…

title: The Best Rooms,Customer Service & Breakfast ever!!!!!
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for reviewing our hotel and rating us five (5) stars. We are happy to know that you enjoyed all of our amenities and the small details that really made your stay! We look forward to having you again at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Great service, but not so great hotel.
review: Thank you Fatima A for your Very Professional, Outstanding Hospitality & Excellent service & directions to the bank, all the Shopping areas including the Galleria & the Swap! We Really Apprecite Fatima Sweet , Kind personality, care, & concern that made our stay exceptionally Great! THANKS Fatima for the best stay ever at your hotel. It was a pleasant atmosphere, nice ,clean, & so was the restrooms, newly decorated, smelt nice aroma & the hot breakfast was the best  ever!!  I Just Love making & eating those Belgium Waffles, & those lemon potatoes with garlic! I RECOMMEND EVERY ONE STAY HERE!! YOU WILL LOVE IT!!

title: Love my stay and the staff!!! 😊
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are delighted to know that you have absolutely enjoyed your stay! From the moment you checked in with Fatima and to the very moment of enjoying our delicious breakfast. We look forward to seeing you again at Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Great service.  Not great location
review: We stayed here before a cruise because they have an excellent cruise package where you can leave your car there for free, and shuttle you to the port. The hotel had a moldy smell to it, but the lobby area was nice and clean. All the staff is VERY friendly. The room was decent for what we paid, although the bathroom needs a serious upgrade, and there wasn't much of a view. I loved that the pool was empty and I was able to enjoy it. We received a complimentary drink from the bar which was nice. The worst thing was that I hung my bathing suit and pool clothes up by the window to dry and when I looked the next morning ants had swarmed all of it. They were coming from a crack in the window. Everything was decent until then, but the ants were enough to make me want to check out…

title: Lovely Facility
review: Wonderful Staff. Great Location. Close to clubs, the beach, everything. We loved it! Awesome place!!! Everything you need is very close if not on site. Great for all kinds of people. Very friendly. Very Clean. Great prices. We loved it.

title: GR8 Value with upscale accomodations
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for sharing your experience with us. It gives us great joy to know that you enjoyed our wonderful staff, hotel, and the lovely area of Las Olas. We look forward to your next visit to Hampton Inn Las Olas!   - Craig Park

title: Not Hampton inn's best hotel
review: Stayed overnight while reconnecting with a friend of 40 years. Accomodations were first class at a budget price. Clean, comfortable and Secure. Pass key parking as well as security on site! On site bar and food service as well as easy walking distance to shopping and restaurants was a plus!

title: Hampton Inn Near Ft Lauderdale City Hall
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay and especially our upscale accommodations! We hope to see you soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Great location
review: I travel to Ft. Lauderdale on a regular basis for business and as a Hilton Honors member I try to stay in Hilton hotels or affiliates.  This trip I stayed at the Hampton Inn because if it's great location.  Unfortunately, it was not the hotels best performance.  The hallway air conditioning was not operating and it was difficult to get my room temperature below 73 degrees.  Also, Two of the three elevators were inoperable which took over 10 minutes before it appeared on the 11th floor to take me to the lobby to check out.  I am sure they will get these issues ironed out, but they should do it sooner rather than later.

title: Not the best experience
review: Price was right...check in was quick...bed was comfortable.  Those are the positives. The negatives are.. The front desk guy told us restaurants on Las Olas were in walking distances and was safe to walk...it was about 2 miles round trip in the heat/humidity and homeless people shouting profanities at us.Fire alarm waking us at 6am TWICE only to be told it was a false alarm despite seeing people standing on the street and a fire truck outside!  Yellow water coming out of the bathroom faucets the sink doesn't drain.The A/C leaking water on our shoes. And the "hot" breakfast was tasteless french toast, microwaved to death sausages, oatmeal, watered down OJ, various yogurts, melons and cereal.  We did mention this to the manager Laurence who apologized and offered a free night stay…

title: Green water
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us. I am happy to hear that Laurence was able to provide some compensation for your future stay with us.We look forward to seeing you again.  - Craig Park

title: Nice place to relax
review: Previously wrote a review about this property and the green water that was disgusting. Management responded and indicated that it was a treatment from the city of Fort Lauderdale. I return to the hotel only to find the same disgusting green water that I  refuse to bathe in.

title: Great place to stay
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced during your stay with us. We hope that this does not discourage you from visiting us again.  - Craig Park

title: Short visit; excellent Hampton stay
review: Having long trip from Jacksonville Florida I wonted to relax. i had easy check in clean room  and good sleep and good breakfast. that happen in  Hampton inn 250 north Andrews ave Fort Lauderdale Florida  33301

title: Last minute
review: I was stuck in Ft. L'dale at the last minute and had to stay over night staff helped with all the things I needed. Toiletries, clothes and dinner locations. The pool and work out room were accessible and clean.  Made a bad day into a good situation.

title: Not up to par for the Hilton chain
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are delighted to hear that we were able to turn a bad day into a good situation for you! We hope to see you soon here at the Hampton Inn Las Olas.  - Craig Park

title: Great visit
review: sink would not drain, carpeting was dirty, upon arrival i waited for 15 minutes to even check in as a result of a foreign non-English speaking guest having an issue and only one staff member working the desk. I checked in at midnight.

title: Great stay
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences you encountered during your visit with us. I hope this does not discourage you from coming back.   - Craig Park

title: Great vacacion
review: We stayed the night before going on cruise.  Easy check in, staff could answer our questions regarding area - where to eat and places to see, parking advise.  Room was clean. Beds clean.  Mattress not as comfy as other Hampton Inns have been, but we would stay at this location again.

title: Meet my needs well
review: Not what you might think of as "Las Olas" hotel but you might be safe enough to walk there @ night.  The hotel has unusual security measures which are probably needed but a little unnerving. The room was clean, lobby nice, bar made good drinks late night.  Cheap enough. Not a vacation place but definitely gets you in the area.   The tight squeeze in parking lot would challenge some drivers (my dear wife)

title: Stayed on business
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We are happy to hear that you have enjoyed our clean rooms, nice lobby, and wonderful mixed drinks from the bar. We hope to see you again soon!  - Craig Park

title: business stay
review: The front desk manager (Laurence) was polite and very accommodating. As a hilton Gold member it is always nice to treated well. He offered me bottled water and a snack as well as a drink ticket for a free cocktail at the bar. This hotel was walking distance to Las Olas. The room was clean and smelled fresh.

title: Always Hampton
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to write such a wonderful review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our rooms and that Laurence made your stay memorable. I will personally thank him for that and we hope to see you enjoying the Las Olas beach soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: happy hotel
review: Great hotel, close to Fort Lauderdale business district, can walk to the office. We signed a corporate deal as we will use this hotel for our business trips. Our clients have already started to use this property and they were more than satisfied

title: Comfortable & affordable but complicated.....why?
review: i almost always stay at Hampton Inn locations as the budget is in line with my company's expense policy and I like that it includes breakfast.  I must preface the review by saying that I have stayed at Hampton Inns all over the country on average of 5 or 6 night a month. I have stayed at Hilton properties in a great many countries overseas and was formerly a diamond member, however, this by far is the most complicated Hilton property I have ever stayed at.  I arrived and found no place to park. i parked in a Diamond HH spot, though i was not supposed to. After a very long day of traveling 18 hours I registered and was told where to park. I got in the elevator and it didn't move. It took me a bit to figure out i had use my room card to get to any floor other than the lobby.    i…

title: Good value
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for providing your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences you had to go through while staying with us. We hope that this does not discourage you from visiting us again.   - Craig Park

title: The Best Choice for Our Family Reunion
review: The location is very convenient for Las Olas Blvd. Ft. Lauderdale. The rooms were clean the people were very nice we were very pleased with our stay.  We would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to friends and family

title: Quality you can count on
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas appreciates you taking the time to tell us about your stay. We are so glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you were able to enjoy our area. We look forward to seeing you soon at the Hampton Inn Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Great Stay
review: The sales team was amazing--Cheryl & Danielle! The front desk staff friendly and outgoing--Fatima, Laurence and many others whose names I can't recall. The hotel was centrally located to shopping and food.  Breakfast was a full breakfast not a Continental breakfast.   I would return to this hotel again and again.  The homeless across the street was a bit of a surprise.  However the hotel is located downtown and every city has its downtown homeless.  The hotel has security that walked the grounds without fail.  The hotel was very secure.  You need a room key to park and access the floors where rooms are.

title: Horrible
review: I will never stay at this hotel again. I had to call 4 times just for them to get my reservations correct then they try and tell me I was wrong with them. At check in, well that was a nightmare.  I will never stay here again.

title: Great Place
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. We apologize for the inconveniences you experienced with us. We hope this does not discourage you from coming back.   - Craig Park

title: Extemely Satisfied
review: Nice room, good breakfast, friendly staff. The location was perfect for my needs and close to the Las Olas area which provided things to do in the evenings. A good all around location. Also, went to Sawgrass Mills, that was only about a 15 minute drive. Took a water taxi from the riverfront- about a 5 minute drive.

title: Vacation
review: Hampton Inn Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to tell us about your stay with us. We are pleased to know that you enjoyed our nice rooms, good breakfast, and friendly staff. We cant wait to have you back at the Hampton Inn Las Olas and to hear about all the new experiences you have in Las Olas!  - Craig Park

title: Surprising experience
review: No issues have stayed in several different locations, never disappointed! I would advise this particular location as well as the Hampton brand!  Well trained staff along with clean grounds and lobbies! Always coffee and cool beverage avail as well as cookies and snacks and a great breakfast buffet included!

title: Great stay and close to things
review: We arrived early and was able to go to our room right away. Room was clean and great location. Breakfast was provided and was pretty good. We had an issue with the fridge in the room...it was noisy and the arm on the chair was loose. Called down to the front desk concerning this and then left for the day...when we returned, the fridge was as quiet as a mouse and the chair was as good as new. Our room was on the same side as the train tracks. We would hear the train whistle, but it was not too loud at all. The only things that bothered me was that homeless people slept outside the vacant building across the street from our room window. I also think that $12.00 a day for parking is a bit steep...especially since we had booked the room for 2 weeks straight. I think that the parking…

title: Consistent and Comfortable
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for your review of the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area!  I am very happy to hear what a great stay you had with us.    Although I do not like to hear of any issues in our guest rooms I am very happy that we were able to correct them immediately for you. I do encourage you to contact us directly next time and ask for a manager when booking a long-term stay.  We would be more than happy to explore a more economical parking option for you when staying with us for so long!  I certainly do not want this to prevent you from having a perfect stay with us!  Thank you again for your great review of the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area!  Safe Travels,   Craig Park  General Manager

title: Nice hotel and friendly staff
review: I really enjoy staying at the Hampton Inn, in any city I find their staff friendly, complementary breakfast better than many around, and super comfortable and clean beds!  Plus free wireless internet, yay!  What more can you ask for!

title: Nice Hotel and a Good Value
review: Dear Guest,   I am so pleased to hear about your wonderful stay at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!  I appreciate you taking the time to acknowledge our amenities and most importantly- our friendly staff. They work very hard to ensure each and every guest is given exceptional service. I am happy to be able to share your great comments with them.   We truly appreciate your business and hope to see you at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area very soon!  Safe travels,  Craig Park  General Manager

title: Night Before Our Cruise !
review: Stayed for 3 days at this hotel. All staff members I interacted with were very helpful and friendly. The breakfast had a great variety and varied from day to day. I really like that there was a small store located in the lobby for any type of sundries/toiletries you might forget. I would have have given this place a 5 rating, but I had to call and ask for my room to be cleaned and ask for towels after requesting them twice already and not receiving them. I think the staff was just really busy over the weekend. Overall, it's nice hotel, a great value for the money, and I would definitely stay again.

title: For Just One Night, Quiet Pool Was Perfect
review: We were staying at the Hampton Inn for one night before we checked in to a pricey/she-she hotel in Miami for a wedding.  I was expecting the Hampton Inn to be forgetful, but I actually liked it better than the fancy boutique hotel on Miami Beach.  Maybe it was the quiet downtown vibe of the hotel, or the free individually wrapped apples they kept in the lobby, but I really liked this place.  My favorite part?  The pool.  Just a regular rectangular pool with a deep end of about 5 feet, but it was private enough, with recliners on the side and chair/tables under the shaded patio, to make me forget that we were downtown next to fast food places and busy government buildings nearby.  I would definitely return.  I didn't give it 5 stars because honestly, there was nothing spectacular…

title: One night stay
review: Greetings from downtown Fort Lauderdale!  Thank you very much for sharing your positive experience while staying with us at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area!  I am happy to hear enjoyed your stay with us more than the fancy boutique in Miami you later stayed at.  That is what is great about Hampton Inn hotels- consistency!  We are dedicated to making sure every guest is completely satisfied.  Friendly service and clean accomodations are what we strive for.  We pay attention to detail- even when it comes to wrapping our lobby apples to ensure they too are clean!  We look forward to seeing you here again,   Craig Park General Manager

title: awesome stay
review: Regural hotel with decent and clean room, bed and bathroom. Could use new carpeting and showers. towels were with yellow stains. Otherwise, regular chain hotel. Front Desk staff was nice, but made a mistake. However, they did everything to corrected this.

title: Great hotel, average location, horrible breakfast!
review: Dear guest,   Thank you so much for taking the time to share your review of our hotel.  Guest comments and feedback are extremely important to us.  We use every single review as a learning tool to continuously improve our hotel.   I am glad to hear the front desk staff was nice and your room was clean and comfortable.  Our staff is committed to making your stay as enjoyable as possible.   Thank you and have a wonderulf day,   Craig Park General Manager

title: Nice base for downtown activities.
review: This hotel was very beautiful. Front desk staff was incredibly kind, especially Thomas. He was genuine and quick with the process of checking me in. The room amenities were spectacular. I recommend this hotel for a nice getaway. It is close to the Las Olas strip and beaches. I would stay here again whenever I need to get away.

title: Nice location for pre-cruise stay.
review: We stayed at this hotel the night before a cruise and it was very good. It is located in the center of downtown, so it's easy to get anywhere from I-95 to the beaches. The staff was friendly and the rooms were clean. It has a nice pool area near the bar and free breakfast area that is secluded from other properties. The breakfast was about what you'd expect for a free included option. I would stay here again.

title: Great Experience
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your review of our wonderful hotel, the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale/Downtown Las Olas Area!   I am glad that you enjoyed our bar & pool area, friendly staff and clean rooms. We've seemed to have made a great impression on you and your family.  Once again, thank you so much for your review and we hope to see you back soon!  Safe travels,   Craig Park General Manager

title: What a lovely spot
review: This hotel was extremely clean everywhere. The staff was outstanding and very friendly. The rate was just right. I will say the complimentary breakfast was not the best that I had, but can't complain about free.

title: Good Hotel
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for your great review of the Hampton Inn Ft Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas area! We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and were completely satisfied with the cleanliness and comfort of your room!  We look forward to seeing you again at the Hampton Inn Ft Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas area!  Kind regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Hotel has it's pluses and minuses
review: A small group of us stayed here the day before and night after our cruise and we loved the hotel. Check-in was super easy, our rooms were ready early, we received a coupon each for a free beer from the upstairs bar, and the front desk arranged a private shuttle for us to go to the Sawgrass mills mall.  The front desk staff on both occasions were very professional and accommodating. Very impressed.  We were very impressed by the cleanliness of the rooms and the lovely pool and breakfast area. The free breakfast in the morning was amazing as well. All the fixings... and coffee was available there all day long.   The only downfall was the area... which I wouldn't recommend walking around solo. It was only 5mins from Las Olas street, so we took a cab back and forth for super.

title: Group Stay Pre-Cruise 05-16-14
review: Stayed at this hotel prior to a cruise with a group of 25+ people.  Our stay was great!  No issues at all!  Booking our group with the Director of Sales Cheryl Lowe was seamless.       I want to point out that Fatima S. was on top of everything!  She was very nice and friendly and really wanted to make sure everything was okay with our group. It was very much appreciated and reassuring!  Other perks:  Great Rate! Walking distance to the Cheesecake Factory! $1 Trolley to the beach! Close to the airport and cruise port!  Nutrogena products a plus! 2 Free bar drinks! Breakfast included! Complimentary Transportation to the cruise port!  Very Satisfied!

title: Excellent Place to Stay!
review: Greetings,   What a great review of the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area!  I am so pleased to read what a wonderful stay you and 25+ of your guests had with us.  Our location is absolutely a great choice for guests leaving on cruises or looking to visit downtown Fort Lauderdale.  Thank you for also acknowledging the complimentary breakfast, drink coupons and transportation to the cruise port.    I am especially happy to hear that Fatima went the extra mile ensuring your group was well taken care of!  She will be very happy to hear of the positive accolades you have given her.   We hope to see you and your group back at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area very soon!  Safe Travels,   Craig Park  General Manager

title: Stay here when in Ft. Lauderdale
review: I have to travel to Fort Lauderdale often for work and I ALWAYS choose to stay at the Hampton Inn Downtown. The staff/employees there are always accommodating and friendly. Cheryl Lowe, who is the Director of Sales there, has been my "go to" if I needed help with having a room to stay in or answering any questions that I had about the HHonors program. I recommend speaking with her if you are planning on staying in the hotel. The rooms are comfortable and very clean. You cant beat the duvet covers after a long day of work! The pool and jacuzzi is kept up with very well. And the bar they have was a very nice surprise! (they give you free drink vouchers when you check in to your room!). The location is great too because you are only a short walk away from the night life on Las Olas…

title: Great Value
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you for your wonderful review of the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area!  I am so pleased to read such excellent reviews of our staff, emenities and location!  We have an amazing staff and unbeatable amenities.  As you mentioned, the night life and restaurants are a short walk from the hotel and can also be reached quickly via taxi for only $5.00.    We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with other travelers as well as with us. Your positive review will be shared with all of our staff.  We hope to see you back at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area in the near future!  Warm regards,   Craig Park  General Manager

title: Additional Charges to bill
review: Great hotel and staff...1st class breakfast and pool..close to the Galleria for shopping and to Las Olas district...we think its the best value for money in the area..10 minutes to the airport and very centrally located...the staff is excellent and very attentive...nice touch with the cookies when you check in...you will love it - al and kevin

title: Ideal Pre-cruise spot
review: This hotel is typically good quality as Hampton Inn is used to provide...and it offers the ability to park your car there during your cruise and use a shuttle service to and from the ship. GREAT plus.

title: Staying in Ft. Lauderdale
review: Dear Guest,   We thank you for providing us with great feedback regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale- Downtown/Las Olas Area.   Our cruise package makes parking and transportation to the cruise port ideal for any guests who have a vehicle.  I am glad you were able to take advantage of this package we offer! We hope you will stay with us each time you decide to cruise out of Fort Lauderdale!  Looking forward to having you back,   Craig Park General Manager

title: Impressive
review: This hotel is clean and fairly convenient to everything. The hotel is starting to show it's age but should still be considered when looking for a place in the area. The parking garage is a little tight to maneuver but it has a gate and feels secure for entering and exiting the hotel.

title: needs work
review: Dear Guest,   I appreciate you taking the time to write a review on our hotel. I am happy to hear you were satisfied with the how clean and conveniently located our hotel is to the downtown area.   Our hotel has undergone many great improvements in the last few years. We completely rennovated our breakfast area, fitness center and pool deck. We also added a bar/lounge to the hotel which is open 7 days/week and offers a variety of appetizer options. We replaced all of our mattresses in the last year as well.   As we continue to improve the hotel we try to do so with as little impact to the guest as possible. Many of our guestroom bathrooms have been rennovated in the hotel and as time allows more will be completed.   Thank you so much for your review and we look forward to having you here again!  Warm regards,   Craig Park General Manager

title: Good for Cruise-bound Travelers
review: Wow, everything about this stay was honestly great. We are a band that tours the world so we see many hotels. Not only was this place comfortable but also great breakfast and hospitality. They provided a great parking spot for our Tour Bus, and gave great attention to our whole group. Also, from our initial contact the sales rep Cheryl was really accommodating, very informed and prepared the front desk for a smooth check-in. We will definitely return here whenever we play in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Impressed and I did not even stay there!
review: I encountered the most impressive customer service from a young man named Wilson.  My husband and I were staying at another hotel after a cruise and were not very happy.  We had lost a piece of luggage, and received minimal support from the cruise line.  Wilson called my cell phone to let me know that a guest at his hotel had our bag.  He then proceeded to hand deliver it to OUR hotel himself.  We were so impressed with this man and how above and beyond he went to help us, and we were not even guests at the Hampton Inn!!  If Wilson is anything like what someone should expect in regards to customer service, they have a gem of an employee.  We cannot be happier with our short, uncommon, experience with this location!

title: Ft Lauderdale Hampton
review: Dear Guest,   Wow, what a great review!  I am delighted to hear your luggage was returned to you after what sounds like a very trying experience. Our staff is dedicated to providing superior experience to everyone they encounter- whether guest or not.    We hope you have a chance to stay at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas area on your next trip here!    Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with our employee.   Warm regards,  Craig Park General Manager

title: Good Solid Clean Hotel with great service
review: The room was very nice and so was the breakfast.  However, some of the areas could just use a good cleaning, such as the chairs in the breakfast area.  The bar area is very nice and great addition.  Keep the room clean but do not spray them with whatever it is that has the smell of perfume.

title: Good location, nice hotel
review: Dear Guest,   I greatly appreciate you taking the time out of your day to share your comments regarding your stay at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!  I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast options and the new bar we have added to the hotel.  As you mentioned, the bar is a great addition to the hotel and has been very well received with all of our travelers- new and old.   I apologize if you did not prefer the smell of Febreze that we use in the rooms.  Febreze is utilized in all Hampton Inn Hotels as it was found to be preferred by guests.  We completely understand  that what one guest likes another may not.  Please contact us prior to your next visit and we will ensure your room is prepared to your liking.   Thank you again for your time!  We hope to see you here soon.   Safe travels,   Craig Park General Manager

title: A solid hotel experience
review: Clean and easy access - Free parking   Also great value It is not located in the heart of the town but only a few blocks away from Los Olas and shopping and restaurants. Beach is several blocks away. Rooms clean and updated, garage is really close and secure and the have a bar on premise.

title: My favourite place to stay in Fort Lauderdale!
review: Great Place to stay. Close to the airport and the nightlife in Las Olas as well as the beach. The staff are very helpful and friendly and willing to help you with whatever they can. The lounge area on the 2nd floor is a great place to get a delicious appetizer and a beverage after a long day and just relax with the pool just steps outside. The rooms are modern and super clean and the cleaning staff do an absolute awesome job of making the room up. Hands down this hotel and staff are great, highly recommend staying at the Hampton in FTL!!!! :-)   E.P fr Canada

title: Very clean, friendly and a great place to stay!
review: Dear Guest,   We are delighted to hear you loved your stay here at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!  As you mentioned, we are in a great location just minutes from the airport and beach and walking distance to all the downtown nightlife.  The 2nd floor lounge has been a great addition to the hotel and great meeting place for our guests.  Were glad you were able to utilize the lounge and enjoy one of our many appetizers offered!  We look forward to having you back when your travels bring you to Fort Lauderdale!  Sincerely,   Craig Park - General Manager

title: It is a bit outdated .....
review: We spent 2 nights here and had no issues at all. The hotel staff were very friendly, rooms were very clean. Pool and hot tub were also very nice. Complimentry free drink was a nice bonus and the food is unreal (get the sliders!) Will stay there again when the time comes!

title: Excellent, well run facility
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review of the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!     Sounds like you and your friends had an exceptional time during your stay. I am happy to hear you enjoyed the bar and pool area.  We have recently purchased several new furniture items around the pool that have made it even more welcoming!  We hope to see you again at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area very soon!  Best Regards,   Hampton Management

title: Our stay at Hampton Inn was very nice
review: The room was okay and the bed was comfortable though the bathroom was outdated and needed a serious facelift ! The room entry walls could use a paint job as well. Breakfast was a nice touch . I will consider other hotels on my next stay in Fort Lauderdale.

title: Great couple of days here, no complaints!
review: My boyfriend and myself loved this hotel! Coming from dreary Toronto, in February, we loved the bright colours of the decor. The linens were all super clean bright white, comfortable rooms. We arrived at 6am after a horrible red-eye flight and the the front desk staff were kind enough to check us in super early for no additional cost. The breakfast buffet had a good selection (various eggs, sausage, ham, bacon, cereals, yogurt, juices, teas, coffee, hot chocolate, make-your-own waffles, toasts, fruits, etc) The complimentary bar drink token was an added bonus! $12/day parking is reasonable. Pool area was quiet and comfortable.   Location to the beach - a litttttle too far to walk I think. But a short $5-10 cab ride (or $15 rickshaw!) Close proximity to the top of Las Olas Blvd…

title: Decent price, standard room.
review: Hampton Inn Ft.Lauderdale / Downtown Las Olas would like to thank you for taking the time to write that wonderful review. We are happy to here that on your days here, long ways from home, you both got experience some of our great amenities here at the Hampton Inn Ft.Lauderdale / Downtown Las Olas including our beautiful sandy beaches. We are so pleased and excited to be having you back soon and at Hampton Inn Ft.Lauderdale / Downtown Las Olas and will make sure to provide you with better cab services upon arrival.  - Craig Park

title: Trip to Broward Performing Arts
review: Stayed here for one night before our cruise. Clean, quiet hotel with nice staff. Basic rooms, but perfectly priced.   Pros  - Nice clean sheets and room - Complimentary breakfast (eggs, toast, cereal) - Friendly checkin staff - Free shuttle to cruise terminal - Free wifi  Cons - Not really any views from anywhere - Bar staff had no idea how to make our cocktail or heat Pizza - Not within walking distance to anything  - Had to wait for other guests to use a luggage trolley (minor, but no staff could tell me what to do and the process seemed unorganised)

title: Perfect for our needs
review: We would like to thank you for taking the time to provide us with your feedback. Our sincere apologies for the inconveniences you had to endure on your quick stay with us. We can assure you that on your next trip we will leave you with a memorable experience and to make you one of the best drinks of your choice. See you soon!  - Craig Park

title: GREAT HOTEL IN DOWNTOWN FT LAUDERDALE
review: My daughter and I stayed at the Hampton because we were in easy walking distance from the Broward Performing Arts Center where we were attending a seminar. The rooms were very clean and the staff in the bar and the front desk were friendly and attentive. I also like the security at the hotel. Since we were two females traveling were felt very secure. The pool area was very nice as well.

title: Excellent service
review: I was attending a conference in the area at the Broward Performing Arts Theater. This hotel was within walking distance of the event (about 15 min walk) or a very short cab ride (about $5).
