The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Only complaint was the lack of restaurants or shopping nearby.   Overall though a very good experience, I would stay there again.

title: Enjoyable Stay at Hampton/Las Olas
review: Hampton Inn Ft.Lauderdale / Downtown Las Olas would like to thank your for taking the time to give us your feedback. We are happy know that Hampton Inn Ft.Lauderdale / Downtown Las Olas was centrally located to all of your trip's destinations. On your next trip to Hampton Inn Ft.Lauderdale / Downtown Las Olas we will make sure to lead you in the right direction to some delicious restaurants. See you soon!  - Craig Park

title: Standard Hampton hotel
review: We booked a one-night stay at Hampton/Las Olas for the end of March as we were leaving on a cruise.  Check in was very simple and easy and we requested a room on a higher floor not near elevators or ice machines.  The front desk staff were very friendly and accommodating and made our stay a very pleasant one!   We were given a nice quiet room on the ninth floor at opposite end of elevator and ice machine.  Our room had 2 double beds, a lounge chair, and bathroom facilities were in good condition.     While the views were looking at the bus station and North Andrews St., this was not a big deal to us because we were only staying one night.    After we checked in, we asked the desk staff for directions to Las Olas as we wanted to check this area out and have something to eat.  It…

title: Bar/restaurant is fantastic!
review: Thank you so very much for your great review of Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas.  It's great to read that you enjoyed our close approximately to Las Olas area and it's lovely area.  I do want to apologize for the inconvenience you experienced at the shuttle from the port.  We are working very hard with our shuttle company to eliminate your kind of experience and we will rectify your concern.  Once again thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas and we'll see you on your next trip to South Florida.  Craig Park

title: Paige and her awesomeness
review: This is a quite standard Hampton hotel in Ft. Lauderdale. Our room (two double beds) for big enough for us 4 (two adults, two small children). Nice views, children enjoyed spotting the long trains and sunset was beautiful. Breakfast is ok and even though the area looks quite small it was not too crowded. Pool is nice, they have a coin-laundry and a convenience shop. And plenty of parking space in a garage.  The hotel is close to everything in Ft. Lauderdale but you really need a car here...  Nothing spectacular but a well-functioning Hampton Inn. If the rate is good, this is a no-brainer. We would return if we got a good rate next time as well.

title: bar and breakfast
review: poor variety of liquors at the bar, lack of experience personel on the bar. the answer of the women was now i know this is the first time at this hotel. also they could improve on tha complimentary breackfast

title: Wonderful stay in Ft. Lauderdale
review: Thank you for your review of our hotel and your comments regarding our bar and our breakfast area.    Our bar was just recently opened and we are going through some challenges just like any other businesses when something new is added to a property.  We are working dilgently to address the bar staff and variety of liquors that cusomers prefer.  That's why reviews like yours are important to us, in order for us to continue to learn from our guests and provide the service they expect.  Once again thank you so much for your review and we will address the breakfast and bar to ensure your next stay will be a much better one.  Craig Park

title: Decent Downtown Choice
review: Awesome staff and management team. Close to downtown. Shuttle service offered as well as a trolley stop outside to get to beach or Las Olas. Room was very spacious. Hotel is very clean and spacious. Free wifi and complimentary drinks at check-in.  There is shuttle service and the trolley stop is right outside. Quick access to Las Olas or the beach.

title: Happy employees suggests nice management
review: Thank you so much for your wonderful review of Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas!  I am ecstatic to hear that your accomodation, including the service provided by the city of Fort Lauderdale.    Your review is very important in how we can improve our hotel and our staff and I really appreciate your comments and most importantly, you had a great stay with us!  Once again thank you for your review of Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas and we look forward to seeing you back real soon.  Have a wonderful day.  Craig Park

title: Excellent value
review: Pre-cruise choice so we could check out the downtown area.  Stay included full breakfast, free wi-fi, one complimentary drink and free transfer to the cruise ship terminal.  No transfer from the airport (FLL) but a taxi is reasonable at $20.  Rooms are adequate, firm bed, Pillows OK.  In-room safe and ironing board included.  Hotel was busy but rooms quiet except for some TV noise from an adjoining room.  Hotel staff are friendly and professional.   Would recommend this hotel for downtown.  Three blocks to Las Olas Blvd and the riverfront walk.  The central public transit terminal is one block away and for $4 you can buy a day pass for beach access (routes #11 & 40).  A water taxi is also available at the riverfront walk that travels the waterways to the beaches ($22 Adult for…

title: Between Cruises
review: We had a two night stay between cruises and were looking for the ideal hotel that was close to the cruise terminal, centrally located to restaurants and make the most of beautiful Fort Lauderdale. This is the place!!!!  We arrived at the hotel early and greeted by the nicest of nice young ladies. As to be expected our room was not available at 6.45am and we just wanted to leave our luggage.   To our delight we were offered complimentary breakfast and she organised an air boat tour at the Everglades Holiday Park.  Prior to arrival of the transport we were given access to a small room to change into something more appropriate for an air boat ride.  We returned to the hotel at lunchtime and our room was ready.  There are a multitude of restaurants in the Las Olas area which is…

title: Great Location in FLL
review: Dear Guest,   We are so happy to hear you found the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area to be the perfect hotel during your short visit between cruises!  We have an exceptional staff who truly care about the needs of our guests.  I am delighted to hear they went above and beyond in assisting you with luggage storage, airboat information and restaurant recommendations.    I will be sure to share your great review with all my staff.  Positive feedback is what we strive for and hearing it always brightens our day!  We look forward to seeing you again at the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area in your future travels to Fort Lauderdale!  Best regards, Hampton Management

title: Stayed here on the cruise-and-stay plan, which worked out well
review: the hotel is centrally located in downtown Ft. Lauderdale and close to the interstate and Wilton Manor and other shopping areas.  It's a great place for a couple of nights.  Easy in and out secure parking garage.

title: Great Stay
review: A very warm welcome from your home away from home,   At the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area we pride ourselves on making each and every guest feel at home and special.  Outstanding service and a very clean hotel makes our guests want to return. We appreciate your loyalty.   As you mentioned in your review, we are very close to Wilton Manors and a variety of shopping outlets!  Next time you are in town (if you haven't already), be certain to check out just how close we are to Las Olas... a great spot just a few blocks away with an abundance of restaurants and boutique shopping!   We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny South Florida!

title: Great Hotel
review: We stayed here on a stay-and-cruise plan, and this downtown Hampton Inn is adequate for that purpose.  I believe we paid about $190 for a night's stay, included breakfast, parking in the hotel's adjacent garage for 12 nights plus included transport to Port Everglades, which is about 10 or 15 minutes away depending on traffic and road construction.  It did not include transport back to the hotel, but we bought the return transfer from the Ft. Lauderdale Shuttles desk in the hotel lobby for $10.  The room was standard-issue Hampton Inn.  Breakfast, as per usual for Hampton Inn, was mediocre at best.  It's time for this chain to finally upgrade their included breakfast.  The location is nothing to rave about, with very little of interest within walking distance.  But since we…

title: Tired hotel, long walk to food/entertainment
review: We stayed in this hotel for two nights after our cruise.  The area of town that it is in is not an area that you would want to walk around in... There is no restaurant in the hotel so this does cause a problem or two for dining... unless you have a car of course.  They do have some food available during happy hour.  Likely frozen and heated up but it was edible. The pool area was nice considering the area.  Would I stay here again?  Probably not.  We did not receive any special benefits as Hilton Hhonors Diamond members that I was aware of.  (except for some free candy I think... )

title: Great Hotel
review: Thank you so much for taking some time out of your busy schedule to write a review of our hotel.  We appreciate all candid comments in regards to hotel.  I am sorry that our location and lack of walking distance to restaurant and shops.  I hope you at least enjoyed your cruise.  We do have some challenges, such as having shops or the beach being near our hotel, but we try our best to help each guests to there destinations, which is usually  around $5 to $10 cab ride.  Thank you so much for your review and I hope you have a wonderful day.

title: Do not stay here
review: We have stayed at this Hotel about four times prior to going on a cruise.I cannot say enough about the staff,the rooms and the service.Everything is first class.We are hoping to stay there again next year and would recommend this Hotel. Theresa and Stu McDermid

title: A hotel central to Las Olas and not far from the beaches.
review: Greetings Mr. and Mrs. McDermid!  I am delighted to hear that you have enjoyed each and everyone of your stays at our hotel!  We take great pride in the cleanliness of our hotel and the friendly service we extend to everyone that comes through our doors.    As you know we do offer complimentary shuttle service for 2 guests/room to the Port Everglades Cruise Port.  It is important to us that your transfer from our hotel to the cruiseport is a smooth-hassle free process!  We do everything we can to ensure our guests start their cruises on a positive stress-free note.   Thank you very much for sharing your positive comments and for your loyalty to our hotel during your travels to Fort Lauderdale!  We look forward to seeing you next year!

title: Great stay before and after our Caribbean Cruise in March 2014
review: The location is terrible.  You have homeless people standing out front.  You pay $12 for parking and if you have an SUV it hard for you to travel through.  The breakfast was not fresh. The only thing about breakfast that was good was the yorgurt and the waffle.

title: Good Hotel
review: Good Hotel. Very good with handicap accommodations. They helped me not only with my handicap needs but with my kids too. Issues like milk for my 4 year old at the end of the day or setting the bathroom / shower for my needs was take care immediately.

title: Excellent choice for pre-cruise stay.
review: Dear guest,   We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your great comments about the Hampton Inn Ft Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!  We constantly try to exceed our guests' expectations and make sure all your needs are met.    I am very happy to hear that my staff was able to assist you with your needs during your stay with us.  Your feedback is greatly appreciated and reassures us that our staff is delivering the exceptional quality of service we expect!  We look forward to having you stay with us again at the Hampton Inn Ft Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area!!  Sincerely,  Hampton Inn Management

title: Green bath tub water
review: Would stay here again for over night pre-cruise. Free pickup at airport, the $5 charge to pier was well worth it. Staff was friendly , helpful and courteous. Breakfast was ordinary Hampton fare but more than sufficient to get us to the buffet on the ship. Restaurants near by and a discount shopping center across the street so you can purchase the items you just discovered you forgot.

title: Excellent Pre-cruise option
review: Thank you so much for your review of our wonderful hotel.    I am glad that you enjoyed our shuttle service, staff, and our breakfast.  We've seemed to have made a great impression on you and your family.  Once again, thank you so much for your review and have a great day.

title: Great pre-vacation spot.
review: This hotel had some really  Gross disgusting green bath water.  I was afraid to bathe. I have no idea what it was. It was terrible. No bottled water in the  room. I definitely won't be staying here again!!!

title: Life Saver
review: I would like to thank the manager at this hotel for all his hard work for helping me. I booked 2 rooms for 2 days a business trip, but had to cancel. I was charged for the rooms anyway because the travel agent I used did not cancel the reservation.  I called the hotel and spoke with the manager I explained the situation to him. He advised that he would need to check on some things and get back with me. Not even an hour later he called me back and got the charges reversed. The customer service he gave to me was magnificent and I never even stayed at the hotel. I recommend this hotel..  ARGW

title: Hard working and cheerful
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you very much for taking the time to write a review based on your experience with one of our managers prior to your visit at the Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale Downtown/Las Olas Area.  I am pleased to hear that he went above and beyond in assisting you.  We hope that your future travels will bring you back to Fort Lauderdale so you have the opportunity to stay with us!    Thank you again for taking the time to acknowledge the great service our staff member provided you!  Sincerely,   Hampton Management

title: Dependable downtown lodging
review: My 3 business partners and I arrived early to a very busy lobby, but the front desk had it under control. And even though our check-in wasn't until many hours later, the manager on duty somehow was able to get all 4 of us room within minutes. I appreciated their cheerfulness and being able to be on task despite the long lines that morning.  Accommodations at the hotel are comfortable and clean, and the free breakfast is pretty good. For the price and location, this place is a no-brainer.

title: Very nice for the price
review: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your great review of the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale/Downtown Las Olas Area!    As you saw first hand our lobby is often full of guests departing and arriving at the same time!  I am so happy that  our staff displayed friendly and helpful attitudes even during such a busy time.  Although we can't always accomodate early arrivals we definitely try our best to check in our guests as early as possible; so I'm glad we were able to do that for you and your colleagues!   We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share your review with us and future travelers to the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale/Downtown Las Olas Area!  We hope to see you again soon.   Safe travels and many thanks,  Kelly Matera Assistant General Manager

title: Warmth..
review: This location is central for many business functions.  I stay there due to the close vicinity to company headquarters.  The rooms are comfortable and clean to an average degree.  If quiet is what you seek, request a room away from the elevators.  The breakfasts are above average - with plenty of options and a pleasant, café-like atmosphere.  I would not recommend this location for vacation travel - but it is fine for commercial needs.

title: Convenient Pre-cruise Stay
review: Our flight arrived late to FLL.  We took a taxi to the hotel and were greeted by the friendly desk staff.  He informed us of the times for breakfast and the shuttle to the port. The room was clean and comfortable.  There were a variety of items for breakfast.  The outdoor pool area looked nice.  We opted for the 10:30 am shuttle.  The driver was on time and it was a short drive to the port.  We didn't stay long, but this suited our pre-cruise needs.  We'd stay here again.

title: Excellent Experience
review: Arrived at Hampton Inn in Fort Lauderdale two days before Christmas. Everything was going great until we returned back to the hotel room late Christmas Eve only to find that the air condition in the room was not working.  We went to the receptionist (Fatima) and she assisted us immediately. She sent someone to our room to rectify the problem and when the air condition could not be repaired (about 15 minutes) she assigned us another room.  The new room was better than the previous room.  We had immediate assistance in moving our items to our new room and the additional items such as pillows, were brought to us promptly.  I was quite surprised to have this kind of service on Christmas Eve and of everyone's kindness.  Even though we had rented a car from the airport, we found the…

title: Would Recommend
review: The Hampton Inn at Ft Lauderdale was nice, clean, and convenient. The staff was friendly. They did not have a free shuttle from the airport but did have a free shuttle to the Port of Ft Lauderdale. The hotel offered a free drink at the bar and had a nice selection of tapas to choose from. The pool and hot tub were clean and attractive. As a bonus, it was a nice walk of only 6 blocks to the open air market on Las Olas.

title: Excellent Experience
review: We read all the reviews prior to going to this hotel and we were, actually, a little concerned by all the negative comments.  But everything went very well, from the check-in to check-out.  Our room was great, nothing was wrong, including water pressure in the shower (which always seems to be a problem).  All the services were professional and attentive.  We couldn't have asked for a better experience.  I believe the only "con" would be the parking garage.  We have a van and it was extremely difficult to drive into and find a place to park.  The location is in a business park area of town, so I'm sure this hotel caters to business clients.  But as vacationers, it worked well for us.

title: Location Location Location - Not
review: Picked this hotel via internet.  Did not realize you had to take a taxi to find dinner.  Advised not to walk around after dark by front desk.  Vacant building across the street.  vagrants (they appear to be vagrants) lounging around the buildings this morning.  Bar served good pulled pork sliders, shrimp tacos, and cold beer.  Free shuttle to Port Everglades but around $30 taxi from airport.

title: Very satisfied
review: Very professional staff, room clean, breakfast excellent, close to great dining and walks.  This is in close driving distance to a college my daughter is planning to attend.  If that happens we will try to work out a favorable deal with the hotel and stay there as a preferred location.

title: Staff unresponsive, unprofessional and didnt care.
review: Stayed frim Tuesday February 18, 2014 - February 22, 2014. Room 600. Toliet continued to run shut off run shut off. Informed front desk every morning. Kept me awake all night every night. Front desk did not care. On 3rd day price jumped seventy-seven dollars for remainder of stay No warning. On my bill at check out. Asked twice to see  or speak with manager- saturday evening - told no manager on site till sunday morning.  Sunday morning no managetn untill Sunday ato3 pm. Asked if i could speak to one by phone- not possible. Staying because im from out of town and friend was in Broward Hospital with spine surgery.  Inform hospital not to recomend people with loved ones in hospital stay here. Florida has a price gouging law. Do not recomend for anyones stay.

title: Tired and old property
review: Dear guest,   We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience during your stay with us.  We regret to hear that you experienced issues during your stay.    We respond to all guest issues as quickly and efficiently as possible.  I am shocked that your concerns were not taken care of immediately and I apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.  Our hotel was actually in the process of management and staff changes during this week.  I assure you the staff we have on our team now are all attentive professionals who strive to make sure every guest is 100% satisfied during their stay with us.   During the high season in Fort Lauderdale it is extremely common for hotels to offer different nightly rates between the weekend and weekdays.  These rates should have been disclosed to you during the reservation making process.  We apologize if the reservation agent did not make this clear to you at that time.    We do have a manager on duty 7 days a week and try to respond as quickly as possible to all guest concerns.  I would be more than happy to speak with you if you would like to contact us directly.   Our number one priority for every guest is 100% satisfaction.   Thank you again for taking the time to share your comments.  Best Regards,  Kelly Matera- Assistant General Manager

title: Mixed emotions...
review: The furnishings and look of the room may be correct for the brand but beneath the surface is a tired and old hotel building that likely has been through many incarnations.  It struggles to maintain brand identity.  Staff is disheveled looking with wrinkled shirts and loose ties.  Looks like management is just giving up on the property and its staff and is relying on brand identity to keep it alive.  Their efforts are not very successful.

title: Average Stay
review: First of all, I had no problem with the hotel. It was clean and my pre cruise and post cruise stay  was satisfactory. The area is a bit off the beaten track as far as restaurants are concerned but the hotel offer a tapas menu each evening that was quite good but somewhat limited. My only gripe (and I discussed this with the manager) was a front desk person who did not belong in that position. This particular individual looked and dressed like a homeless person and was not at all keeping with the image that Hilton or Hampton want to present to the traveling public. Not only was his appearance deplorable but when I asked for assistance he didn't seem eager to help nor did he attempt to find someone who could answer a question. I hope this individual will clean up his act and…

title: pre-cruise stayt
review: hotel was nice, clean rooms & front desk very helpful, no shuttle to hotel from airport..$20.00, no place to eat within 3 blocks which was'nt good. free shuttle to port was great, shopping & good dining about 5 blocks away....you will be staying in downtown finacial area.

title: Waiting for a bus that never arrives
review: Thank-You for taking the time to provide us with great feedback! We definitely have a wonderful staff that takes pride on ensuring each guest is happy. The Irish Pub is just a block or so from us which makes it an easy walk at any time of day. I hope you had a wonderful cruise and I look forward to seeing you on your next cruise and / or trip to Sunny South Florida!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Great Stay!
review: Good clean efficient hotel. But Advertising a sun trolley (with bus stop outside the hotel) that does not run any more is annoying. I saw many people waiting for the bus and hotel staff (all three of them) uninterested when I informed them.

title: Unhappy customer
review: Hello from Fort Lauderdale -   I am just as caught off guard as you are.  We are in the process of looking into the re-routing of the trolley.  Sadly, the route was just changed without notifying the hotel.  Annoying yes ... but, we are diligently working on it and will have this hopefully corrected in the near future!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Very nice hotel
review: We had a great stay at Hampton Inn Ft. Lauderdale!  Everything was top notch!  The Inn was clean, beautiful and roomy!  Great breakfast with lots of choices and a nice place to eat, inside and outside!  The other amenities were awesome!

title: The staff goes above and beyond
review: When working at Broward Health I try to stay at this property as much as I can .   The general manager, Kelly Malone, keeps her staff on their toes !     Everytime I check in and check out the experience is flawless.   The rooms are cleaned properly and the bedding is very comfortable .   The breakfast lady who I often see there does a perfect job and her smile  and polite nature is very welcoming in the morning .   One of my joys is that this property DOES NOT CHARGE FOR PARKING !  ....  I find it silly that hotels with on site parking nickel and dime you for parking.   However, do not rent a large SUV since the garage is super tight.    The garage walls bear scrapes and scars from previous guest mishaps.        Overall, I must say this is one of the nicest run Hampton Inns  I…

title: Overpriced for quality provided.
review: Hello from warm and sunny Fort Lauderdale,   I Love that word Exceptional! At the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale we strive to give 100% every single day and personalize each guest experience. Attention to detail is what we are great at ... hence our clean rooms and welcoming staff.   I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale,  Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Lives up to the Hampton name
review: This is an ok hotel in a seedy area in Fort Lauderdale. You can walk to some shops and restaurants in 20 minutes but sketchy people are out at night. Hotel was quiet with comfortable beds but it was slightly dirty and run down. Price was almost $200/night. Breakfast was free but not good at all. I wouldn't stay here again.

title: Stay here before or after a cruise!
review: Greetings from South Florida,    At the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale. We try very hard to make each and every guest enjoy their stay with hopes of seeing them year after year! I will address your comments with my team and utilize them as a learning tool to improve in the future!   Safe Travels and I do hope to see you and your family on your next trip to Sunny South Florida!   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Would not stay again.
review: Me and my wife stayed in the Hampton Inn when we were visiting family for the holidays and let me  just say that this Hampton lives up to the name. Staff was incredibly attentive especially the Housekeeping supervisor Angie. My wife wanted new linens since she accidentally spilled her wine on them and without no hesitation Angie came in there with fresh ones within 10 minutes. Next time we're going back to Florida we're definitely coming back to this Hampton.

title: Not up to Hampton Inn standards
review: We stay at Hampton Inns often and chose this hotel because of the close proximity to the airport.  We had a late flight and wanted something close to the airport.  When we arrived, check in was quick and easy - no issues there. The problem was with the cleanliness of the room.  You can imagine my surprise when I looked behind the night stand to plug in my phone and found a used condom.  That about sums up how clean the room was.  At check-out, the lady at the front desk was very short with us.  We asked her to call a taxi for us, and we ended up waiting over 20 minutes for one to arrive.   No wonder the rate was so affordable. You get what you pay for....

title: Not as nice as I was let to believe
review: Thank-You for taking the time to share your experience. The hotel is located in a Downtown area that has a lot of colors if you will. The Greyhound station being a 10 minute walk is a tad more colorful than where we are located. The Hampton Inn Downtown City center is just a few blocks north of Trendy Las Olas a very hip hot spot for boutique shopping and restaurants with outdoor cafe's and a beautiful waterfront area, close to fortune 500 businesses and a $5.00 taxi ride to Fort Lauderdale Beach ... The hotel as you mentioned in beautiful and the staff is on point ready to please. I am delighted that you did have a wonderful time in Fort Lauderdale and loved the hotel...   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Ideal located for Las Olas
review: My wife and I stayed here twice before and after our cruise; the good was the fact the hotel is not far from the airport or the cruise ship so it is easy access to both. We rested comfortably in quiet rooms on each stay, desk staff is very courteous and helpful.   The not so good; if you do not have a car your dining options are quite limited, the hotel is not in the best neighborhood (its actually downtown) there is a McDonalds and Subway within walking distance NOT within sight of the hotel. Be prepared to walk through dark streets in a risky neighborhood. Be early for breakfast, as this hotel caters to persons departing on a cruise, everyone hits the breakfast area about the same time overwhelming the area. The second visit I arrived early to the breakfast area and made the…

title: Would definitely stay again
review: No Hilton Gold privileges as stated at reception and had to move first room as large tree right in front of window which blocked out the light.   Moved to higher floor which was much better. Staff very obliging and moved us without any bother.  Nice pool area with sun beds and pool towels.   Very friendly girls in bar, and good standard breakfast

title: First Stay in Florida
review: Greetings from Sunny Fort Lauderdale -   I am excited to receive your review and that you shared your experience with us. The Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City center is in the prime location just a few short blocks from Trendy Las Olas and walking distance to fortune 500 companies and both the Federal and County Court Houses. We do have a brand new bar with food items open every night from 5pm - 11pm which seems to be a hit with our guests! Just to touch base though quickly regarding restaurants within walking distance there are a few within a block or two (McGuire’s Irish Pub within 100 yards, salad bowl and subway and well as Cafe Verdi within 200 yards) then on Las Olas which is four blocks away or a five minute, five dollar taxi ride away we have over 40 restaurants and boutique shopping.   I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Pre-Cruise Room
review: This is a good place to stay for pre-cruise in Fort Lauderdale.  I prefer some of the places closer to the ships, but this time they were all filled up.  I booked this as a HHonors reward, but it seemed reasonably priced, the staff was great, it was clean, the breakfast was good, the cruise shuttle was on time.  The only downside was lack of airport shuttle.

title: Good, reliable hotel in downtown Ft Lauderdale
review: Greetings from Downtown Fort Lauderdale!   I am always excited to read a review that shares our newest amenity that we offer to our guests ... We recently opened " The Perfect Mix Bar " which is located on our second floor and open daily from 5pm - 11pm. Our bar offers tapas food items and a wide selection of spirits that are sure to please everyone. Thank-you for your loyalty!   I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!  Safe Travels,  Kelley Malone

title: Stay over from cruise
review: I've stayed here many times and it is consistently clean and comfortable. The staff are pleasant and courteous. Rooms are spacious and well-appointed. There is no restaurant on the property, but the bar has some food and a nice, relaxing atmosphere. Recommended.

title: Very convenient, nice hotel with poor service
review: Greetings from Sunny Fort Lauderdale -   I am excited to receive your review and that you shared your experience with us. The Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City center is in the prime location just a few short blocks from Trendy Las Olas and walking distance to fortune 500 companies and both the Federal and County Court Houses. We do have a brand new bar with food items open every night from 5pm - 11pm which seems to be a hit with our guests! Just to touch base though quickly regarding restaurants within walking distance there are a few within a block or two (McGuire’s Irish Pub within 100 yards, salad bowl and subway and well as Cafe Verdi within 200 yards) then on Las Olas which is four blocks away or a five minute, five dollar taxi ride away we have over 40 restaurants and boutique shopping.   I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Allergic Pillows
review: Great hotel ... walking distance from Las Olas shopping district and River Walk.  Great hot breakfast, constant coffee, tea, hot chocolate.... microwave and fridge in large guest rooms...free cookies and trolley around Las Olas.

title: full 4 stars, swimming pool, parking, transfer to cruise port
review: This hotel deserves its 4 stars . Pleasant decor , large rooms . Friendly staff. The hotel has ample parking and outdoor pool . Breakfast is served in the cafeteria on the second floor from 6 AM to 10 AM. Breakfast is included in the room rate . Free coffee is available in the Lobby 24 hours. The hotel offers a free shuttle to the cruise port for two people in the room. If you have more than two (for example, your kids) each next passenger pays only 7 USD. To the main street Fort Lauderdale you can take a taxi for 5 USD or walk in 5-7 minutes. On arrival at the hotel we were also provided vouchers for free drinks at the hotel bar ( open from 5 PM to 12 PM). Of the free drinks you can get draft beer, glass of wine or a soft drink. At 100 meters from the hotel Macdonalds. The…

title: Quiet and Relaxing
review: Hello from Fort Lauderdale!   We would love to host your group next time you are in Fort Lauderdale! At the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale - City Center we pride ourselves on outstanding guest service and value everyone’s individuality. We strive to personalize each and every guests stay making it a memorable experience as I see we were able to accomplish with you and your family / group during your stay!   Looking forward to seeing you on your next stay in Sunny South Florida!   Safe Travels,

title: shuttle
review: Along with a friendly and welcoming staff that greeted me upon a late evening arrival, my room was very clean and very quiet.  The staff also proved knowledgeable regarding the best way to get around town, and also to the airport.  I utilized the complimentary breakfast and coffee each day and was very pleased.  The hotel also had a bar with nice menu items as well.  When visiting Ft Lauderdale in the future, I will definitely consider staying here again.

title: Great Place to Stay
review: Thank-You for sharing your experience. I am delighted that you found The Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown Las Olas Area to be clean, comfortable and fair priced with an outstanding staff! We do love what we do and have a staff whose goal is to WOW each and every one of our guests. As for the parking charge, having an attached four story secured parking garage is unique to Hamptons but also to the Downtown Fort Lauderdale area especially at a hotel so close in proximity to fortune 500 companies and Trendy Las Olas. I do Thank-You for your loyalty and look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Good Hotel near Riverwalk
review: This Hampton has great new bar and always good breakfast plus complementary shuttle to cruise port that combine to make the downtown  hotel a useful stop on the way to the Caribbean. I have stayed here a few times and found the staff and hotel quality consistent.  It is near a few convenience stores and restaurants, too.  Good for the pre-cruise crowd especially.  Staff is helpful. Business centre is handy, too. But book early during the holiday season.

title: Alternative to pricy resorts pre cruise in Ft. Lauderdale
review: After being quoted a $299 per person for one night at the ship's Atlantic Resort Hotel, we remembered staying at this Hampton Inn several years ago, and were very pleased that we picked it for a 2 night pre-cruise stay.  The rooms had been upgraded, as well as most of the hotel.  The only disappointment was that there evening offer of drinks and appetizers 'every night' didn't happen, probably because of the occupancy rate.  Didn't matter as the hotel is within walkable distance to fine restaurants, banks, beauty salons, etc.  Mostly business area but a fast $25 (for both) to the ship was a nice added savings.  Would recommend it again.

title: Unexpected Find for Overnight Cruise Stay! Efficient Service
review: At the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown Las Olas Area we offer three star pricing with five star service!   Dynamically located right in the heart of Downtown and just a stone’s throw away from Internationally know Trendy Las Olas we are in the perfect location!  Whether you are on a business trip or leisure ... we will WOW you with our service and attention to detail!    Looking forward to seeing you during your next stay!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Great place to stay in downtown Fort Lauderdale!!
review: We actually had booked our original reservation at another hotel (ES). Once we arrived at the other hotel, we were immediately told that they were overbooked despite having made the reservation some 5 months ahead of time. ES put us up for the night at this Hampton Inn.  From now on, Hampton Inn Las Olas will be the place to stay before and possibly after our cruise vacation. The employees were prompt, courteous and very efficient. The room was clean and quite comfortable. For the money, this hotel provides a great service. The complimentary breakfast was good and the free shuttle service to the pier was absolutely wonderful.   It is a short taxi ride to many shops and restaurants. We had no trouble getting a taxi within 10 minutes. Yes, you can walk there in about 20 minutes…

title: Decent room, good price - the neighbourhood OK but was convenient
review: A hidden gem...     I am delighted that you were walked to our property and have found a new home!    We do pride ourselves on going the extra mile to ensure all guests are treated “well, like they are on vacation “and create a memory.  Giving you and your family time to relax and unwind while we do all the work ... stress free zone!     Our pool deck is beautiful and sparkling clean ... quite location and just a few short blocks from trendy Las Olas Blvd!!!  Great location...    Looking forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Not very impressive!
review: Just stayed at this Hampton Inn in downtown Fort Lauderdale last week and had an overall wonderful experience!! Everything was very clean, staff was extremely friendly and helpful and the hotel property was very safe. I like that keys were required to access all entries and exits as well as all floors from the elevator. There was an easily accessible parking lot attached to the main building and a complimentary breakfast with an amazingly wide array of foods served!! I would certainly stay here again if I found myself in the area.

title: Dependable, good staff and convenient location.
review: Staff is friendly and helpful, and the location is perfect for downtown work.  The desk personnel will go above and beyond to assist with requests.  Rooms are clean, and the breakfast and bar options are above average.

title: good clean comfortable stay
review: Greetings from Fort Lauderdale!   Thank-You for the kind words and sharing your experience.  At the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown Las Olas Area we strive to deliver great service.  Being right in the heart of Downtown near fortune 500 companies and Trendy Las Olas we are in the perfect location for corporate clientele, just a night on the town or guests that are departing on a cruise!    I do look forward to seeing you on your next visit to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: Bugs in the Bathroom
review: This was a good clean, comfortable stay at an affordable price. I did not like the parking charge. I think the rates should cover the parking. The staff was courteous, friendly, and efficient. I have found this to be true at nearly 100% of the hampton properties.

title: Hampton known for quality, then why is this property lacking?
review: Thank-You for sharing your experience.  I am delighted that you found The Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale Downtown Las Olas Area to be clean, comfortable and fair priced with an outstanding staff!   We do love what we do and have a staff whose goal is to WOW each and every one of our guests.  As for the parking charge,  having an attached four story secured parking garage is unique to Hamptons but also to the Downtown Fort Lauderdale area especially at a hotel so close in proximity to fortune 500 companies and Trendy Las Olas.   I do Thank-You for your loyalty and look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,   Kelley Malone General Manager

title: stayed one night prior to cruise
review: I experienced an infestation of tiny black insects in the bathroom (room 200).  I've stayed here before.  This is the first time I've had such a problem.  Probably cuts in facility maintenance and pest control.

title: Pre-cruise Stay
review: This Hampton is only a short distance from the cruise ports. Like all Hampton Inns, it is clean, free breakfast and there is a free shuttle to port. We fly in late and leave by noon so didn't spend any time in the area.  We were able to get a light dinner from the bar at a reasonable price at 10:00 pm. Stayed here twice prior to a cruise and would stay again.

title: Great Accomodations and Value
review: Greetings from Downtown Fort Lauderdale!   I am always excited to read a review that shares our newest amenity that we offer to our guests ... We recently opened " The Perfect Mix Bar "   which is located on our second floor and open daily from 5pm - 11pm.  Our bar offers tapas food items and a wide selection of spirits that are sure to please everyone.   Thank-you for your loyalty!   I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Dishonest housekeeping staff
review: This hotel has great accomodations and is centrally located to many great restaurants, shopping and destinations in Ft. Lauderdale. Rooms and bathrooms are very clean and comfortable. Great value! We would definitely book here again.

title: pre-cruise stay
review: Hello from Fort Lauderdale,   I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your experience and our hotel!  You are correct!  We do have an extremely clean hotel and terrific staff!  We are always striving to exceed our guests expectations.  We are centrally located and very close to Trendy Las Olas which is a must see when you are in the area!   Thank-You for your comments and I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Service with a Smile
review: I spent one night here before leaving on a cruise.  I accidentally left a dress and a jacket in the closet when I checked out.  5 days later I returned from the cruise and called to arrange to pick them up.  They said the items were not in the lost and found,  Knowing exactly where I left them, there is only one possibility - whoever found them opted to keep them instead of turning them in.  Other than this disappointment, the hotel was fine.

title: Nice overnight stay
review: We stopped here for a night upon arrival in Florida to rest and to shop a bit. The hotel was clean and friendly. We had dinner locally at a recommend Irish pub. Security is an obvious concern in the neighborhood but was efficiently addressed at the hotel and at local businesses. We would stay at this hotel again.

title: Basic, but clean
review: Thank-You for choosing the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City center - Downtown.  Shopping you say ?   I hope you were able to visit our closest shopping area  ( Las Olas Blvd. )  which has over 40 restaurants and trendy boutique shopping ...  Sawgrass Mills, The Galleria Mall and Aventura Mall are all in the area too !!  We are a great location for a shopping destination!   I hope to see you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Great Stay!
review: After staying in several Hilton hotels in/around the Ft. Lauderdale area, this Hampton Inn is actually much better.  The rooms are basic, but very neat, modern, and clean.  I would stay here again over other Hilton hotels in Ft. Lauderdale.  There is not much to walk to in the evening in the area, but not a problem if you have a car.  The staff is nice.  The beds are comfortable and the bathrooms good sized.  My only complaint would be about the fact that the breakfast was poorly stocked when we were there.  It was a bit messy and out of several items.  I'm sure they would have re-stocked it if we had stuck around.  I was fine with cold cereal.  Breakfast is complimentary for everyone.  As a Gold member, we got a room on the top floor, 2 drink coupons, and a free snack.  Good…

title: very nice
review: Thank-You for choosing the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City Center - Downtown.  I am always delighted to read reviews that offer extensive feedback.  This way I am able to offer a pat on the back to my team with a little constructive criticism in efforts to improve for your next stay!   At the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City Center / Downtown we do try very hard to ensure every guest is treated like an individual and your stay is memorable.  We did just add a full service bar with food items on the second floor that has proven to be a real hit with our guests!  We are just a few short blocks to Trendy Las Olas Blvd.  which boasts over 40 restaurants and boutique shopping... If you do not want  to walk a taxi is about $5.00 / 5 minutes away  ( very convenient ).    Thank-You for your positive comments!   I look forward to seeing you and your colleagues during your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Extrodinary Service
review: Great location for our visit to the Ft. Lauderdale Int'l Boat Show. Easy reservation, offers no fee cancellation within 24 hours prior. Easy check in, received complimentary drink for business trip. Room was very good, comfortable temp, comfortable bed. Check out was exceptionally easy. Complimentary breakfast offered everything you could ask for. Definitely recommended! My only complaint would be the rate of the room which was a shocking 50% higher than if I stayed the very next week.

title: A pleasant surprise
review: The Hampton Inn at City Center had everything that we look for in a hotel and we were pleasantly surprised! It was clean, staff were helpful and accommodating, and the hotel and parking garage felt very safe and secure. We were in town for only 1 day for an event but wish we would've stayed longer! From the moment we walked in, we felt catered to. We were put on a waiting list for an early check in and able to get in our room a little earlier than normal. I didn't catch the guys name who assisted us but he was great (afternoon of 11/2/13)! The front desk staff even gave a courtesy call to make sure we were completely satisfied with our room. The free breakfast buffet was much more than we expected; not just a continental breakfast, but hot foods such as eggs, sausage, and french…

title: Four night stay
review: Hello from Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Thank-You for your comments!  We are a great value and offer amenities that prove to have a cost savings benefit.  Complimentary breakfast , shuttle for two to Port Everglades, free wifi , two free drink tickets at check in for our brand new full service bar with tapas food items as well as a Shop and Drop package that offers a shopping and meal gist card along with other goodies...  definitly something to look into!     I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Please turn the MUSAC off during breakfast!!!
review: While on business we stayed four nights at this property.  As others have reviewed the location to the airport, Las Olas and the Riverfront is great. Exceptionally clean and wonderful bed/bedding. David at the front desk was exceptionally accommodating.  The breakfast served is very good for yogurt, fresh fruit, juice, muffins, oat meal and waffles.  The scrambled eggs were weird and the potatoes were tasteless.  The pool area is very nice and well maintained. Overall it is an excellent property for the money.  Will definitely stay here again.

title: Great hotel for overnight when cruising out of Fort Lauderdale
review: Greetings from Fort Lauderdale -   I am always excited to read a review with some meat and potatoes to it ... the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City Center is  centrally located right in the heart of downtown Fort Lauderdale!  Just moments from Trendy Las Olas and the Riverfront.  Great Location!  Easily walk-able or a $5.00 / 5 minute taxi ride ...   Our rooms are exceptionally clean with great attention to detail as I believe I do have the best housekeeping director out there ... She loves what she does!   My staff truly loves what they do ...  The entire team goes above and beyond daily to ensure great service and personal attention.  I do hope to see you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Excellent Place if in the Area
review: October 23, 2013 Kelley Malone General Manager Fort Lauderdale- City Center/Downtown Dear Ms. Malone, I want to tell you about one of your wonderful employees. Her name is Kelley Matera.  Kelley is a really great representative for your company. Kelley has wonderful customer service skills and she makes the customers (like me) feel like a million dollars. I had a special request (high floor, two beds, etc) and Kelley was able to accommodate my needs. I only fly Delta.  I only rent cars from Avis, I own a Volvo and I love staying at the Hampton Inn on North Andrews Avenue when I am in Fort Lauderdale.  I am super brand loyal to Delta, Avis,Volvo and Hampton Inn/Hilton. I am brand loyal to those four brands because of people like Kelley Matera. Please tell Kelley how much I…

title: Sick Value!
review: Pros:  Loved the trip so much. Great location. Great price. Only Hampton Inn WITH ALCOHOL bar! AWESOME Breakfast Great WiFi Enrique is the man. Hooked it up! Free Drink Tickets  Cons:  Room was near side entrance door, elevator AND maid room...so LOT of action in the AM. If you want to sleep in , might request room not near those areas

title: Great Hotel, No Febreeze Needed
review: Hello from Sunny South Florida!   I am excited to read that you enjoyed your stay and found that the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City Center is a great value!  We did just add a full service bar with tapas food items that seem to be a hit with all of our guests ...   I do hope that you had a chance to spend some time on our beautiful beaches and at Trendy Las Olas located just a few blocks from the hotel!   I do look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Not customer friendly............will not go back
review: We stayed at this hotel when taking a cruise leaving Port Lauderdale.I kept my confirmation because I wanted to remember to write this review. When I walked into the room it smelled so fresh. I couldn't believe it.When I inquired at the desk I found they wash ALL their bedlinens daily. Wow! No old bed spreads for this hotel. If cleanliness is important to you, this is the place to stay. It also is walking distance  to Las Olas. It was a great place to stay. The only little ding was the free shuttle to the port. We registered at the desk for this service and I am not sure everyone else did, but when the shuttle came in the morning it could not accommadate all. Make sure if you stay here and need the shuttle, you let the front desk know.

title: Excellent Hotel and Location
review: Thank-You for taking the time to share your experience with us.  We try very hard to ensure each guest room is clean and comfortable for each and every guest.  The Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City Center is located right in the heart of Downtown and just a few blocks to trendy Las Olas ...  which is a great walk or a $5.00  - 5 minute taxi ride.   I am delighted that you loved your stay and do look forward to seeing you on your next stay at The Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale City Center !   Safe Travels

title: Simple but perfect
review: A/C in room kept cycling on and off, despite the room was 6 degrees warmer than we had it set for.  Front desk sent a maintenance person to inspect.  He had attitude - put his hand in front of the vents and said "it's working fine."  When we tried to explain the issue, he got argumentative and kept saying "no problem with A/C."  We requested to switch rooms and the front desk also wasn't overly friendly about it.  A/C in the "new" room worked fine.  We will not stay at this Hampton again, nor recommend it to anyone as there are other choices in the area closer to the beach for the same price!

title: Great place downtown
review: If you have business at the court or other venue in downtown this is the place. There are no restaurants w/in walking distance. HOWEVER, the hotel bar in the evening serves many light plates and tapas at a very reasonable price. It served me well.

title: Overnight stay
review: Greetings from Sunny Fort Lauderdale -   I am excited to receive your review and that you shared your experience with us.   The Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City center is in the prime location just a few short blocks from Trendy Las Olas and walking distance to fortune 500 companies and both the Federal and County Court Houses.  We do have a brand new bar with food items open every night from 5pm - 11pm which seems to be a hit with our guests!   Just to touch base though quickly regarding restaurants within walking distance there are a few within a block or two (McGuire’s Irish Pub within 100 yards, salad bowl and subway and well as Cafe Verdi within 200 yards) then on Las Olas which is four blocks away or a five minute, five dollar taxi ride away we have over 40 restaurants and boutique shopping.    I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Hampton Inn and ACE Tours Feedback
review: Booked by my brother who has stayed here before, the hotel is very quiet and comfortable. Good serve yourself breakfast and a bar in the evening for which we got a complementary drink on arrival. The rooms were fairly large with a very comfortable bed and great soft linen. I would highly recommend this hotel, we paid about $94 for the one night. One downside is they have just recently started to charge $12 a day to park your car!!!!!!

title: Unparalleled Customer Service
review: Thank-you for choosing the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City Center. I understand your concerns and address each and every guest concern with care and individuality.  The surrounding area has more colorful areas then others, luckily we are in an area very close to Trendy Las Olas and the business district which has Fortune 500 corporate buildings with exquisite architecture.  The staff is on point and provides excellent costumer service.   I do look forward to seeing you and your family on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!     Danke für die Wahl der Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City Center. Ich verstehe Ihre Bedenken und adressieren jeden Gast Anliegen mit Sorgfalt und Individualität. Die Umgebung hat

title: Nice hotel near downtown Ft Lauderdale
review: We enjoyed our stay at Hampton Inn and their added service of having ACE Tours representatives in the lobby to assist with transportation to the port and airline.  We left the ship early and the ACE Tours driver was already there waiting at the port when we cleared customs to take us to the airport/hotel. ACE Tours excellent transportation and customer service enabled us to arrive at the airport early and catch an earlier flight home.

title: Business trip
review: This Hotel is in a nice area and the staff is great. Only had an issue with the shower water (turning a different color) and the toilet not flushing right. The check in was quick and the breakfast was great!

title: Hotel is Beautiful, Staff NEEDS MAJOR HELP!
review: Greetings from Sunny Fort Lauderdale!!!    I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the staff treated you right!  Our staff prides itself on creating a memorable experience for each and every guest.  As for the water ... recently we did have the City of Fort Lauderdale testing the water lines in the area causing discolored water ( which has no negative impact on guest ) other than a the color  - which with allowing the faucet to run a little bit it bleeds the lines.   The hotel does try to take corrective measures to prevent guests from having this experience.  Hopefully, you did have the chance to see all that Fort Lauderdale has to offer - especially Trendy Las Olas which boasts over 40 restaurants and boutique shops that is just a hop, skip and a jump away from the hotel...    I do hope to see you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale -

title: Two day business trip review
review: As I stated in the title, this Hampton was the best Hampton in terms of condition, free breakfast, etc. that I have ever witnessed! The only problem was the Staff! They were constantly "pestering" me about payments here and there, and overall, very nausiating, to say the least! Please get the Manager and her staff some REAL CUSTOMER SERVICE TRAINING ASAP!

title: Beautiful Hotel and Great Experience
review: Thank-You for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I am always eager to receive transparent feedback.  I am delighted that you enjoyed the hotel decor and it's amenities - the hotel is in a great location with a " Funky Fort Lauderdale decor feel ".   As for your comments regarding the staff,   I have looked into your concerns and want to advise you that at any hotel, restaurant or location where you are receiving a service a form of payment is necessary.  Due to several decline credit cards and having to obtain multiple credit card authorization forms I can understand how this may seem as if the staff is " pestering " you.  Honestly, nothing personal , it's just business.    As I am certain have read from the past over 100 reviews the staff is complimented on the majority as making each and every guest stay relaxing and one of the best!   I do apologize that you felt the way you did upon departure.  We hope to see you on your next trip to Sunny South Florida !   Safe Travels,

title: Great location
review: Stayed here for a quick two day business trip working in the Las Olas district. Received a nice welcome upon arrival (as a business traveler, it is very much appreciated).  Nice property situated next to city hall in downtown Ft. Lauderdale. Layout is similar to the Hampton Inn by Miami International Airport; spacious contemporary breakfast lounge area on the second floor adjacent to the lovely outdoor pool deck. Unique feature for a Hampton Inn: the coffee area transitions into a hotel bar serving apps/tapas at night.  Rooms were definitely above average for a Hampton Inn and their competitors where the contemporary design was carried through to. They get additional bonus points for the smart floor to ceiling "kitchen/pantry" cabinet containing the fridge, microwave, coffee,…

title: 2013 - Vacation
review: It was OK, the area around this hotel it is NOT safe at all. I was not aware of the SATISFACION  policy.  The free brakefast was not good quialty. I shouild not be charge for PARKING fee. I used the parking for ONE night, but iwas charged for every night during my stay.

title: Very Nice Hotel
review: Greetings from Sunny Fort Lauderdale -    I wanted to take a moment and respond to your review and experience.  The Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale is dynamically located right in the heart of Fort Lauderdale.  Just a few blocks from Trendy Las Olas which boasts over 40 restaurants with exquisite boutique shopping.  Naturally, in every downtown area there are more colorful area's than others which to our benefit we are located outside of these areas and in a location where you can enjoy all that Fort Lauderdale has to offer ( Beaches , shopping, museums , restaurants and funky artwork ).     I do hope to see you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Hampton Inn in Downtown Ft. Lauderdale
review: Stayed one night here and had a lovely stay.  This is a very nice hotel with great rooms.  The breakfast was a good selection and nice seating area.  The parking garage was also nice with a walkway into the hotel.  The location was close to the airport (12 min) and close to the Los Olas area.    Reinhard at the front desk was very accommodating and helpful with directions and more.  We had accidentally gone first to the Hampton Inn Airport North (wrong GPS instructions) and that place looked very uninviting and dirty.  We are extremely glad that we had booked this downtown location instead based on tripadvisor reviews.

title: Hampton Fort Lauderdale
review: Greetings from the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City center!   I am delighted that your GPS put you on the right track and you were able to find us!   Thank-You for your generous comments!  We are a very unique property and far from the traditional Hampton Inn.  Located right in the heart of Downtown Fort Lauderdale and just a stone’s throw away from trendy Las Olas you definitely made the right choice when booking us!   Our decor has a “Funky Fort Lauderdale " theme and with our newly built full service bar with tapas food items we are the perfect place to enjoy a drink on our pool deck overlooking the Fort Lauderdale skyline ...   Looking forward to seeing you on your next trip to Fort Lauderdale!!   Safe Travels,

title: Hampton Inn Ft Lauderdale
review: Stayed at the Hampton Inn City Center for business.  I found the customer service at the facility to be very good, they were prompt at check in and helped with taxi service.  They have a very nice breakfast area with plenty of room to sit in the morning.  As an added bonus this Hampton Inn has a bar, where I enjoyed a complimentary beer.  This hotel is in close proximity to several restaurants.  The rooms could probably be a little more updated, I have stayed in nicer Hampton Inn rooms on business.  Overall it was a nice hotel in a good location and I enjoyed my stay.

title: Hampton...time to renovate
review: Checked as a Hampton regular never having been to this location. This downtown Hampton is central for business access.  Asked for an.upper floor and was put on the 10th floor. Decent but the tub looks like the original,  worn and chipped, qith rust marks at the floor. They say the douvets are cleaned for you...?  Laid my dark pants on it and found white dogs hairs on them.   Worst of all-ROACHES on the 10th floor. At 4am when I went in the bathroom there's a german cockroach on the wall. I forgave seeing the smaller on I saw before bedtime on the desk! Come on Hampton...I won't be back to this hotel! !

title: Great hotel brand that didn't live up to expectations
review: Thank-You for the time you took to share your experience with us.  I always welcome transparent feedback as it is a way to learn and grow my team.   When reading your review I was shocked at parts as the hotel has just completed some upgrades including a brand new full service bar, fitness center and second floor lobby as well as new mattresses, renovated guest room furniture and just began the bathroom renovation.  Living in Florida, during rainy season there is always an insect or two leering around however, the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City Center takes pride in ensuring a professional, clean, well maintained guest room and experience for all guests. In saying this, deep cleaning and preventative maintenance is completed on a routine basis as well as outside vendors (including pest control) is contracted to ensure all facets of the hotel meet and exceed Hampton strict set standards.   On a side note, we are a pet free property as well to ensure all of our guests who may have allergies are happy and have a great nights rest!   I do apologize that your stay was not up to par and would gladly invite you back to the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale/ City Center to guarantee you a pleasurable stay and show you all that the Hampton Inn Fort Lauderdale/ City Center has to offer!   Safe Travels,

title: Nice Hotel
review: This is the first time we stayed at a Hampton. I've known them to have a good brand but I wasn't to impressed with this one in downtown Ft. Lauderdale. Is it technically downtown? Yes. However it's really North West of where everything is ( so you need a car..or a cab). The room was average and clean. The front desk rep was nice, however not very helpful and just seemed to be "doing his job". We asked where a particular restaurant was and he had no idea (which is fine). Instead up going the extra mile and pulling it up on google or mapquest he gave us a map of the area and basically told us to figure it out. The place was only 4 miles down the road (5-7 min drive). When we returned around 1 AM, the dining area was littered with wine and beer glasses on the tables and the bar as…

title: Great Service
review: Greetings from Sunny South Florida,   I am saddened to see that one of my team members did not go above and beyond.  At the Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale / City Center we pride ourselves on guest service, clean rooms and location.  We are in the heart of downtown and just four blocks from Trendy Las Olas.   I will definitely use your feedback as a teaching moment with my front desk team to ensure that this sort of “just doing his job “bare minimum engagement will not occur in the future.   I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Overall Extremely Good
review: This hotel was very nice. The location was good for us because it was close to the beach and the charge for parking wasn't that bad as compared to other Ft Lauderdale area beach hotels. Its located in a not so nice area of downtown though. Very close to a bus station and a lot of indigent and homeless people around at night. Not safe for a single woman but its ok if parking in the garage, as its hotel key accessible only.

title: Good location, staff not so welcoming
review: I arrived late evening, happy to have reached my destination but was disappointed to be treated as an inconvenience at check in.  I found friendlier staff at the reception desk the next day when asking for directions to shops and restaurants.  The location of the hotel was good, just a short walking distance to Las Olas Boulevard, about 25 minutes to the beach.  The rooms were clean and breakfast (buffet style) was fine.

title: Not Hampton inn quality...
review: Greetings from Sunny Fort Lauderdale,   I am always excited to read reviews that offer transparent feedback.  I do apologize for your first night as it seems that you may have caught one of my Front Desk staff members on an off night.  As you can see from previous reviews and the staff you encountered throughout your stay the staff is very accommodating and welcoming.  We do have a great location ... The Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale City Center is located just a few short blocks from Trendy Las Olas and less than 2 miles from the beautiful beaches of Fort Lauderdale.   Thank-You for your review and I look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Excellent
review: Not at all what we are use to from that chain of hotels.  Shower head not functionning well even after it was changed.  Water was yellow, suposedly because of the city.  Breakfast food was horrendous, overcooked and over seasoned.  Not what we were expecting from a Hampton Inn...  And their 100% satisfaction guarantee, they told us upon checkout that we had to wait 2 hours for a manager to come inn to see what they could do.  Really, it was 8h30 in the morning.

title: Great Stay
review: I do appreciate your feedback and will utilize your comments as a teaching moment with the staff.   Just for a little reassurance, the water having a yellowish tinge is indeed from the city and is what occurs anywhere when there is a water main break in the area.  Unfortunately, this is not something that I have immediate control over however, we do strive to take corrective measures and offer complimentary bottles of “bottled water “at the front desk to ensure guest comfort.  The 100% satisfaction guarantee is clearly posted on the front desk counter at check-in and the staff has the autonomy to invoke the 100% as it's not only Hampton's policy but mine as well as we embrace the theory of ensuring each and every guest is satisfied.   I do hope to see you on your next visit to Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Good Stay
review: I would love to book my choir group again when ever we are in town. I would definitely recommend this hotel to friends. I love customer service. That is the first thing I look for. I do little things to get on peoples nerves and see how they react. Passed with flying colors.

title: satisfied
review: ok hotel.  we were in town for a wedding and were given the discount so the value was good. the breakfast was nice, but the beds were not comfortable.  the pool area was nice too.  we were disappointed with it's distance from Las Olas, though it's called the Hampton Las Olas.  We couldn't even see the main drag and never ventured out for a walk because we didn't feel save enough at night for sure.  At least it looks like the area is going through a revitalization.

title: A very nice stay
review: Thank-You for taking the time to share your experience with us.  I was value transparent feedback.   We just purchased all new mattresses for the entire hotel.  May just need a little time to break the new mattresses in ...   We are just four blocks from Las Olas.  It's less than a 5 minute taxi ride and $5.00 taxi fare to Las Olas.   The area is going through a revitalization with new restaurants, condo's and shopping being built just about everywhere  -  This will definitely add to the " Hip feeling " Fort Lauderdale is known for.   I am delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us!  Next time you absolutely have to visit Las Olas and experience all that Fort Lauderdale has to offer!   I hope to see you on your next trip to sunny Fort Lauderdale ~   Safe Travels,

title: Nicest Hampton we have ever stayed at
review: A very good Hampton ,clean ,nice lobby , great bar area . The location is good , and the staff was very helpful to my needs. Would stay there again a good experience. The pool area is great, the common areas in this property are very impressive.

title: Very comfortable
review: Hello from Hot and Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   I am always excited when I read reviews and it reads as if you were excited when writing your review...   The Hampton Inn Downtown Fort Lauderdale - City center is a unique property.  Unlike most Hampton Inn's we are an 11 story building with Fort Lauderdale Funky decor, a full service bar with tapas food options and our pool and spa overlook the Fort Lauderdale Skyline.  We are unique to say the least!  I am very thrilled that you experienced all we have to offer ...  Cleanliness is definitely one of our strong points... attention to detail is one of the areas we excel at!   I do Thank-You for your review and hope to see you on your next trip to Sunny Fort Lauderdale!   Safe Travels,

title: Great place
review: We generally find Hamptons to be good values and conveniently located when traveling.  This property exceeded our expectations.  Located right in downtown Ft Lauderdale it is very conveniently located for business or pleasure.  The staff was very pleasant.  Our requests for a high floor and  quiet room away from elevators and machines were honored with a room on the 11th floor at the end of the hall furthest from elevators and vending machines.  We were given complimentary water upon checking in. Parking is in a secure gated garage with cameras.  Our room was quiet and comfortable.  Only one sour note: they lady preparing the hot complimentary breakfast does not seem to be able to gauge when to cook items to replenish the buffet causing items to run out and there being a long…

title: The Fabulous Golden Girls
review: We  enjoyed the stay very much. Next time we stay more days. Absolutely. The bar is beautiful and all the entertainments area are very nice. Is close to the most popular restaurants and Pubs. Walking distance to Drugs Stores and othes.

title: Great Stay!
review: Our visit was great.  They were very accommodating.  Their Assistant Manager Kelly, was very helpful with all of our request.   As you know, having 2 kids can create some unique demands, Kelly helped solve all of our dilemmas.   We will return on our next visit.    J G

title: Great location
review: This is a great location for the price.  Rent a car and you can get to most of the local attractions within 15 - 20 minutes, plus it is close to the airport.  Good amenities also.  Downtown is a bit deserted on the weekends; ladies don't go alone!

title: They Did It Again
review: This is the 2nd time I have stayed at this hotel so I thought I should let everyone know of the great Customer Service. There where 4 of us in the room and we wanted extra towels.  I called down to the front desk and Thomas had them here with in 5 minutes.  This may not seem like a big deal but we where at a different hotel the week before and we had to ask 4 times and finally went down to the pool and took one from there because we needed to take showers.  The rooms where comfortable as always and the staff always friendly and accomodating.  Be sure the next time we are in town for Beach Volleyball we will be back.

title: Nice Stay after cruise
review: We stayed here for two nights after a cruise and found the hotel to be clean, safe and with a very friendly and helpful staff.  We enjoyed our complimentary welcome drink and water bottles as Hiltonn Honors members. The bartender was super friendly and nice! The check in was fast and the front desk personnel was very friendly and helpful. The hotel is very safe, you need the room key to operate the elevator and to access the parking lot. Maybe because of the downtown location.  Parking is not free, however the garage was well lit, safe and you could park next to your room floor entrance making it very convenient. Breakfast was OK, regular Hampton included fare.  Pool is pretty and clean, nice whirlpool. This was a nice stay to get to the FLL/Miami sights. I would stay here again…

title: Quick Family trip
review: In town visiting family.  Very pleasantly surprised by the great accommodations and friendly staff.  From the minute we walked in we were greeted by smiling faces behind the counter. Tom assisted us and could not have been more friendly and helpful.  He recommended some great restaurants for us to try just a short walk away and answered all of our questions.  Had to pay for parking but the complimentary drinks made up for that. The room looked like it was just renovated, with very comfortable beds.  The morning breakfast had a great selection and the woman working the area was nice enough to let our late sleeping daughter grab food after the cut off. Will definitely stay here on our next visit and recommend it to others.

title: Excellent Customer Service
review: I recently stayed at the Hampton Inn  Fort Lauderdale City Center for a Dwayne Wade Camp and I have to say my experience was outstanding.  The entire staff went out of their way to make sure I felt as though I was at home.  One individual deserves high praises.  Her name is Cheryl Lowe, I believe she works in sales.  I met her in the lobby when she introduced herself and asked how I was enjoying my stay.  Each day I ran into her, she called me by name and continued to inquire about my experience.    It is so rare these days to come across an individual in the service community that really understands what the term "hospitality" means and Ms. Lowe is definitely an exception.  You can bet I'll be staying here again for all my trips to Ft. Lauderdale.  She and this hotel are a…

title: Top Service especially for large groups
review: The Hampton Inn Downtown Ft Lauderdale is a great place to enjoy with a small family or a large group.  It's centered in the heart of downtown Ft Lauderdale with easy access to the Beach, Airport, and Shopping if interested.  The Hotel staff is very pleasant and the free breakfast is above what is expected.  My family (Johnson & Williams) celebrated our family reunion with over 75 family members during Fathers day weekend.  The hotel hosted our living arangements with top service.  It was owesome working with the hotel top professional sales team member (Cheryl Lowe).  The communication during the planning stage was optimally utilized at all channels.  She was instrumental in providing a nice personal weblink for family interested in booking rooms online.  Cheryl also assisted…

title: Great Staff
review: Location is good for business, which was the reason from my stay, but not walker friendly to any amenities. Upon arrival the staff was courteous, smiling and pleasant. They were also very helpful and made you feel welcome and important. The hotel is not new, but seems to have been renovated recently with new finishes in the public areas as well as the rooms. The rooms on the west side offer views of the city (not that interesting) and the rooms on the east offer views toward the beach, but mostly tall buildings. This hotel is probably not the best choice for a vacation, but definitely fits the bill for business trips.

title: Very good hotel
review: The staff is great, nice accommodations, great breakfast, even a small bar for a quick drink.  They allowed me to check in early which I really appreciated.  Parking has an extra fee if you park in the garage.  Pool was very nice.

title: Find another hotel to stay inn, this is not Hampton quality
review: The 4th floor hallway, the main lobby, and the hotel in general had a very bad odor. The carpets were dirty and the hotel appeared to be in very bad condition, it was a great disappointment.
